1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa hA dza gI ti/ bod skad du 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i glu/ bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
1b3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i nags las me tog rab rgyas pa// me tog gcig la 
1b4(rgyud 'grel): kha dog sna tshogs te// dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las 
1b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig dang // de la rtsa ba 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): byed du 'a 'od// thogs dag ngashA na 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ltos// dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal// rin thang med pa'i me tog long 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig dang // ges blangs pas sgro 'phrul mkhan po yin// rdo rje dbang phyug chos kyi dbyings la 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod// dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal// rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig dang // 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): da meg bya gas #/ ming pa mi ga nag nga/ 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shAn+ta de bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // bla ma d+hi ri shI dz+nyA na'i zhabs dang // lo tsA barma ban chos 'bar gyis bskur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ tat+taM swa b+hA ba driSh+Ti gI ti ka 
2b2(rgyud 'grel): do ha nA ma/ bad skad du/ rang bzhin gyi ngo ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ dpel he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyis med bdud rtsi kun 'dus grub thob kyi// dri med dge nges pa lta spyod la sogs 
2b3(rgyud 'grel): ni// nyams len zabs de kun la phan pa'i phyir// bde gshegs rnams la phyag 'tshal bshad par bya// dngos po yang ni ma yin zhing // dngos med la ni ma skyes pa'i// 'di lta bu yi rang 
2b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ni// su zhig gas ni rtogs par 'gyur// lA ye pa ni smra bar byed// 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che// khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang // de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med// de yi kha dog 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs dang ni// dbyibs kyang bdag gis rtogs pa med// de lta bu yi rang bzhin ni// dngos por ma grub ji ltar bstan// lU yi pa ni smra bar byed// 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che// khams gsum 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su longs spyod kyang // de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med// bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri// chu gting zla ba gzugs brnyan ni// don dam sgyu mar rtogs pa med// lU yi pa ni smra bar 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): byed// 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che// khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang // de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med// lU yi pa ni smra bar byed// bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri// 
2b8(rgyud 'grel): de yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med// rang bzhin gyi ngo ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta bo zhes bya ba// slob dpon lU yi pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ bi kalpa pa ri ha ra sI ka nA ma/ 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ rnam rtog spang ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// b+ho la gsang ba'i rdo rje la// 'dus pa sems kyi rang bzhin ni// thig le gsang ba'i// 
3a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsal breng // kak+ko la yi kha spor la// kye'o re ni 'bar bar byed// kr-i pi ta yi sgra sgrogs pas// rtsa drug 'khor lo hUM gas bcing // sku gsung d+hA dI ra bdag med rtogs// rang byung me tog 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yi// ga bur po la bsres byas nas// ka ru ka'i bdud rtsi 'thung bar gyis// ka li dzer skal bar ldan// rnal 'byor tshogs su bsre bar bya// du d+hur skal bar mi ldan te// spongs 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): shig rnal 'byor dam tshig go// bzhi mnyam grwa rtsi lus byugs nas// rtog pa rnams ni spang bar bya// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'tshogs dag tu// he ru ka yi nga rgyal ldan// sha wang zhing chen khur 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// ma la rigs skyes bram ze la// kun tu phrad pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rtog pa mi bya lus la gnas// kye'o skal ldan mchod par gyis// li la bdag med seng ge yi// stong nying 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): dor ni rtogs par 'gyur// rnam rtog spang phyir rnal 'byor kye// bdag ni gan rkyal nyal byas nas// lag pa bsnol nas brang la sbyar// rang rig na mkha'i phyogs su gtang // li la skyes te 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med rtogs// rtog med rnal 'byor grub pa thob// lel pa yis rtogs nas grol// rnam rtog spang ba'i gru zhes bya ba// slob dpon li la bas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ka 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da li ka do ha gI ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba// don thams cad grub ma la phyag 'tshal lo// nang nas gtum mo'i me spar bas// dbus nas 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'bab par byed// rang 'byung sdong bu skyes pa yi// rtse mo'i ri la byin te gnas// mgon po'i bdud rtsi 'bab par byed// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom// gshin rjer 'gro ba'i
3b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa spangs// sangs rgyas yon tan phreng ba 'byung // bde ba chen po rgyas pa yis// thams cad kyis ni khyab par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom// gshin rjer 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs// rdo rjes bkos shing bgos pa la// nyi zla gnyis ni bsres byas nas// na mkha'i dbyings su thim par 'gyur// bde ba chen po'i grong du phyin// kun dbus 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yon tan gyis// rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas su brtol// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom// gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs// 'byung rgyu'i rlung ni bkag pa yis// 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): dgasal ba'i gnas su gyun// rtags pang nags shing dpyad pa yiste// bai bye ga gis 'grub par 'gyur// 'byur ba'i sdug bsngal ldan da coM mi// k+ki shAts+tsha 'am 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa spangs// las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi gla zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bi rA pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // / rgya gar skad du/ b+ha bAn dr-iSh+Ti tsAr+ya pha la do ha gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): lta bsgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i do ha glu zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos po sna tshogs rang gi sems nyid yin// 'khor 'das thams cad rnal 'byor dbyer med pa// 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med pa ste// dper na chu dang de yi rlabs bzhin no// dngos dang dngos min spangs pa'i sems nyid 'di// rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor skad cig gcig la ni// 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): sgron me chung ngu zhig gis mun pa ltar// 'khor ba'i dug lnga rang bzhin rab rib sel// zung 'jug bya brgya blo 'das chen po ni// bde gsal mi rtog na mkha' lta bu ste// khyab// 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): cing rgya chen snying rje chen po'i ngo // snang yang rang bzhin med pa chu zla bzhin// gsal yang tha snyad mtha' dbus kun dang bral// gang gis ma gos dri med re dogs bral// lkugs pa'i rmi lam bzhin/ 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): du sA/ mi shes// tshad med bde chen rang bzhin ye shes ni// nyi zla'i 'od bzhin phyogs dang bral ba med// kye 'o rnal 'byor rang 'byung ngo mtshar che// gzhug ma ma bcos sems ni chos sku ste// 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): bcos pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor thob mi 'gyur// de phyir bde ba'i phyogs su yin par mthong // rang bzhin grub pa'i lam thob rnal 'byor bde// rnam rtog bral bas zhe 'dod 'byung mi srid// 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): rta mgrin grub thob bdag nyid sar ha sa smras// kye'o rnal 'byor lta ba'i nyams len gyis// de yi rang bzhin gang zhig sgom 'dod na// rang lus ri bo 'di ni gnas kyi mchog/ sems nyid dus 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnal 'byor bsgrub pa po// dbang po rnams bcings mtshams bcad bde bar 'gyur// g.yeng ba rnams kyang ched du spang mi bya// tug phrad sems su shes na yi dam lha// shes pa 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): ma bkug rtog par rims kyis spangs// sems la rnam rtog byung ni rnal 'byor pas// ras bal 'dab ma bzhin du glod la zhog/ bya ba spongs la rang sems rang gis ltos// zhe 'dod// 
4a8(rgyud 'grel): byung na bdud du shes par gyis// rnam rtog rnams kyi rtsa ba sems yin te// de med phyir na rnam tog yod min no// dran pa dran med bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor te// sems 'di rtag 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): par ma grub rang la thim// bsgom 'dod med pas sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob// rnal 'byor bu chung lta bur rtog pa med// ldum ra'i bung ba'i me tog ro myong ltar// nags nas nags su 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khyam pa seng ge bzhin// kun tu rgyu ba sna tshogs rlung ltar ni// sems nyid bag dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog/ rang bzhin mi dgag smon pa lta bur spyad// rgyab tu mi chags mdun du zhen pa med// 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): mdor na lta sgom spyod pa nyams len la// ji ltar phan pa'i spyod pas rnal 'byor spyod// sna tshogs snang ba sems kyi ngo bo 'di// thug phrad tsam gyis mo grub phyag rgya che// snang la mi snang 'bras bu 
4b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'byung // de la sems na dngos grub dam pa yin// phyi nang thams cad lhan cig skyes pa 'di// rnam rtog chu bo'i rgyun gyi rnal 'byor 'dra// de yang sems las gzhan na btsal du 
4b5(rgyud 'grel): med// yid la mi bzhag phyag rgya chen po'i lam// 'bras bu ma re rtogs na phyag rgya che// ma rtogs rtogs pa na mkha'i sprin+da dang 'dra// rtogs na de nyid rang bzhin stong pa yin// lha spyod 'bras 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): bu dbyer med lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin gzhis med rtogs na 'bras bu'i mchog/ lta spyod sgom pa 'bras bu do ha'i glu zhes bya ba// slob dpon sa ra ha pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): doH mdzod ci nyid kyis klu zhes bya ba bzhugs so// / rgya gar skad du// tan+d+re do ha gI ti ka nA ma// bod skad du/ do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba// 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// brtags na bdag gzhan dngos po med// byis pa lkug pa'i rmi lam 'dra// de nyid rtogs pa shin du dka'// byis pargyan po rtse ba 'dra// tha ka na ni smra bar byed// de 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig gis brjod pa dka'// snang stong rtog pa ma sel bar // thar pa thob par gal 'gyur// lus ngag yid gsum dbyings su ni// de nyid mnyam par ma shes na/ 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rtogs par shin tu dka'// byis brgyan po rtse ba 'dra// dngos po tshogs gis brjod pa dka'// chos rnams tshig tu smra ba yang // tshig tsam gyis ni 'grub pam ci// sems kyi de nyid ma rtogs 
5a3(rgyud 'grel): par// thams cad gcig par rtogs pa med// don dam rtogs pa shin tu dka'// byis brgyan po rtse ba 'dra// tha ka na ni smra bar byed// do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba// slob dpon ka na ri gnas 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pa// thag nas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ tsar+ya do ha gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ spyod pa'i da ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// lding ros 
5a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni thig le byas// ka tsa ri ni bstan par bya// kye ma rtsed mos bdud bzhi bcom// gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// smra bar byed pa'i khyab 'jug gam// drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus// kye mgal 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): te smra ba na// 'chi bdag gis ni za bar 'gyur// ma rungs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bsrungs// kye marmongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya// kye 'o byol song mkha' 'gra 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): ma// glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya// kye 'o 'bar ba'i mer ma dug/ gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// smra bar byed pa khyab 'jug gam// drag po tshangs pa bsrungs mi nus// ji ltar sU kr-i 
5a8(rgyud 'grel): ral po'i so// de bzhin la ba pa yi nabs// dam tshig spo par mtshar che// gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// smra bar byed pa khrab 'jug gas// drag po tshangs pa bsrung mo nus// spyod pa'i dota mdzad 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi glu zhes bya ba// slob dpon kam ba la nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon ka ma ka nas gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ sa ha dzA a nan+da gI ti ka dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes dga'i 
5b2(rgyud 'grel): do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ki la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyis spyor drug po brang la stabs// b+ha d+hi pa ni gnyis du log/ ji ltar kun la mkhas pa yis// drug po de ni ji ltar khyer// 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): tshem bu thob par gyur pa na// chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag/ tshem bu 'di la dbye ba 'am// rin gyi grangs kyis chod pa med// da ni bdag gi tshem bu 'di// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam par 
5b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// tshem bu thob par 'gyur ba na// chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag/ b+had+d+he tshem bu tshol du zin// thams cad du ni btsal bas na// bdag nyid kyang ni dmigs med 'gyung // tshem 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): bu thob par 'gyur ba na// chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag/ lhan cig skyes dga'i do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes pa/ slob dpon b+ha d+hes mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / @/ bde gshegs kyis la 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i glu zhes bya ba bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta dr-iSh+Ta gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde gshegs kyi lta ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun la// thams cad du ni bdag phyag 'tshal// skye 'gag sdug bsngal sgrol phyir mdzad// d+ha ma pa ni smra bar byed// bde gshegs spyi bor bkur ba yis// bdag nyid don dam de nyid
5b8(rgyud 'grel): rtogs// tshangs pa'i gnas gzhi lha gang du// 'di ru bdag ni rab tu 'byung // chos rnams thams cad khongs su chud// d+ha ma pa ni smra bar byed// bde gshegs spyi bor bkur ba yis// bdag 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): gis don dam de nyid rtogs// ri rab dang ni rna yi tshogs// ji ltar sang la gzhal lam ci// de bzhin phyi rol thams cad kyis// lta ba 'di da mnyam mam ci// d+ha ma 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni smra bar byed// bde gshegs spyi bor bkur bar yis// bdag gis don dam de zhi de rtogs// nor bu rin chen por nas na// mu dag 'ching bu len par byed// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni// 
6a3(rgyud 'grel): brtags na bden gzhi sa yin par smra// d+ha ma pa ni smra bar byed// bde gshegs spyi bor bkur ba yis// bdag gis don dam de nyid rtogs// bde gshegs kyi lta ba'i glu zhes bya ba// slob dpon d+ha/ 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): ma pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya ga sa du/ 'amra ta rmAnaHgI tI kanA ma/ zod skad du/ rlung gi de nyid kyi deH'i grwa zhes bya ba/ gnyis med bde chen la phyag 'tshal lo// brtan g.yo rlu na 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang // sems kyi rdo rje gdan du bzhugs// stong pa nyid ni zab mo la// kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi// dga' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol// srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na// slar yang ji ltar// 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): phrad par 'gyur// skye bo lhan cig skyes pa yi// mdzes ma bdag gi dbang du gsol// khyed ni bzhugs na bdag gis ni// ji ltar ba dag gis gzhan la btsal// gru ni 'bying bar 'gyur ba la// yongs su 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): drang bar 'dod pa la// kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi// dga' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol// srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na// slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur// khyed kyi slad du bdag gis ni// rigs/ 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i grong ni bsar byas kyang // khyod kyi zhal ni bdag gis ni// skad cig gcig kyang ma mthong ngo // kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi// dga' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol// srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na/ 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur// kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi// mdzes ma bdag gi dpang du gsol// khyed kyi slad du bdag gis ni// phyag rgya dgos te rlung tsam yang // rigs ngan bram ze'i
6b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa med// kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi// dga' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol// srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na// slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur// rgya mtsho'i nang du rdzings bcas pa/ 
6b3(rgyud 'grel): thod pa can ni ka hA las// ma hi sa gdams ngag thob par 'gyur// srid pa'i bcings pa yongs su bcad// kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi// mdzes ma bdag gi dbang du gsol// rlung gi de zhid kyi 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): do ha'i glu zhes bya ba// slob dpon nag po nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon ma hi pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / @/ dpyid kyi theg le do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba bzhugs so// @#rgya gar skad du/ 
6b5(rgyud 'grel): b+ha sa ma ti ti la ka do ha gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpyid kyi thig le do ha mdzod kyi gla zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// se b+hA sku gsum la sogs kyi// sos ka'i me tog mthong ba yi// 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu bdag ni myos par 'gyur// he ru ka la chags pa yis// sos ka'i dang po dang po 'dir// khyod kyis bdag ni srung bar mdzod// gdung bas 'gum par ma mdzad cig/ me tog a ma b+ha ka ru Na/ 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): dri bsrung ldan pas dgyes par 'gyur// sha ris pa ni brdungs pas brdungs// me mar khur na sa tsaN+Da li// re mo bdag la 'bab po zhes// ka na pa ni gshegs par re// so ka'i dang po dpyid dus la/ 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis bdag ni bsrung ba mang // gdung bas 'gum par ma mdzad cig/ phyogs bcur bltas na bdag gis ni// khyod las gzhan ni mthong ba med// gdung ba'i me yis bdag gis ni/ 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi lus kyang bsam pa med// rnal 'byor ma brgyad las bzhi ni// bdag cag gsol ba btab pa yis// bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs par mdzod// dpyid kyi thig le 
7a2(rgyud 'grel): do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba// slob dpon nag po pa nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon sa ra ha sa mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra tsatu ra gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bzhi'i glu zhes bya ba/ dpal 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mthun sems ni khyod ma bsgom// de nyid de bzhin nyid ma 'dzin// 'bras bu re ba bsgom ma byed// mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po bsgoms// gal te mnol la 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas med na// de ni dpal gyi thig che min// 'bras bu re ba bsgom ma byed// mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po sgoms// phung po khams te phyag rgya che// dam tshig 'khor lo de rang bzhin// 'bras bu re ba 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom ma byed// mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po bsgoms// gnyis med yon tan rgyal 'di yin// gnyis med yon tan rnal 'byor gsung // 'bras bu re ba sgom ma byed// mi dmigs phyag rgya chen 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): po sgoms// sha ri'i yul du sku 'khrungs pa// a ba d+hA tri gzhis med rdo rjes mdzad pa// a ma ra sing+gi glu rdzogs s+ho// // gang yang mi skye ma 'gag dngos po bcings pa med// khams 
7a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum grol med 'khrul pa rnams la snang // rtsa ba sems nying sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni// thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur// dngos rnams gdod nas skye med 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba gang zhig yin// su zhig skye bar 'gyur dang 'gag dang bcing ba sems// rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni// thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur// 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): sems ni nam mkha' dri med dang 'dra slob dpon gsung // srid pa gsum po de 'dra ba yi rang bzhin yin// rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni// thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur// rang bzhin mi rtog rang rig zhams su myong bas 'grub// rang bzhin 'od gsal 'khrul pas ci phyir rmongs par 'gyur// rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni// 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur// bla ma me tri'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag la tshal lo// zab mo zab mo 'jig rten kun smra yang // ma skyes pa la dga' ba dga' ba 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' zhig 'dug/ kye sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas na// lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin// mi gnas sems ni mi dmigs pa la bzhag/ rnal 'byor me yis dngos po thams 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): cad bsreg/ kye sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas na// lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin// rnal 'byor 'dod pa bla mas bstan du med// bla ma'i byin rlabs gong na med pa len// kye
7b6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas na// lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin// dpal gyi bde ba chen po che la 'dod ni// dbus mtsho la 'dod mig med khron par lhung // kye sems kyi zab 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): mo rtogs par dka' bas na// lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin// sa ra ha'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa dang ni snying rje'i rang bzhin 'dres// stong zhid dbyer 
7b8(rgyud 'grel): med rgyun mi 'chad par yod// bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong // nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug/ nam mkha' nam mkha' so ba de ma mthong // 'khor 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): bas bcings pa'i sal da mi gnas// bdag gis song pa'i rnal 'byor me mthong // nam mkha' ba shos shing bshos shing 'brang zhing 'dug/ de 'dra'i rnal 'byar rtsa bar 
8a2(rgyud 'grel): grI ba las ga sa// sung rje'ir can rngam med pa yid// bdag gis snang ba'i rnal 'byor ma mthong // nam mkha' ba'os shing banas shang 'brung zhing 'drag/ sAr tas brjod gang gzhan tu byar 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): zung // nid dang mtshan du nam mkha' 'byo byor 'gro// bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de thong // nam mkha' ba zhos shing banos shing 'brang zhing 'dug/ sar ha'i grwa rdzogs ste// / sangs 
8a4(rgyud 'grel): d+has la rtag 'tshal la// rdonarnal 'byung mda' 'dzin de// chos rnams mtshan par rab shes nas// nga yis ldan skyes mnga' 'phangs rgyab// 'dren med cig kyang phog pa med// lhan cig 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i ga mag pa cig/ thams cad dngas par sna ba'i mda'// nga yis lhan gyis mda' 'phangs brgyag// 'bar zad cig kyang bag pa med// de rnams nas tshor ba mdu/ 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): yos 'di yin gnyis bang song // nga yas ldan skyes mda' 'phangs rgyab// 'ben med cig kyang phog pa med// tha ser 'thor bu zhi shu med// de 'dra'i khol ba bar byed// nga yis ldan 
8a7(rgyud 'grel): zlas mda' 'phangs rgyug/ 'ben med cig kyang bag ba med // bair byed pa'i rdo rje'i tha thogs su// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul tshun dkyil 'bar bum pa rdo rjes gas 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): zil bar po la phung ba'i grangs pa'i thabs// kanapas brjod de'angs nag byed// thams cad brdzun pas bsrub yin par 'dod// kan pa'i glatshogs so// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal la// 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): kye bram ze ral can skyes bus ma grub// sangs rgyas ye shes dag la mos par gyis// de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin// brtan g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che// mi gnas 
8b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bung ba khyod ni bsgoms// yang dag bla ma'i man ngag nan tan gyis// de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin// brtan g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che// mi gnas rang bzhin bung ba 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): ma skyes pa// rmi lam bud med de bzhin med pa ste// de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin// brtan g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che// mi gnas rang bzhin bung ba de shes na// tshe 'di nyid la 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dngos grub 'grub// de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin// brtan g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che// mi gnas pa yi don thugs su chud pa// bla ma rje btsun d+hiSh+Thi dz+nyA na'i zhal snga 
8b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// rdo rje'i glu zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar bltas pa de ltar mthong ba med// brdzun pa med pa'i slu ba 'ba' zhig ste// bsam ma khyab cing grub smra he ru 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): ba// skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes// ji ltar de ltar glo bur gang la bzhag/ 'dod pa'i mdung gis rang la tsi ta zug/ bsam mi khyab cing grub smra he ru pa// skyob pa'i sems 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes// lhan cig sems te mkha' lus bde snying lus// gnyis med gnyis yin stong dang snying rje'i sems// bsam gyis mi khyab grub smra he ru pa// skyob pa'i sems 
8b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes// de ni mi skye mi 'gag rkyen med de// rang bzhin rtogs na rtsa ba'i sems shes yin// bsam gyis mi khyab grub spu he ru pa// skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): mi shes// bla ma d+hiSh+Thi dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas kyi glu rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma khams gsum sems can rnams// rnam rtog sgrog gis 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): dam bcings te// 'khor ba'i mya ngan snam pu ru// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'khyam// e ma lam gyi khams gsum bde bar gshegs// gdod ma nyid nas grol ba che// rnam dag 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing ni bde ba can// sangs rgyas rol mo rab tu ston// kye ma rnam tog sdug bsngal lam// phyin pa'i dus med smon pa bzhin// bde bral 'dod pa sdug bsngal nyid// mazham zhing don la rab tu 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): gol// e ma'o lam med lam gyi mchog/ lhun rdzogs nam mkha'i bya bzhin du// re dogs med la phyag rgya che// skyon yon dbang gis bslad du med// kye ma'o bskal pa grangs med gsum/ 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): de zhing btsal bas mi rnyed de// rmongs pa nam mkha'i mtha' tshol bzhin// sangs rgyas zhes bya rnyed mi srid// e ma'o skad cig gcig zhid la// ma bral 'bras bu rang la rnyed// rang rig 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes stobs po che// 'jig rten dbang sgyur kun gyi rje// rdzogs s+ho// // mkha' la ba 'jo 'jo byed bla ma ste// 'thung ba'i be'u ni rang gi sems zhing yin// mkha' la rkun mi 'chad 'jo 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): ka na pa// rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// ba 'jo snod gsol ga re mA ma kI/ ba 'jo snod ni dri med lhan cig skyes// mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jo ka na pa// rnal 'byor 
9a8(rgyud 'grel): sngon pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// mkha' la bzhos shing bzhos shing sdod bkang bzhag/ bzung bar mi nus 'di ltar grang po lnga// mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jog na pa// rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs/ 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): la mchod pa 'bul// mkha' la ba 'jo 'jo byed 'dir ma mthong // ji ltar nang du chus gang ka li pa// mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'joka na pa// rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// kaH
9b2(rgyud 'grel): ri'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// me tog gcig rgyas kha dog sna tshogs pa// stong pa'i ljon shing dag las shin du rgyas// btsan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa// rin thang med 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me tog 'di snoms shig/ de shing rtsa ba yal ga lo ma med// ltos dang zla nyal 'gro ni bzang po'i dus// btsan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa// rin thang med pa'i me tog 'di snoms shig/ 
9b4(rgyud 'grel): ge sar gcod mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yin// chos dbyings rdo rje dbang phyug mchod pa 'bul// btsan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa// rin thang med pa'i me tog 'di snoms shig/ mchog dga' 
9b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni dga' bral gzhig nas longs// yang dag bla ma'i zhabs btu nan tan gyis// btsan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa// rin thang med pa'i me tog 'di snoms shig/ ma ti tsi tra'i glu rdzogs 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dge dang mi dge'i las rnams la// dga' dang mi dga' khyod ma byed// rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin// chos nyidang 
9b7(rgyud 'grel): zab mo rnal 'byor yul// sgom dang mi sgom byang chub sems// ldan dang mi ldan khyod ma byed// rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gyi// spyod pa'i lam ni/ 
9b8(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin zhes// mthun dang mi mthun khrod ma byed// rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin// bde dang sdug bsngal 'bras bu'i chos// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa la// re dang dogs pa khyod 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): ma byed// rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin// glu rdzogs s+ho// // bdag ni 'jug ste shi dang ma shi med// bdag gi yid la don cig 'jug pa med// ka na ral 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): zas zhags pa rab bcad pas// da lta re ba med de pa da s+tha// thu ga nyis snal rkang pa rab bzhag nas// lus 'grel gyur te sems la sdug bsngal skye// ka na'i ral gris zhags pa rab bcad 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): pas// da lta re ba med de pa da sma// mi gang rtsa ba khron pas bskor gyur kyang // shing gcig la ni 'bras bu gnyis mi 'byung // ka na'i ral gris zhags pa rab bcad pas// de lta re ba med de pa da 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): ga san pas chubacud len na nga sa thag// de rnams la na ba ga na la // kan 'a ma thas 'gas pa bca bas// dam+b+hir ba med da pad+maste// sngags m+b+ha/ @ 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// kye yul rnams thams cad lta 'dod na// ri bo chen po'i kha nas ltos// chos rnams thams cad skye 'gag med pa'i yul// rang sems rig na ri rab rtse// chu rnams// 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'thung 'dod na// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu la 'thung // skye med byang chub sems kyi chu// mtha' dbus med pa'i rgya mtsho che// bstan g.yo thams cad bsreg 'dod na// 'jig pa'i dus// 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi me chen por// rnam rtog brtan g.yo thams cad de// lhun grub ye shes sems kyi me// 'jigs med bde ba'i gnas 'dod na// dgon pa chen po'i gnas su 'dug/ 'khor ba rnam dag 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i gnas// byang chub sems ni dgon pa che// A tsar+ya dpa' bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi glu rdzogs so// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin bdag med ma de ni// bdag gi me rer 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin// chags pa med pa de yis ni// nyon mongs zhi bar byed pa yin// skye dang 'chi ba srid pa yin// 'khrul pa rnams ni spong ba yin// bde ba chen po ster byed pa'i// len
10b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'khrul pa ma yin no// des na kha dog dbyibs med de// tshad kyang yod pa ma mthong ngo // 'dod pa med pa de yis ni// nga rgyal skye ba mi 'dod do// gang tshe bdag med ma de ni// bdag gi/ 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): snying la zhugs pa na// bdag dang gzhan rnams ma lus pa'i// dbye ba yod par ma mthong ngo // 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// gar yang gnas pa ma yin te// nam mkha' yi ni ngo bo ltar// yongs 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): su gsal bar snang ba yin// thub pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// ma lus pa dang ral pa ni// de ni me li bdag med mar// de ltar bdag nyid smra ba yin// nA ro paN+Di ta'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / sangs 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can nyon mongs gdung bas sa steng bskor ba'i lha// de lta na yang bde chen chung ma'i lus mi 'dor// kye kye dpe med chung ma la ni rab tu chags// bskal pa dpag 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): med mi 'bral gtso bo'i 'jig rten lha// shin tu ngo mtshar bdud kyi chung ma de mi len// gzhan las khyad 'phags gzugs mchog mnga' ba'i lha// kye kye dpe med chung ma la ni rab tu chags// 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa dpag med mi 'bral gtso bo 'jig rten lha// 'gro ba brgya phrag mang po nad kyis thebs la bskor// de dag bde ster lha ni khams gsum me long yin// kye kye dpe med chung ma la ni rab 
10b8(rgyud 'grel): tu chags// bskal pa dpag med mi 'bral gtso bo'i 'jig rten lha// mnyam med mnyam pa'i bde gsol ma ti ro ha na// rgyal ba'i yon tan mang ldan kaR+Sha pa na'i lha// kye kye dpe 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): med chung ma la ni rab tu chags// bskal pa dpag med mi 'bral gtso bo'i 'jig rten lha// lA yi pa'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sgyu ma'i 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): nags tshal mang po de dang der// ri dgas bsad phyir blon po Dom+bI 'gro// log 'gro ri dgas gar 'gro nga yis mthong // Dom+bi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs// mda' lnga yod de lnga ka shar 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis bton// Dom+bi gzhu bkang bzung nas rnam par 'dug/ log lha'i ri dgas gar 'gro yis mthong // Dom+bi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs// gzhu med rgyad med spyag med mde'u med// 
11a4(rgyud 'grel): Dom+bi the tshom med de nges par bsad// log lta'i ri dgas gar 'gro nga yis mthong // Dom+bi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs// rgyal ba rigs lnga dbu rgyan byas nas su// ri dgas bsad pa 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): slar la sogs par bya// log lta'i ri dgas gar 'gro yis mthong // Dom+bi mda' non bkang nas nang du zhugs// Dom+bi'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan pa ngan pa 
11a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten kun smra yang // gces pa'i yon tan dri med zab mo yod// ut+pal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg/ de 'dra'i mang po'i sku mkhan bi rU pa// tshong 'dus dang ni grong dang chu 'gram 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): ni// gang du phyin nas lus 'gyel de mi shes// ut+pal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg/ de 'dra'i mang po'i sku mkhan bi rU pa// 'jig rten ngan par smra ba de brdzun yin// khros pa gang // 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): gA bab pa rgyun las bzlog/ ut+pal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg/ de 'dra'i mang po'i sgyu mkhan bi rU pa// nyi ma gte mar bcug nas chang ni 'thungs// an+da 'jigs byas b+he me'i sa/ 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): rab shig/ ut+pal chu nang btus nas chu sa mi reg/ de 'dra'i mang po'i sku mkhan bi rU pa// bi rU pa'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// bltos dang skye ba gnas 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa na// de tshe lhan cig skyes dang khyad par med// de zhid rang bzhin shin du go gyur nas// de zhide mi mthun pa de rnams par smros// 'di ltar khams gsum bde bar gshegs pa// / 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga// de yi tshe na gang gis bcings par sems// de nyid rang bzhin shin du go gyur nas// ji ltar mi mthun pa de rnam par smos// 'di kun rtsa ba'i rang bzhin ma rnyed stor// de yi tshe na/ 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i rang bzhin mi 'chi 'am// de zhi rang bzhin shin du go gyur nas// de nyid mi mthun pa de rnam par smros// rmongs par ma byed gzhi sa med mdud pa yis// ces te stong pa'i 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur brdzun gyis bcings// de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas// ji ltar mi mthun pa de rnam par smos// la ba pa'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // ji ltar til la til mar khyab pa bzhin// de 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin khams gsum 'jam dpal sku yis gang // de shes lhan grub rnal 'byor bsgom pa yis// bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long // bde gshegs kun gyi btsun mo ming med ma// 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs gzugs can snying rje can de dang // lhan cig 'grogs na sdug bsngal thams cad sel// bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long // nam mkha' nam mkha'i mtshan zhid ci 'dra bar// 
11b8(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi chos nyid de 'dra bla ma gsung // bla med don de mi shes bsgom mi nus// bde ba chen po chos kyi glu 'di long // zhim me shel ras bal 'dus ji bzhin// lung dang man ngag de 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin brten pa las// rang rig ye shes me ni 'bar bar 'gyur// bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long // glegs bam tshes dang gzhan lag gnas pa'i nor// 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): chos nor min te dgos pa'i dus na med// 'phags pa'i nor chen rang gi sems la chongs// bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long // bde dang sdug bsngal gnas skabs thams cad du// 
12a3(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin nor 'dra'i de zhi byang chub sems// 'jam dpal kun 'dul zhin mtshan nan tan byos// bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long // ma hA su kha ta'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // dpal sangs// 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu ngo mtshar bdag gi gtam// glang chen btsongs nas gzhi log ltar// gang zhig nor yod mil tshe byed// kun khyab dpa' bo pra sa ra// tshes dang chos 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): min gtam mi 'dri// rang byung rang bzhin g.yo ba med// glang chen btsongs nas gzhi log ltar// gang zhig nor yod mel tshe byed// kun khyab dpa' bo pra sa ra// rnal 'byor me tri'i 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): dbye shes pas// thogs med dus bsags skyon kun bral// gang zhig nor yod mel tshe byed// kun khyab dpa' bo pra sa ra// rnal 'byor pra sa ra'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // stong pa la gnas snying 
12a7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdag zhi can// zhing na bzhugs pa'i thabs dang shes rab tshogs// gzugs rnyan lta bur shes par bya// snying rje ro yis tha dad brtsod pa spangs// der ni kun rdzob yul gyi sha rnams 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): bza'// shin tu rnam dag stong pa'i chang ni btung // skye 'gro skal ldan rnams la don 'di bstan// skal med rnams la shin tu gsang bar bya// rnam thar byug pas phyi nang brlan byas la// 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): yul gyi longs spyod la ni ci bder spyad// phan tshun 'gro dang 'ong ba'i chos rnams la// ngag dang ma dag yid la mi bya'o// byang chub sems kyi phreng bas rnam rgyan la// gsang ba'i dkyil 
12b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nang du 'jug bya ste// thabs dang shes rab sbyor brgyan mi 'chad// lhan cig skyes pa'i g.yung mo mi spang ngo // klu sgrub kyi glu rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// 
12b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam rtog 'jig pa'i chom rkun 'jigs shes na// tshul khribs nor chen bsrung phyir mel tshe gyis// kye snyoms las ma byed sems kyi mel tshe gyis// gti mug gnyid kyis 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i mtshan mo ring // kye snyoms las ma byed sems kyi mel tshe gyis// gzhi log na ni khyim nang chom rkun 'gro// khyod kyis tshul khrims nor chen 'phrogs par 'gyur// 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims nor de med na ting 'dzin med// de bad na ni zhi ma 'char ba med// de zhi dam bsgom pas mel tshe gyis// skad cig gcig kyang nor kyang nor chung gzhan ma byed// de yi 
12b6(rgyud 'grel): dus de zhing zhi ma 'char// 'di ltar de tshe 'khor ba'i na ma langs 'gyur// kye snyoms las ma byed sems kyi mel tshe gyis// dI pa ma ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i chos kyi glu rdzogs s+ho// 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): dag spyod pa'i ku'i lha ba zhes bya ba 'azhugs sa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ tsar+ya draSh+Ti do ha gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ do ha spyod pa'i glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rma bya'i gdugs sgreng 'dzin byed 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): cing // cha byad sna tshogs 'dzin byed pa'i// rnal 'byor pa ni smon pa 'dra// nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i lam// med ces lU yi smra bar byed// lus kyi tshim bu bsrungs pas grub// 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur mang po blang bya ste// don med par ni slu bar byed// dbang bskur rtogs par ma gyur na// dus kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin// nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): khang skyes n+te/ la / zang nga / swA sh+tsaH/ nas 'gas 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings// nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i lam// med ces lA yi smra bar byed// lus kyi tshem bu bsrungs pas grub// tshe mi 'dus kham phor gser skyigs ltar// gal te de ltar byas pa 
13a4(rgyud 'grel): na// sangs rgyas rnams dang zad par 'gyur// nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i lam// med ces lA ye smra bar byed// lus kyi tshem bu bsrungs pas grub// do ha spyod pa'i glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba// 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon lU yI pa nas brgyad pa// slob dpon kir bas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ shU n+ya tA dr-iSh+Te nA ma/ bod skad du/ stong pa nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ spyan ras gzigs 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi rtog rtse chos nyid// sa bon nam mkha'i dbyings su smos// bdag med gzhon nu'i mgul nas 'khyud// gzhis sa byed pa nyid du gnas/ 
13a7(rgyud 'grel): spongs shig ngor shig bdag rmongs so// kye'o bcings pa ma lus pa// sha ba ri bde chen por rol// stong pa'i btsun mo 'khyud byas te// kye'o lum ngag sems smin te// thams cad// 
13a8(rgyud 'grel): du ni brtags pa yis// sha ba rin myos par 'gyur// dga' ba'i rnam pa thams cad du// sha ba ri ni gnyid log nas// gzhid ni nam mkha'i dbyings su log/ kye'o bdag gi de zhing 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): ni// sa bon nam mkhar mnyam par smos// 'bras bu nam mkhar skar chen shar// spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so// srid pas bcings pa'i glang chen bsad// dbang po/ 
13b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi gtor ma byas// bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad spangs// spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so// nyin mtshan rtag tu gnyid med par// rang gi sems la byar byas// de nus skyes pa bud med 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): ni// gcig tu dben par song stegs nas// gtso bo 'jig rten mgon dang smra// spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so// stong pa'i btsun mo byung byas te// sha ba ri ni bde ba chen por gnas// skyong 
13b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba// slob dpon sha ba ri pas gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// @6/ bde sdug gnyis thal gyi lta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ su kha ru/ kha a d+hu pa rir+ya 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): g+ha dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/ bede skad du/ bde sdug gnyis bral gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgom las 'das pa sgrub rgyu med// mgon po rnams 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag zhi de can// grub thob rnams kyi bla ma la// phyag 'tshal gnyis bral lta ba bshad// rang bzhin sgom rgya med pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor sgom las 'das pa yin// dngos dang 
13b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos min gnyis dang bral// de phyir kun rdzob grub pa med// dngos po sgom med dngos med min// rang bzhin dbyer med rgyu las 'das// nam yang rang bzhin ye shes te// zung 'jug dga' ba 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med// dran pa dang bral dran med de// rnal 'byor pa yi 'khrul pa yin// shes rab thabs kyi zung 'jug la// rnal 'byor gzhan gyi dgongs pa ni// dang po thabs ni bsgom pa'i phyir// 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog shes rab skad cig la// ma grub thabs kyang 'grub mi 'gyur// mthong min de ni bsgom pa min// gang zhig thabs ni sgom byed na// bla ma'i gdams ngag ldan 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// yang dag phyag rgya thabs nyid kyis// za zhing rang bzhin rab rtsub// ye shes kun gyi bdud rtsi 'bab// mtshon pa'i 'od gsal skad cig la// blo ldan brtan pa'i sems kyis 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// btags pas ma grub rtogs bral yin// dper na 'gron po yul 'gro bzhin// chos sku'i mtshan mar sems gtad pas// rim gyis sleb pas de nyid min// sngar bzhin mtshan ma 
14a4(rgyud 'grel): med 'gyur bas// rnam rtog dang bral bde chen 'grub// sna tshogs pa yis rig pa rnams// rang rig gzhan gyis rig mi 'gyur// de rtogs nyin mtshan bde chen mnyam// gnyis dang gnyis 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): med spangs gyur pa'i// gang la mi gnas rnal 'byor de// shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs// de rtogs bdag med lta ba yin// rnal 'byor bde sdug gnyis dang bral// gnyis bral rnal 'byor 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): shwA ba te pa// rtogs pas phyag rgya chen po thob// bde sdug gzhis bral gyi lta ba zhes bya ba// slob dpon shA ma ti pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ A sam ban+d+ha driSh+Ti nAm 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du// 'brel med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ 'brel med rgun chad ye shes lhal phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig dang rten pa'i tha snyad la// re zhig brten na 'jig rgyu med// 'jig dang rten gyis kyi nig 
14a8(rgyud 'grel): bya// de phyir 'jig rten pa yis ni// rnam par bzhag pa yod min la// 'jal byed tshar bar shes par bya// khyab bya dang ni khyab byed kyi// dbye ba'i dpe yi dbang du ni// nyi ma khyab bya zhes 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste// 'od zer khyab par shes par bya// dper na 'o mar 'dres pa yis// mar ni dang por yod min te// khyab bya khyab byed zad min la// de dag 'brel pa yod min no// me yi chu ni gang 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): yin la// de la 'bras bu ji ltar 'byung // me yi mtshan nyid sreg byed de// de zhing khyab byed ces bya ste// khyab byar du ba yin par mthong // pha na sangs rgyas khyab byed de// bu ni dam chos 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): khyab byar gsungs// dper na bum pa'i me de ni// nang gsal phyir ni gsal mi byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas gsal byed me// chos ni ji ltar gsal bar byed// dang po chos min sangs rgyas 
14b4(rgyud 'grel): min// skye min la ni ji ltar 'brel// rgyu rnams 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'byung // gsungs pa rgyu med 'bras bu med// khyab bya khyab byed ji ltar bsgrub// g.yo dang mi g.yo rnams kyis ni// rten 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs 'byung ba rnams kyi ste// 'byung ba zhi mtha' dag rang mi sgrub// shing ni khyab bya yal ga dang // rtsa ba khyab bya ji ltar yod// bdag dang bdag gi rtog pa yis// ming dang ming can 'phros
14b6(rgyud 'grel): pas 'byung // dang po ming can ming zhe na// de ltar gang zhig ldog pa ni// khyab bya de bzhin ldog pa'o// rten cing 'brel pas 'byung ba ste// rten cing 'brel bar 'gag par byed// cig 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): la yang dag 'byung ba ni// byis pa rnams kyis smra bzhin byed// khyab bya ldog na 'gal ba med// de ltar de ni 'jig rten gyi// 'jal byed tshad mar shes par bya// ji ltar ri bong rA tse ni// 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): brtags bzhin yod pa ma yin te// de bzhin du ni chos rnams la// gang zhig rtogs bzhin yod pa min// ba yir co ji ltar ni// shar dang nub ni de bzhin du// phrad par shes par 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur te// dpe ni de bzhin lta drug pa// phyi nang mu stegs rtags can dang // nang pa sangs rgyas nyan thos dang // a ti dang ni gcer bu dang // grub mtha' khyab 'jug 
15a2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs srad can// b+hin gnyis ni sgrub man pa// rnams la 'brel ba yod min la// sangs rgyas dgongs pa de yin te// de dang ma ldan gang zag ni// 'jig rten 'das zhes mi bya'o// 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): de yi dbang du byas nas ni// brtags pas khyab bya gang zag ni// bdag gzhan gang zag yod min no// bya ba mtho ris ngan song dang // khyab bya sems zhi dganyis su mthong // 'jig rten
15a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'das pa bzhin// bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khor ba ste// de nyid bral zhing bde gshegs te// chags pa zhe sdang rmongs pa dang // thal zhing rgyun chad mya ngan 'das// de ltar 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// gsungs pa de ni rigs so// 'khor ba de ni mya ngan min// mya ngan 'das la mya ngan med// rig pa dang ni ma rig pa'o// gnas skabs rtog pa bcing bar
15a6(rgyud 'grel): byed// mi rtog bkrol bas gsungs pa ste// rtog pa rnams la khyad par med// yong 'gro dag ni byang chub la// zhe ring tha snyad yod pa min// nyon mongs mun pa byang 'gyur la// 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): mthong min de la yod min no// sangs rgyas kyis ni lung las gsungs// mtha' dbus med pa'i rgya mtsho ni// ji ltar yi dgas skams par mthong // de bzhin ma rig mun pa yis// 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): tshig pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas na// yod pa min la mthong ba min// rdzogs chen po'i lung las ni// chos nyid bzhi'am ma bcos pa// khyab byed de la 'byung ba yi// 'gro drug
15b1(rgyud 'grel): khyab byar gsungs pa'o// cung zad dge ba'i chos rnams la// sangs rgyas mi sgrub ci zhig byed// dper na dmus leng skyes bu la// 'bar ba'i rin chen lag mthil bzhag/ mthong 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): min de yis ci zhig bya// nang pa mu stegs dbang du ni// rang rig 'od gsal khyab byed de// rnam par rig pa khyab bya sems// dper na chu dang bsres pa yi// 'o ma snod ni gcig pa ste// ji ltar 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): chu ni lus byas nas// ngang pas 'o ma 'thung bar byed// de bzhin nyon mongs 'dres pa ni// ye shes snod ni gcig pa ste// de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa 'thung // ma rig pa ni lus par byed// 
15b4(rgyud 'grel): nang pa mu stegs rnams kyis ni// lta ba de ni gsungs pa'o// de la lan gyi dbang du ni// sangs rgyas lung las 'di ltar gsungs// byed po med la las kyang med// de dag med la khyab bya med// 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum med 'brel pa ji ltar bsgrub// phyi ni bden pa gal te yod// nang ni bden par rang bzhin no// gang zhig rtog pa phyi don la// de med gang zhig yod pa min// rang dang gzhan gyi rig pa min// 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): de phyir khams gsum 'brel pa med// de phyir rig pa dngos po la// mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no// dngos po rig min dngos min bzhin// skye min de ni bdag med pa// bdag med pa ni skye mi 
15b7(rgyud 'grel): 1len// de ni kun rdzob mi rigs te// gal te rigs na don dam med// re zhig rgyu med skye ba med// 'bras bu med la skye ba med// bdag la mi skye gzhan la min// gnyis la min phyir kun rdzob/ 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): min// rang rig bde gsal khyab byed dang // rnam rig tsam du khams gsum dang // sems kyi 'dod pa khyab bya yi// dbang du bshad pa byas nas ni// nyan thos rnams kyi dbang du ni// kun gzhi/ 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams shes khyab byed la// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang // rtogs pa rnams ni khyab bya'o// dper na nam mkha' khyab byed de// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // sprin dang 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): glog dang chu sogs dang // khyab bya mi 'gag yon tan bcu// de ltar dpe rnams gzhis yin te// tha snyad 'jal byed tshad mar shes// de la don dam 'jal byed kyi// tshad mi'i dbang
16a3(rgyud 'grel): du byas nas ni// gong ma'i dpe don rnams gnyis ni// kam pa la yi dgongs pa ni// phyi sgrub lus las gsungs pa bzhin// sangs rgyas dang ni sgrub rnams kyis// nyams rang rig pa 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar gsungs// de las lung gi dbang du ni// chos kyi bdag ni yod min la// khams gsum thams cad stong pa ste// 'dus byas thams cad rtag mni gsungs// de rnams sems nyid 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa ste// rtog pa de zhing 'khor ba yin// gang zhig rtog med grol ba'o// chags pa zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // gzhan yang byis pa rnams kyis ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa sogs// chos 
16a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ji ltar gsungs pa ste// sems kyis rtogs par shes par bya// bzang dang ngan pa'i rtog pa la// khyad ni yod pa ma yin no// dper na shing chen me la ni// khyad ni yod pa ma yin// / 
16a7(rgyud 'grel): la// gang la reg pa tshig par byed// tsan dan ga bur la sogs kyi// 'bar ba'i me yis de bzhin tshig/ de phyir cung zad rtog pa ni// lta shes rnal 'byor pa yis spang // rigs pas
16a8(rgyud 'grel): brtags pas ma grub ste// dbang po'i yul la chags pa med// phyi nang sems la yod pa min// gzhan la gnas min bdag la min// dper na ma rtogs pa yis ni// ji ltar thog ni// 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): sprin las 'byung // de bzhin zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // zhon mongs la sogs sems las byung // bdag gi bdag zhing stong pa ste// dbang po rnams la rten yang med// de med sems ni yod
16b2(rgyud 'grel): mi na la// bems po 'brel pa ji ltar bsgrub// khyab bya dang ni khyab byed kyi// 'brel pa ha chang ches pa ste// skad cig gcig kyang bsgrub pa med// zhams kyi dbang du byas nas ni// byams dang 
16b3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje mdor bstan nas// ma grub pa yi sgo nas bshad// skad cig ma ni dang po la// zhe sdang skyes pa'i dus su ni// byams pa'i ming yang yod min la// byams pa skyes pa'i dus su ni// 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang mun pa yod min no// de la rtog pa gsum yin te// de rnams sems las 'byung bar shes// sems nyid de ni don dam du// lung las gsungs bzhin yod min no// rigs kyi bu/ 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): 'am rigs kyi bu mo// sems nyid sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra// de yi don ni 'di lta ste// dper na gcig dang du ma ni// sems nyid rang bzhin chos rnams mthong // de dag sems nyid sprul
16b6(rgyud 'grel): snam bu de na yod min no// de ltar dpe yi dbang du ni// sems nyid med la byams pa dang // snying rnga btang snyoms dga' sogs ni// de dag yod pa ma yin no// de la rigs pa'i
16b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang du ni// rgyu ni gcig gam tha dad dam// rgyu ni gcig pa yin na ni// thog mar zhe sdang skyes pa na// byams pa phyi nas skye mi rigs// 'on te byams pa sngon las ni// zhe sdang phyi/ 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): nas skyes pa 'am// yang na de gsum dus mnyam yin// yang na las kyi 'bras bu yin// mi rtag rnams la 'brel par 'byung // dper na ras b.las 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): bon la// ras bal ji ltar dmar po 'byung // de bzhin skad cig gcig lam ni// 'byung ba'i phung po rnams las kyang // gzhan dag rnams la las kyis 'brel// ji ltar rigs 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yod pa yis// de bzhin rang re rang 'dus la// 'brel pa yod par rig pa'o// byams pa'i dus su byams pa ste// rang 'dus 'byung ba zhe sdang la// ha cang skyon ni mi rigs 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): so// lhas sbyin byas pa'i las la ni// mchod sbyin la ni babrel pa med// de bzhin zhe sdang byams pa la// 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no// de ltar dgos pa ma rigs so// ma
17a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa ni ji ltar na// lhas sbyin mchod sbyin rigs la ni// phan tshun 'brel pa med pa'i phyir// dper na kim pa'i bar dag dang // nas dang 'bras kyi so ba bzhin// de bzhin skyes 
17a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phung po bzhin// gzhan dag phung pos 'brel pa med// de bzhin zhe sdang byams pa la// 'brel pa yod par mi rigs so// gal te sems nyid rgyun gcig na// 'brel pa 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): yod na rigs so zhes// dper na tshe grang bzhin du ni// phan tshun spangs pa'i 'gal ba yin// snga ma byams pa zhe sdang ni// rgyun ni gal te gsungs par rigs// grang ba yi ni reg 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): pa las// tsha ba'i reg pa 'brang bar 'gyur// de yi rgyu ni gzhan zer na// skad cig dang po'i gnas ni bsgrub// lus dang sems ngag ma gtogs pa// gzhan yang gang zhig yod 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): rmunasag shA snad// bral bdus pazhumasmras pas na// ngan 'bad par byu gas// 'bral ma sa stan / nas na 'jud// dan rnams 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal// de ma rigs pa 'di lta ste// phung ba khams dang skye mche de dag/ brtan dang khyab dang g.yo ba yi// de rnams spangs pa'i gzhan ma ni// bdag dang skyes bu phung po sogs// 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): mu stegs rnams kyis smras pa ni// sems ni spangs pa gzhan med de// de rnams sna tshogs mi rtag pa// gzhan rnams smras pas rtag pa'o// cha skyes pa la byams pa dang // snying 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs rgyun chad pas// thog ma tha ma mi dmigs so// gal te rtag na'ang sbyin to// sa bon myu gu dus gcig du// de phyir don dma' ngal byed kyi// tshad ma'i dbang du byas nas 
17b5(rgyud 'grel): nAM/ 'dug rten zhab tham babyed dang // dus dun nA dang 'bras bu dang // 'brel ba lasags gang tsug kyang // ma grub por ni gsungs par// mgrub pa gas pa ni// dang pa mi dang ruH 
17b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// gnyis kyi 'brel pa mgrub ste// sreg byed gsal ba'i mtshan nyid ni// du ba mun pa mi rigs so// rigs nas gsal ba med pa yi// me la skyon ni 'grel bar byed// gang zhing 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): dub ma yin na// mi rigs pa yi gsal ba skyon// bud rgyu med la me med pa'i// me ni shing la mi gnas ma// de phyir 'brel pa yod min no// yang na bdag zhid gcig pa dang // de la 
17b8(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i 'brel ba ste// de dag yod pa ma yin no// bdag zhid gcig pa'i 'brel yod na// phan tshun dgal ba'i skyon yin no// sems ni gsal bar byed pa bzhin// du ba de bzhin 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): thal ba'i skyon// de las 'byung ba'i 'brel yod na// mes ni sreg par byed pa la// du bas de bzhin bsreg par thal// du ba nag pa de bzhin du// me yang nag par 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): thal ba'i skyon// de phyir 'brel pa yod min la// dper na snam bu snal ma la// ji ltar 'brel pa yod min la// snam bu min la snal ma min// snal ma yin la snam bu min// snam bu 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): yin na thag pa min// bag pas ji ltar snam bu'o// de dag bar tshun 'gal ba yin// chos dang sangs rgyas 'brel pa med// dang por chos min sangs rgyas min// sangs rgyas yin na chos 
18a4(rgyud 'grel): min no// bskur ba min la ma skyes so// ma skyes pa la 'brel pa med// de bzhin pha dang bu la ni// lung dang rigs bzhin bshad par bya// rlung gi shugs can 'khor lo la// shar nub ji 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'grub pa med// pha dang bu la 'brel ba yang // de bzhin yod pa ma yin no// gal te kun rdzob bden pa la// 'di lta'i skyod ni yod min no// de la bdag ni kam pa la'i// med pa'i 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa 'di yin no// yod pa skye min yod pa'i phyir// dper na yod pa'i bum pa la// skyes bu'i rtsol bas skye mi nus// med pa de bzhin skye min te// rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa'i phyir// 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): dper na me long spu bzhin no// de bzhin yod dang med pa ye// rang las ma yin gzhan las min// ma skyes rang bzhin bdag zhi med// pha dang bu yang ji ltar 'grub// de dag grub pa med la 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): ni// pa dang bu yi tha snyad med// de yi tha snyad dbang du ni// dang po bu ni ma grub pa'i// pha yi tha snyad ji ltar 'byung // bu ni ma grub dus su ni// dus kyi mtshan nyid ma grub bo// de phyir/ 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): pha yi tha snyad dang // bu yi 'brel pa ga la yod// gal te gzhan dag dgongs pa ni// rigs pas brtags nam grub bzhin// yod med 'brel pa yod par 'dod// de la bdag gi 
18b2(rgyud 'grel): dgang sa dzi ni// ngal bdug ni gtsug pa'// de las 'byung ba 'al ba yang // bdag 'dag cag pa'i 'bral pa zad // tsa me tham thub byeng // dam pa 'byung ba 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// dper na mar ni 'o ma las// ji ltar 'byung yang shes par bya// khyod kyi 'du byas gang smras pa// skye 'jigs gnas so rim pa las// 'on te so sor gnas pa'o// de las 
18b4(rgyud 'grel): skye ba'i gnas su ni// 'jig dang gnas pa yod min no// de dag med pa'i skye ba med// 'brel pa ji ltar grub pa'o// gal te gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni// so sor gnas pa'i mtshan 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): du// 'bral pa sgyur 'grub pa'o// dngus pa kuzhis nam ldan// pa zhes pa dag sug la nga // sad cig dang ba pa yis ni// nus pa dngas myed de las na// de nyid 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bu zhes ni// tha snyad mi 'grub zhe na ni// de phyir gnyis ni ma grub na// de dag nyid kyis 'grub pa med// rgyu lta pha zhes ma grub kyang // 'bras bu bu ni grub po zhes// med pa yod par
18b7(rgyud 'grel): ma ba'i gyud// da byed mdus yang ba'i slar// dbyi ga la gru bzed dang // 'di mi rnapas smra nub po med// dadag de ltar mthub sa// 'phel par dbub brjin// 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): tsag de bzhin grub pa med// dper na myu gu se bon bzhin// myu gu med pa'i skyon la ni// gang la bltas nas sa bon bzhag/ myu gu la bltos smra zhe na// myu gu 'byung ba'i dus su ni// 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): sa bon de ni grub pa med// sa bon 'byung ba stobs med pa'i// nus pa 'bras bu sgrogs pa'o// de phyir sa bon ma grub ste// med pa de ni ji ltar 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): 'brel// yod pa de ni 'brel lo zhes// yod pa de ni ther zug bstan// dngos po can la 'bras bu med// khyab bya khyab byed ji ltar grub// ma grub pa ni dngos med de/ 
19a3(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dbyibs ni yod min no// de dag med pa de ltar gyis// dus kyi skad cig ma grub po// 'das pa'i dus na ma 'ongs pa// ma grub padag ni ma yin no// dpe dang de bzhin don 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): la ni// khyab byed bdag gi gang zag gi/ brtag pa de ni byed pa'o// khyab bya mtho ros ngan song la// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel pa'am// de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa yod/ 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): de las 'byung ba'i 'brel yod na// rtag pa byed pa'i ming can rnams// mtho ris ngan song bden pa mi// rtag pa byed par thal ba'i skyon// gal te ci phyir zhe na ni// bdag nyid 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): sa ni gcig pa'i phyir// dper na snam bu bum pas ni// mi rtag par ni bshad pa bzhin// dbang po'i don ni dngos po ste// bum pa'i gzugs ni yod par mthong // med pa'i 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ni mthong min te// de phyir gzugs mthong bum pa bzhin// de ltar smras pa mi rigs pa// bum pa dang ni dbang po dang // gcig gam 'on te mi gcig pa// gal te de nyi 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): mi gcig na// dbang po de ni 'brel med la// bum pa de ni mthong min la// gal te de dag gcig pa ste// dbang po med la bum pa min// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel ba med// 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): gal te dbang po med la ni// bum pa de ni yod ce na// de la de dag gcig pa med// mi gcig pa ni 'brel med do// de las 'byung ba'i 'brel zhe na// rtag par bdag nyid byed pa// 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): po// mtho ris ngan song 'byung bar thal// mtho ris ngan song de dag kyang // rtag par byed pa po las ni// 'byung bar thal ba'i skyon yin no// gal te 'brel pa med na yang // rtag
19b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gcig pu yin zhe na// don 'di sems can rnams kyis ni// gzhan don byed dam mi byed do// de ltar mi byed cen ni// rdo dang khyad par med par thal// gal te don ni byed do zhes// 
19b4(rgyud 'grel): rim gyis byed dam gcig car byed// de ni rim gyis byed ce na// rtag par nyams par thal ba'i ston// cig car byed do zhe na ni// bdag cig skyes pa'i dus su ni// 'gro drug 
19b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad skyes par thal// de bzhin rga shi skye 'gag sogs// ci rigs rnams dang 'brel bar bya// de skabs mu stegs rnams kyis ni// bdag med 'brel med lta ba 'dri// thams 
19b6(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa rigs kyi bu// phung po'i brel med bstan pa ste// phung po 'dil bdag med na// daM ltar gro 'dzin pa dang // du dang rol ma khyabs pas// de ltar bdag ca 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la na// rnam rtog 'byung ste stsol bar 'dod// phung por bdag ni yod min la// theg pa chen po'i rigs can ni// bdag med 'brel pa ji ltar rigs// bdag ni phung po 'ang 
19b8(rgyud 'grel): la ni// mu stegs yod pa ma yin no// yod pa dang ni med pa dang // de dag gnyis ni spu mi bya// bdag nyid yod par smra ba yin// med par de ni mi rigs so// gal te yod na/ 
20a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams la// gnas pa ji ltar mi mthong ngo // swa dang pags pa sen mo dang // mgo dang sha dang rus pa la// rkang dang tshil dang chub dang // mkhris 
20a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ni rgyu ma la// lag pa rkang pa la sogs la// phyi nang rnams pa gzhis su ni// lta zhing bdag med mi mthong ngo // de la mu stegs 'dri ba ni// bdag med mi gzugs ji 
20a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'brel// theg pa chen po'i rigs can ni// 'brel med de la 'di ltar smra// sha yi mig ni ha rdang mes// ye shes mig gis ma mthong ngo // kha dog dbyibs dang gnas 
20a4(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa'i// de ni ji ltar mthong ba'i rigs// de la mu stegs 'dri ba ni// 'o na de ni med do zhes// theg pa chen po'i rigs can smra// med pa'i tshig ni smra ba yis// yod 
20a5(rgyud 'grel): pa de ni mi rigs so// slar yang 'di ltar med na ni// tshad ma 'di rnams ji ltar mthong // sa dang me dang chu dang rlung // de rnams la brten rol mo'i tshogs// de phyir me ni 
20a6(rgyud 'grel): mi rigs so// yod pa de yang ma grub po// de la mu stegs 'di ltar smra// 'o na de rten gang yin na// theg pa chen po'i rigs can no// bdag med 'brel med ji ltar smra// 
20a7(rgyud 'grel): rten ni gang yang yod man no// mu stegs rgol ba 'di skad smra// ji 'am stong pa'i nam mkha' la// theg pa chen po 'di skad smra// rtags can de ni de bzhin smra// mu stegs 
20a8(rgyud 'grel): pa ni 'di skad smra// 'o na dngos po can rnams ni// du dang rgod dang rol mo'i tshogs// ji ltar shes par bya'o zhes// theg pa chen po 'di skad smra// sgyu ma dang ni rmi lam 
20b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // cho 'phrul gzhan du shes par bya// mu stegs pa ni 'di skad smra// sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam dang // theg pa chen po 'di skad smra// sgyu ma nam mkha' lta bu la// rmi 
20b2(rgyud 'grel): lam de ni 'dzin byed pa// tshe 'phrul de ni brdzun pa'o// yul dang yul can 'dus byas te// brjod bya'i yul ni ma grub bo// rtags can ji ltar phyag gis sogs// slar 
20b3(rgyud 'grel): yang kun rdzob mthong ba ni// don ni dam pa de bzhin no// kun rdzob ming can 'di lta ste// 'di na bdag dang gzhan dag dang // sems dang skyes bu phung po dang // tshor ba dang ni byed pa 
20b4(rgyud 'grel): po// nor dang bu dang lang tsho sogs// de dag don dam 'brel ba med// gang la bdag med gzhan med la// sems med skyes bu yod min la// byed po med la tshor ba med// nor

20b8(rgyud 'grel): dam byang chub tshad zhid la// 'jam pa ma yin mkhregs pa min// dro ba ma yin gsil ba min// rigs bya rigs ma ni 'dzin pa med// pra dang rags pa ma yin te// byang chub 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi mtshan zhid do// mu stegs mthong min sgom las 'das// dngos med mthong min bsgom med pa'i// gsal dang mi gsal zhing dang bral// 'brel med de ni byang 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems// thams cad rgya mtsho'i chu bur 'dra// snying po med la sbub bzhin// rtag min bdag med sgyu ma ltar// ri dgas smig rgyu lta bul// rdzas bum pa bzhin du ni// cho 'phrul rnams kyis bkang 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): bal// dbus su 'khor lo stong grub min// de ltar don dam kun rdzob ni// de dag ji ltar 'brel pa grub// sems rtog rmi lam lta bu la// sems ni yod min nam mkha' ltar// re zhig sems zhid 
21a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'brel// slob dpon kam pa la'i 'brel med kyi lta ba 'di// rnal 'byor rtogs tshad kyi lta ba rdzogs s+ho// // bla ma rat+na pa la rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o// 6/ zhen med kyilta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs pa/

21a8(rgyud 'grel): byin// lha drug dbus kyi bres su bcug/ rmugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul// rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bon// 'jig rtenan ni yod ma yin// bla ma lung gi ral gri thogs// tshangs 
21b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas drug steng du 'gro// rta pa ba dag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni// 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin// brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul// phyogs bcu dag tu rgyugs pas kyang // de yi rta//

25a1(rgyud 'grel): naM// de yi mtshan nyid rtog med na// bdag gis ji ltar bstan par byas// d+ha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sas// tsaM phyir zhen de yin// bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/

26a1(rgyud 'grel): dang phung po dag pa'i phyir// dbyangs can bcu drug longs spyod bsgom// de rnams zhir 'gyur sI bo ru// bdag nyid bsrung ba'i man ngag go/ bcu drug thig le rab tu 'bar//

26a3(rgyud 'grel): yin// ya nas brtsams nas ha yi bar// mi rig ming can brgyad yin no// bsdus pa A phreng kA phreng gnyis// sprul pa'i 'khor long bsam par bya// nyi ma'i 'od kyis dros tsam na//

26b1(rgyud 'grel): chen 'khor le ru// sgo nga'i khog pa lta bu yi// byang chub sems la sems gtad nas// bo la'i rtsel rgyal po tsam// gsal la sran rdog tsam du bsgom// bde chen sgo nga'i rtsa la ni// byang chub

27a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig par ni 'dres par 'gyur// g+ho ra kha ni sgra gcan gyis// zhim zos pa ngo mtshar che// rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba// slob dpon g+hor khas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar/

31a2(rgyud 'grel): yi// hUM gi dkyil du bathe bo tshang// Da yig dkar 'od lta bu ni// de yi spyi bor gnas par bsam// hUM las byung ba'i 'od zer ni// ting 'dzin sems dpa'i snying ga ye// kha sbyor nam mkha'
