31a4(rgyud 'grel): nye bar sbyor ba las// a ni ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa nyid// zag le'i ngo bo yo ge med// gzhes dang gnyis min zhi bzhid// nam mkha' lta bur drim 
31a5(rgyud 'grel): med// 'di lta bu ni mgrin par bsgom// gzhis kyang 'od zer gcig la spro// dub me khyer mar me'i nang // mkha' snang dang ni smig rgyu'o// kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer ni// dbang po'i gzhu 
31a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra'i ngo bo nyid// rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang // pad+ma gar dbang rdo rje rgyal// rdong sems drug pa he ru ka/ mgrin par bsdus te rnam par gnas// de ltar bla med rgyud rnams la// bsnyen pa'i 
31a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' gsum gyis ni// bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag zhal gyi lung // rim pa ji bzhin bshad byas nas// da ni rnal 'byor rgyud bzhin du// bsgrub pa'i zhal ga dmas bshad par bya// 
31a8(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rgyud du dbang thob pa'i// shes rab ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bde bar stan la 'dug byas la// oM I hUM gis sems dpa' ni// gsum gyi don la 'di ltar brtsa ma/ thog 
31b1(rgyud 'grel): mar rdo rje skyil krung bcas// ting 'dzin rgyal bcas sna rtser lha// oM AHhUM ni brjod byas pas// gnas gsum du ni rnam par bsam// de nas so so'i kha dog gi/ 'od zer lcags kyu 
31b2(rgyud 'grel): lta bu ni// spros pas sangs rgyas sras bcas rnams// mdun gyi nam mkhar spen drang zhing // de la lnga'am bdun pas mchod// gsum la skyabs 'gro la sogs bya// de nas sprin bral nam 
31b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la// gnas pa'i skar ma lta bu ni// yig brgya'i sngags ni 'di yin to// oM shrI badz+ra la sogs pa// de nas 'di lta'i sngags brjod bya// oM dang swa b+ha ba shud+d+haH// sarba d+harma sa 
31b4(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ba// shud+d+ho he zhes brjod byas pas// skar ma ltar gsal dag par bsam/ oM dang tsit+ta pra ti be// d+hA dang ka ro mo brjod pas// de la nam mkhar hUM las ni// sna tshogs pad+ma bsam 
31b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nis yi ge oM gyis ni// nam mkhar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de yi steng du A brjod pas// rang nyid skar ma ltar gsal ba// zla ba'i steng du rnam par bsam// de rjes oM 
31b6(rgyud 'grel): dang b+ho d+hi tsita// ta dang ut+sA ta yA mi// brjod de rang zhid yi ge A// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// de yi rang bzhin gsal ba yi// byang chub kyi ni sems yin pas// 'gro/ 
31b7(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams la khyab byed cing // gsal bar byed pa'i bdag zhing bsam// de rjes gsum pa yi ge ni// haM zhes brjod pas spyi bo yi// tshangs pa'i bu gar hUM bsams la// de las byung ba'i rdo rje 
31b8(rgyud 'grel): ni// rtse lnga pa ni rnam bsams te// brtan byed sngags 'di brjod par bya// oM dang tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM// de zhu ba las rdo rje sems// bdag nyid 'di yi rigs can ni// yin par yang ni rab 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): / bsams te// zhal gcig phyag gzhis sku mdog dkar// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// de la shI ni dpal gyi don// de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod// de ltar oM 
32a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi yi ge yis// dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bstan// yang na 'di ltar shes par bya// oM ni zla ba'i de steng du// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// de yi dbus kyi rtse mo la// dbyangs 
32a3(rgyud 'grel): yig dang po las byung ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar// zhal phyag la sogs snga ma bzhin// de ni oM ste dam tshig sems// thog mar dge ba bkra shis pa'o// da ni ting 'dzin 
32a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' ni// sgom pa rnam par brtsam par bya// oM dang ya ta te ta thA// ga ta ta thA he zhes pa// brjod pas mdun du hUM sngon bsam// de byung 'khor lo bcu drug rtsibs// de yi 
32a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus 'byung rdo rje ni// rgya gram de dbus pa las kyang // sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// de yi ge sar steng du ni// hUM 'byung rdo rje sems dpa' bsam// de nas shar gyi 'dab ma/ 
32a6(rgyud 'grel): la// tshangs yig dang po bres pa yi// mA me mu'u'i sngags brjod pas// rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i// mi skyed mgon po bsam par bya// rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i// rin 
32a7(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan g.yas 'dab la// oM dang badz+ra satwa tre// no pa tiSh+Tha brjod pas so// oM dang dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba// brjod pas rgyab dkyil bad 'dab la// sa bon las byung 'od dpag 
32b1(rgyud 'grel): me b+ha ba// brjod pas rang gi sa bon las// rdo rje sems dang 'a skum dog dkar// zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yon du gzigs// phyag gnyis dkur brten gtso dang mtshungs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje 
32b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bang // bden bral o dang su po N+ya// me b+ha ba brjod rags can ma// sa bon las byung sku mdog ser// phyag g.yon sngar bzhin g.yas pa yis// rin chen 'dzin cing g.yon du gzigs// rlung 
32b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba sid+d+him+me// pra yats+tsha brjod tshe sa ma dmar// g.yas pad g.yon pa snga ma bzhin// g.yon du gzigs te dbang ldan du// rig byed tshig gi dang po dang // sarba karma su tsa me// tsit+ta shre 
32b4(rgyud 'grel): ku ru brjod// sa bon las byung las ma ni// ldangs ser sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas// phyag g.yon mthun lagayon du gzigs// yum bzhi'i dbu rgyan rigs kyi bdag/ de rjes 'khor lo'i rtsibs 
32b5(rgyud 'grel): la ni// dbang ldan las brtsams g.yon skor du// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// sems dpa' bcu drug rim bzhin bskyed// hUM ha ha ha ha ho b+ha// ga bAn badz+ra satwa ni// kun la khyab par 
32b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i tshig/ ma ni 'dren pa'i don yin te// me ni bdag tu rnam par bshad// muny+dzu 'dzin par brjod cig pa'o// de phyir bdag ni zung la drongs// khyad par byung ba rdo rje sems// sku mdog 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu g.yon du gzigs// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa// g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten te// pad+ma'i gdan la brten pa'o// badz+rI las rdo rje rgyal po ser// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon lcags kyu// kha/ 
32b8(rgyud 'grel): cig g.yas pa lugs kyu ste// phyag g.yon dkur ni brten pa 'chad// sa byung chags pa sku mdog dmar// g.yas mda' g.yon ni gzhu 'dzin pa'o// sbru las legs pa margad mdog 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): skyabs sprin g.yas lagayon dkur brten// zla byung rdo rje rin chen ser// dbang bsrung phreng ba gnyis kyis 'dzin// galas rdo rje zhi ma dmar// snying gar phyag gzhis zhi mar 'dzin// 
33a2(rgyud 'grel): ban las rgyal mtshan nam mkha'i mdog/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni// phyag gnyis kyis ni 'dzin pa'o// ma byung bzhad pa sun+ta re// mngag can rgyal mtshan sa yis ni// phrer bas mtshan pa 
33a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// hA las chos ni dkar dmar mdog/ g.yon gyi pad sdong g.yas kyis 'byed// sa 'byung rnon po gung gum mdog/ phyag g.yon po ti ga yas ral gri/ ma las byung ba'i rdo rje rgyu/ 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): mdag sang ma chis 'dzangaH// yalas rdorje 'ad bang dag dmang // ga yan drug yas pas spre' na pa// salas rdo rjelas ltung mer // phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa// ga ri skabs kyis nam+b+ha 
33a5(rgyud 'grel): bor 'dzin// tra las bsrung bsku mdog ser// gnyis kyis rdo rje po cha 'dzin// tra byung rdo rje gnod sbyin nag/ phyag gnyis kyis ni zhal phyogs su// mche 'dzin bdud rnams 'jigs byed rgyu// 
33a6(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje khung tshur dkar // rdo rje 'ching dbyed gnyis kyis 'dzin// da ni hUM gi rang bzhin can// ting 'dzin sems dpar shes par bya// a naM ye shes sems dpa' ste// de yi sbyor 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya// phyag rgya snga ma la gnas nas// rdo rje lugs kyu'i phyag rgya la so// 'od zer spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// oM shrI badz+ra satwa dang // sa ma yo haM zhes brjod pas// dam tshig sems dpa' 
33a8(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid bsam// sa ma ya swA zhes brjod pas// rang mdun nam mkhar zla dkyil la// gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dgug/ yang ni sa ma ya s+tha zhes// ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes 'theg 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): de yang mdun gyi nam mkha' la// zla steng a ni dkar po yi// ngo bor zhugs pa'i ye shes sems// bkug ste gtso bo'i thugs kar bstim// yang na phyag rgya snga ma yis// 'di lta'i rdo rje 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dgug/ a ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// hUM ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa// de yi dbus kyi rtse mo la// oM ni ye shes sems dpa' ste// de nyid rdo rje sems dpas bshad// rtse mo bzhi 
33b3(rgyud 'grel): la rigs bzhi ste// mtshams bzhir lha mo rnam pa bzhi// 'od kyi tshul du rnam par gnas// de nas zla ba rdo rje la// rdo rje hUM ni oM la ste// de la rtse bzhi'i 'od dbus la// mtshams kyang dbus 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): la thim pa dang // de ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' la// thim par gyur par rnam pasam bya// de ni dam tshig sems dpa' la// de yang gnyis med don du bshad// de rjes yi ge hUM gyur 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): pas// rdo rje lce ni rdo rje yi// 'od zer spro bar rnam bsam bya// de yis phyi nang dag byas nas// bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur te// de rjes bzlas pa ci nus bya// bzlas pa'i rig pa 'di
33b6(rgyud 'grel): wA ste/ oM shrI badz+ra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pa la ya// badz+ra satwa tre no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-iD+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su ba Sh+To me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): karma su tsa me/ tsit+ta shwe yeHku ru tA/ ha ha ha ha ho b+ha ga bA ra/ badz+ra satwa mA me muny+tsa/ badz+rI b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH// / des ni dam tshig bsrung bar ga sungs// yi 
33b8(rgyud 'grel): ge brgya pa btus pa yis// sgo nas sems dpa' gsum gyi don// sgrub thabs dge ba gsum ldan pa// rnal 'byor rgyud dang mthun par bstan// da ni bya ba'i rgyud gsungs pa'i// 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' gsum gyi sbyang ba brtsam// zab mar rnal 'thung dbang phyugags// zung za lnga yang rgyal bya// rdo rjes sngags ni 'di ltar brjod// oM maN+Di d+hAr 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rId+hi/ ma hA tha ti sa re/ rak+Sharat+na b+hU d+hU pa~M Da paT swA hA// // lus kyi dkyil 'khor ba sgom byas la// de rjes byabs sogs dran byas nas// mdun dul ma skyes gru bzhi ste/ 
34a3(rgyud 'grel): de dbus sna tshogs pad+ma bsam// de ste oM las byu de ba yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam// ut+pal phyag rgyas bkug pa yi// ut+pal rigs brgya bsam par bya// 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): phyug r+b+ha de ni dmachog go/ sems dpar yang na rnam par bshad// de rjes ye shes sems dpa' ni// sngags 'di yis ni dgug par bya// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti/ prA sa 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): tsi d+ha yaM ku ru a/ pu dzaM gr-ih+Na/ a tra san+na hi to b+hA ba/ 'di brjod aM ku'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa'ang spyan drang bya// da ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' yi// 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba 'di ltar shes par bya// oM b+ha ga ba ti sa ma ye shwa ri sarba bud+d+ha ma te/ ta re a tiSh+Tha nA'u me ku ru swA hA// taM yig hUM gis brgyan pa las// byung ba'i sgrol ma ldang gu/ 
34a7(rgyud 'grel): ni// zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum ste// mi bskyod pa yi dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams kyis ni legs par smras// ga yas zhal dkar la ga yon zhal gnag/ g.yas/ 
34a8(rgyud 'grel): gsum phyag mtshan rim par ni// ma 'jigs sbyin dang mda' dang ni// rdo rje rtse lnga rnam par 'dzin// g.yon gsum rim bzhin sdigs mdzub dang // gzhu dang ut+pal shes 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// pAd+ma'i steg r+b+ha'i bzhugs skabs kyis// mkha' lding lnga la brten pa'o// dbus kyi mkha' lding dkar po ste// lag pa gnyis 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bum pa 'dzin// g.yas su nag dang ser po ste// g.yon pa ldang dang dmar po yang // rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// de ni ting 'dzin sems dpar bshad// rang
34b3(rgyud 'grel): lus la ni rnam dag dad// yi ge gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs// oM dkar skye bo'i gtsug tu ste// 'dzin par AHyig dmar po bsam// hUM nag snying ga'i pad+ma ru// de ltar rang lus 
34b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pas pabya// sa pan rnams la lags bskur ba'i// yaM ge brgya pa bzlas par bya// oM b+ha ga ba tit+tA re// sa ma yam nu pA la ya// tA ra ka twe no pa ti// dr-in+tu ma~M b+ha ba/ swa 
34b5(rgyud 'grel): ts+yai me b+ha ba/ a nurak+ta me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi mi tha yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa maM/ tsad+b+ha shI yeHku ru hU~M/ ha ha he ha ho b+ha ga ba tI badz+ra tA re mA me muny+dza t+tA ra// b+ha ga ba 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ya satwa aH// / 'di ltar me sgo'i bar du bzla// sA naM lam rgya chen btab byas la// i gar+dz+dza traM bud+d+ha gir yang pun rag ma na ya s+t+wa~M/ dza hUM baM hiHzhes bya ba'i don ni oM khyed na 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rnas gnas su gshegs// slar yang 'thun par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o// d+h+r-i kis dgug cing / yis gshegs// be byis bcings shing hoHsa dgyes pa'o// / 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): ltang bya ba'i drung ma ri// brten pa'i sems dpa' ga sum ngan bai shad// dan nu yi theg pa la so// zags pa'i sems dpa' dan bshad bya// / yang nag cag kyang ldan pa pa kya / 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten tshe sa la blo ldog ste// rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su// bde bar stan la 'dug nas su// 'di ltar bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba tsam// dang por maN+Dal la sogs bsham// 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed sngon du song ba yis// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ skyabs kyi dam pa bla med pa'i// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// zhes brjod lus yid sbyor ldan bya// 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): des ni byang chub sems dpa' yi// dge bsnyen du ni mi 'gyur te// de rjes byang chub sems bskyed de// bdag dang tha mi dad pa yis// byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms kyang ni 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// de yi rjes la bla ma la// dad pa bskyed de dad pa bsgom// de ltar byas pas 'bras bu ni// 'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur te// bar chad rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // gdams ngag/ 
35a5(rgyud 'grel): don ni rnam pa gnyis// bsgom dang de bzhin bzlas pa'o// sgom don dang po mal nas langs byas te// de rjes dkon mchog gsum ni rjes dran bya// de nas bdag nyid thog mar khrus byas te// rang 
35a6(rgyud 'grel): gi lag mthil g.yon par oM las ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de yi steng du hrIH// de las byung ba 'o ma'i mdog can gyi// bdud rtsi'i chu bas ma oM hIHswA hA yi// byin gyis brlab bya chu dang rang 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi de la// dbang bskur tshul du sngags 'di brjod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ge ta// a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hA// zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod ranganyide spyi bor gtor// bsgrub pa'i gnas 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): la soT la gtor bar bya// de rjes yi ge gsum gnas gsum du dgod// spyi bor tshangs pa'i yi ge dkar po ste// mgrin par ye shes yi ge AHdmar bsam// khro yige sngon po snying ga'i 
35b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su dgod// de ni sems dpa' rnam pa gsum du bshad// de yi man ngag khro yig pAd+ma ste// a ni zla ba rig byed dang po'i tshig/ bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yin zhes bsam// de ni
35b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum bsrung zhing dag pa'o// de rjes shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas la// gser sogs snod du chu ni gtsang ma lham// shar gyi phyogs su nam mkhar hUM yig bsam// de gyur las 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): byung pad+ma'i ge sar la// a las zla ba de yi rigs skyes mtshon// de steng rnam snang yig gyur nyi dkyil 'khor// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur rnam par bsam// zla dbus bcom ldan 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): shIka thub chos 'chang rgya// zhe 'ong thub dang gnyis su med par bsam// de yi rjes la gsang sngags 'di brjod de/ oM na mo ta thA ga ta s+ya phaT phaT/ mISh+TaM anaN+Da pa na/ pra yats+tsha me 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): swA hA// me tog re blangs sngags re brjod byas pas// sngar bshams chu la zhi shu rtsa gcig dor// yang ni rig pa de nyid brjod byas le// snga ma'i me tog re re blangs nas kyang // ma nA la 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs phyogs sugatsang mar ni// bcom ldan shAkya thub la dbul bar bya// de rjes dpal ldan yi ge brgya pa ni// mi skyo'i yid kyis ci nus bzlas par bya// oM b+ha ga bA ti mu na ye sa 
35b7(rgyud 'grel): ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ shAkya mu ni tre no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tset+taM shre ye/ 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga bA na shAkya mu ni mA me muny+tsa/ bud+d+ha b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa a// / de ni thog mar gti mukaM yi ge la// bar du sgra gcan tha mar dbyangs 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): yig las// yi ge a ste sems dpa' gsum du grags// de rjes dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo byas te// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa gshegs su gsol bar bya// rig gnas 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga la mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang // spyad par rtogs dka' rdo rje 'chang gi dngos// rtsa ba'i grub chen lU yi nas brgyud pa// gdams pa phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpa' gsum// 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrib thabs slob ma mchog gi gsol btab ngor// bla ma'i gdams pa bum rgyun legs 'thungs pa// brtson shugs 'bar ba'i snying rjes sna drangs te// zhams chung bzung 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): byer rin chen phreng bar bsdebs// ji srid thub pa'i bstan pa gnas bar du// mtha' khob phyogs su dar cing rgyas gyur cig/ rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyi 
36a5(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa'i thabs// slob dpon nA ro pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ rat+na mA la nA ma/ bod skad du/ rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba// dpal he ru ka la phyag 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// mgon po kun gyi bdag nyid ni// dngos po'i rang bzhin ma grub pa'i// za ma rje la phyag 'tshal nas// rin chen phreng ba bshad par bya// sgom dang sgom rgyu rnal 'byor 
36a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi// rtog pa de ni bden pa min// bden gnyis grub pa med pa'i phyir// sgom la brten par mi bya'o// chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin zhing // gang yang rang bzhin rtogs pa de// 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba rang rig gnyis su med// bla ma dam pa'i dgongs pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa'i shes rab ni// phyag rgya tha ma'i gdams ngag bcas// za zhing rang rgyud ye shes kyi/ 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): ma rdzogs pa yi skad cig la// yang dag grub par mi 'gyur ro// bla ma gnyis pa'i dgongs pa'o// rnam par rtog pa bden pa min// rtog med rjes su 'brel pa yi// rim 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnam rtog rnams dang bral// dper na tha gu'i sbrul 'dzin te// rnal 'byor rtog med bde ba che// bla ma gsum pa'i dgongs pa'o// ma rig pa yi snang ba 'di// rang rig ye 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rtogs 'gyur na// rmi lam nyin mo'i snang ba rnams// mnyam pa nying du don rtogs pas// tshor ba tsher byed gnyis su med// gnyis dang gnyis min spangs pa yi// gang 
36b4(rgyud 'grel): la mi gnas rnal 'brur // shes rab pha rol sbyin ma yin// bla ma bzhi pa'i dgongs pa'o// bdag nyid sha la'i dgongs pa ni// dmigs med snying rje'i rnal 'byor pa// 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhis 'dzin gnyis med don rtogs can// zab mo'i chos nyid la gnas pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob 'gyur// rtog pa dang bral dri ma med// rnal 'byor rol pa'i lta spyod ni// 
36b6(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs 'gyur na// bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis med rtogs// de ltar rtogs pas rang grol 'gyur// rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba// slob dponas 
36b7(rgyud 'grel): la a lis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / 6/ maung rje skam pa'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ ku ru Na a d+hiSh+ThA na b+ha ba na nA ma/ bod skad du/ snying 
36b8(rgyud 'grel): rje sgom pa'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba// bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma'i byin brlabs thob gyur pas// skad cig gcig la mnyam par rtogs// rgud sde 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la mi gsal bas// snying rje sgom pa'i nyams len bshad// rnal 'byor de nyid dran byas nas// mtshan bcas mtshan med rang bzhin gyi// snying ga'i dbus su thig le 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): ni// mar ba'i rab rib bsal gyur pa// zla rtsi'i steng du bsam par bya// rang bzhin bdag po rol mdzad pa// drag po'i gzi brjid phreng bas brgyan// he ru ka dpal mgon po che// bdud 
37a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi las ni rnam par rgyal// lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod gnas// bde ba chen po dga' ba'i mchog/ ro myang longs sku byang sems ldan// yi ge rgya med yang dag gsungs// lha sgom phreng 
37a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags mtshams gcod dang // sbyin bsreg klog sogs dgos pa med// rtog pa rnams ni spang byas nas// 'jigs med snying rje ba myed byas la// slob ma dang ni bdag nyid kyi// snying 
37a5(rgyud 'grel): gar bsgoms pas ye shes ni// thams cad mkhyen dang mnyam par 'gyur// de nyid rtogs pas yang dag phrad// rdzu 'phrul bzhi dang sa bcu thob// nam mkhar spyod de mi snang 'grub// skye
37a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dran zhing rang sems rtogs// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar ni// rang rig gzhan rig thams cad kye// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ltar// sna tshogs sems kyi rang bzhin gyi// nyams 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes rnal 'byor grub pa thob// snying rje sgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba// slob dpon te lo pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yA na a ba ta ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ theg pa
37a8(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i gnas lugs gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid ni// bde chen rgya mtsho'i bdud rtsi yis// mtha' dbus mnyam pa'i 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): tshad nad sel// dga' ba che la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// shes dang shes bya'i ye shes ni// gzhan la phan phyir rang la ni// bdag gis gtan la dbab/ 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// 'dzin dang 'dzin bya'i rig pa ni// so so'i las dang rnam par ldan// dngos po gzugs can 'ching ba'i rgyu// phyi dang nang gi gzugs med pas// de nyid ma grub gnyis med
37b3(rgyud 'grel): do// gang zhig 'dzin pa gzugs yin te// 'dzin pa med pas de nyid do// de ni dam pa'i ye shes te// lhun grub pa dog dbyibs dang bral// mkhas pa rnams kyis rang rig rtogs// /

37b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i shes rab bo// rdzogs pa'i rim dang lha sgrub sogs// rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pas kyang // de nyid don dam ye shes min// don dam ye shes stobs kyis ni// 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i lha ni grub par 'gyur// de phyir bdag ni rdo khan+tis// tho man rnams kyi yul min pa// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med bshad// theg pa chen po'i gnas lugs gtan la

38a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa bsal ba'i phyir// bdag gzhan rnams kyi don du sems la phan pa'i gros 'debs bya// 'dod pa pAd+ma'i chu ltar rig nas sems nyid kye// bla med lta
38a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom 'bras bu khyod kyis dran par gyis// de yis dpal ldan zhal mthong gnyis med don rtogs te// de phyir nyams len brtson pas phyag rgya chen po thob pa'i phyir// sna tshogs
38a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs skra sogs la ma chags mazhin na// 'khor bar mi gnas rgya med mya ngan 'das pa thob// pAd+ma bzhin mdzes mngon sum mig gi dbang po dang // sgra brnyan rna ba nyams shing 
38a4(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid rmongs 'gyur bas// kye ma zhe sdang phrag dog dug ni ci phyir 'dzin// swa dkar gnyer ma la sogs khyod kyis mthong gyur kyang // yongs su 'chol ba'i zhen pas nyes pa skyon 
38a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis bcings// rab 'bring tha ma'i spyod lam 'dod chags zhe sdang gis// mkhas btsun mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyam// yi dgas lha min dud 'gro la sogs sdug

38a7(rgyud 'grel): bral sdug bsngal mchi ma rgya mtsho bas kyang lhag/ dur khrod gnas kyi keng rung bsags par dang mnyam// 'dod pa'i rma byung 'khrugs pa'i khrag ni mtsho dang 'dra// kye ma sems kyi rgyal

38b1(rgyud 'grel): srid phan par gyis// 'khor ba'i 'dam la bying 'gyur thar pa shin tu dka'// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du 'bod tsha grang sreg cing btsir// sed pas phrag dog yi dgas bkres skom skye 
38b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur la// snying rje'i gnas tho bdud 'gro phan tshun zhe sdang che// lha yang gnas nas lhun 'gyur me rnams sdug bsngal mang // de ltar 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal khyod kyis dran byas la/

60b1(rgyud 'grel): daklog par bya// mar sar blangs nas tho rangs bza'// zhag ni bdun nas rtags 'byung ste// bdun gnyis gyur nas nyi 'od ldan// bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig nas// 'bras bu nad sel lus yang ngo // lo drug/ 
60b2(rgyud 'grel): ni bza' bdung gis// rngam rtog bral zhing tshe 'grub po// tho rangs mu ze srang phyed ni// yungs ker mar khus btul nas bza'// shu ba'i nad sel tshe 'grub 'gyur// sprin nag zhi 
60b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sbrul dmig pa'i// khubs mnyes nas gang bar bya// zhu rjes drug cu'i 'bras chan btang // 'o ma btung zhing cha snga spang // lo gcig sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur // 'bring g+ha ra dza'i 
60b4(rgyud 'grel): byol ni// mar dang sbrang gi N+DI sbyar nas// mAM mang dag la bza' bar b+ha// sbrang zung bcud can kha zas bkar// thab drug tu zas 'gyur ni// nad rnams sol cing nyis brgya thug/ 
60b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu gsum dang lugs bye dang // de bzhin 'bring gar dza dang // ru d+ha dang ni cha mazhim skye// 'azeng d+ha'i khubs l-I gar sbyar// grib skams byed ma bza' bar bya// 
60b6(rgyud 'grel): padang ni sngo spang sarba// lo gnyis kyis ni 'grub 'gyur ro// lcags kyi lhung bzed mar gyis bkang // lha shing rtsa ba'i shun lags na// zhib btags sbyar la logacig 
60b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ gza' skang bzang po'i dus su bzhinu// yi dam yo ba zhen pa bskyal// ra yi 'o ma btung bar bya// zla bo gsuman ga nyer mdangs// zla ba drug nas rlung 
60b8(rgyud 'grel): shugs ldan// log cig sbyor bas tshe 'grub bo// 'bras bu gsum dang 'bri ngo gA'i phye// mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar la bza'// sman nyid zhu ba'i dus su naM// 'o ma 'bras 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): bskol bza' bar bya// mig rnond med sum brgya thub// tho rangs a ru gnyis dag dang // nyi ma phyed la ba ru ste// zhag dus skyu ru bzhi dag bza'// drug cu'i 
61a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras dang 'o ma yi// rnal 'byor kha zas ci nus btang // skra dkar gnyer ma nad med pas// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug nad med ldan// bya khyung lta bur mig rno 'gyur// 'bras bu gsum 
61a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi lde gu ni// lcags kyi snod la bskus byas la// zhin mtshan gnyis ni khrus byas nas// mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar lo bza'// lo gcig sbyor bas sum brgya thub// nad byang so dang sen mo 
61a4(rgyud 'grel): brje// ko ki l-i lta bu'i skad ldan 'gyur// de bIr bdag nyid ko ka la grags// tshe bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba// slob dpon ko ki las mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// 
61a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bi Sha nai bar+Na b+ha ban ne kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dug sel sgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyi dang nang gi dug bzhi'i rtsa ba
61a6(rgyud 'grel): ni// sems can rnams kyi srog gcod 'khyams pa'i rgyu// de rnams sel thabs zhal nas zhal brgyud pa// a raM bdag gis bsgom lugs bshad// thog mar nang gi dug
61a7(rgyud 'grel): sel bzhi rnams la// zhe sdang gnyen po bdag gzhan grub med la// chags pa'i gnyen po mi gtsang rang lus sman// nga rgyal gnyen po 'di dag mi rtag pa// phrag dog 'dus 
61a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nad ni sang byas nas// gti mug gnyen po bla ma lha nyid dang // rnal 'byor tshad med bzhi ni bsgom par bya// de yis bdag gzhan nad sel nad med 'grub// phyi ltar tshad 
61b1(rgyud 'grel): med 'bras bu rang snying dbus// tha yig dkar po pa tshan lnga pas brgyan// ye shes bya khyung phyag rdor snying por ldan// bdud kyi gdan la haM sa'i bya khyung ste// hUM 'byung sna tshogs gser// 
61b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi gshog pa can// dbu skra bcas pa'i khyung zhal dmar po ste// rwa gnyis nyi zla'i thig le dag gis brgyan// pus mo ser la brang dang lte ba dkar// 'jigs byed klu rgyal rnams
61b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa bsgom// zhal nas hUM sa'i bdud rtsi dkar ser 'dzag/ ha phus zhal nas dug gi rlangs pa 'thul// de ltar bsgoms shing sngags kyi klu nying blang // oM a ra had Ta/ 
61b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hu dza'i// blo sa'i phyagakA/ rA'i/ b+his na sa'i/ d+ya si~M b+h+re D+gakA pa la/ !k+ShakhA b+his na'i/ b+h+rUMs g+b+hiN/ sa sems te/ AT+Tar+yA ta b+hAn+d+ha/ b+han bA ye sa li ye/ b+hU bsnyen/ ked+d+heH 
61b5(rgyud 'grel): e la drASh+Ti la DaH/ a rba ka'i/ tsan+ti tsan+d+re b+his Ne/ u ba ra d+ha ti/ a thakA'i kAr/ dz+r-i dzAM b+h+r-ih+mAn+tu/ dz+r-i dzA yaM/ as pa yaM Na maM/ dzA g+ha la~M/ b+hi saM kha nA~M/ b+hA sa paM wa maM/ leg 
61b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzA NaM ka rau yi/ d+hA b+he khe/ b+hI seN pi Na bib+hU'i/ ti ni bye la/ e a i/ hi hi/ ri ri/ sid+d+ha dza ga li/ ra hA ri rak+Shi dza yis swA hA// dug gis zin pa'am sbrul gyis 
61b7(rgyud 'grel): rmugs pa la// rna bar glu len chu bzlas byin pa yis// skad cig gcig la dug nad sel bar 'gyur// da ni bskyed rim rdzogs rim 'di ltar bsgom// bde chen nam mkhar saM 
61b8(rgyud 'grel): ste ha yig gis// zla bi'i thig le dkar la gdas ltar bsil// nam mkha'i dbyings nas bdud rtsi'i 'od zer ni// dkar ser 'dzags te khong stong lus stong dag/ rkang la 
62a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa'i phyi nang drug rnams ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pas sel 'gyur the tshom med// bla tshes dkar po thig les brgyan pa ni// sems zhing bdud rtsi'i dbus 
62a2(rgyud 'grel): su dkar mar ltar// snying ga'i kha sbyong par dbus sbyor byed na// de yis phyi nang dug sel byang chub sgrub// byi yi dug rnams sel ba'i smad sbyar ni// mtshan mo'i sman ni srung 
62a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig 'o mar bskol// dug sen rnams la btang bas dug 'dren no// mtshan mo ma dang sbrul dmigs thang bskol te// lo drug sbyor dug rnams ni sel 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dis 
62a4(rgyud 'grel): ni ras la lan bdud bzlas// dug can dad pa de yis bkab byas nas// de nas chu yi snod la rkang lag bcug/ sngags 'di bzlos shing zab cing gdab// oM na ma sha ba rA naM// 
62a5(rgyud 'grel): sha ba ri ku ma ra ka naM/ khu khu ri/ sar sar/ pa tre pra b+hi shud+d+ha/ g+ha raM swA hA// de ltar bzlas shing byang chub sems bsgom mo// gdams ngag 'di bstan dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis// 
62a6(rgyud 'grel): gang thob de yis 'gro drug sems can thams cad kyi// nyon mongs sgrib pa dag cing byang chub sems// dri med mkha' ltar phyag rgya chen po thob par shog/ dug sel bsgom pa'i 
62a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a raM gis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya grar skad du/ a dra ya ni rI ka b+ha ba nA kra maM/ bod skad du/ gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i 
62a8(rgyud 'grel): rim pa// gnyis med bde chen la phyag 'tshal lo// mazham pa nyid kyi klong dkyil du// myos par dbyings su rin chen stor// kye ma rigs zhams ngo mtshar che// 
62b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam zhing gnas su gnyis med 'gyur// bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas// ni la khanas mtshams su 'joms// bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas// dge sbyong gis ni mtshams su 'joms/ 
62b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med sems ni gnyis med 'gyur// mkha' yi bdag nyid mgul nas 'khyud// bdag gzhan rje ba'i khyad par byas// gzhan 'dun thams cad brlag par bya// da ni bdag gis ma rtogs
62b3(rgyud 'grel): pas// ni la khan+d+has mtshams su 'joms// de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas// dge sbyong gis ni mtshams su 'joms// gzhon nu lo ni bcu gnyis ma// ci yang bdag gis rtogs pa med// rnal 
62b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor kun gyi byed gnas pas// 'phyon ma dang mi 'dra bar byas// de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas// ni la khan+d+has mtshams su 'joms// dung dang gser dang dngul dag kyang // gcig kyang bdag la dgos
62b5(rgyud 'grel): ba med// bdag nyid 'thad pa 'grogs dang 'grogs// he ru ka la 'khyud pa yis// bdag gi rgyal srid nge mtshar che// nam mkha' deng cer chags pa la// sus kyang ma mthong ngo mtshar che// rnal 
62b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma brgyad dga' zhing 'khyud// he ru ka dang 'khyud nas gnas// gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nag po nas rgud pa/ slob dpon ni la khan+d+has mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// 
62b7(rgyud 'grel): sha/ ma ba'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ suk+Sha yo gaM rA ma/ bod skad du/ pra ba'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin rje bshed la phyag 'tshal lo// khyim du khyim bdag rnal 'byor pa/ 
62b8(rgyud 'grel): gsang 'khyud gzhis med bsgom par bya// 'jigs pa can gyi rnam rtog 'di// khyod kyis 'di kun sba bar gyis// tshad kyang gzung du med pa la// de yi rigs kyang rtogs pa med// sa mu dra yi dge 
63a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod ni// sa gsum grags pas khyab par 'gyur// bdag nyid myos pa'i cha lugs kyis// dug lnga khrus shing dag par 'gyur// 'jigs pa can gyi rnam rtog 'di// nang du mnan nas/ 
63a2(rgyud 'grel): bsad par gyis// rigs kyi nga rgyal spang byas nas// dge sbyong ba dag gis smras pa yin// dbang po sna tshogs mthong 'gyur kyang // dus kyi pho nyas dran pa yis// ci phyir bdag nyid 'gro 'ang byed// 
63a3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' gzhis bral na don rnams grub// 'jigs pa can gyi rnam rtog 'di// sems 'di mnan nas spang bar gyis// rnal 'byor rnam rtog gcod pa yis// su mu dra dag dngos meng 'gyur// phra ba'i rnal 
63a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bsgom pa yis// bdag nyid gnyis med grub pa thob// pra ba'i rnal 'byor gyi nyams len zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sa mu dras mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ bA h+ya an+ta ra a mr-i ta kalpa 
63a5(rgyud 'grel): nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyi nang bdud rtsi'i bcud len zhes bya ba/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun chad bdud rtsis gsang ba bcud len gyis// nyams len thabs dang de yi sman sbyor dang // nyams 
63a6(rgyud 'grel): su blangs na tshe ring grub ba thob// dpyir bdag nyid bya ra'i nyams len bshad// rnal 'byor phyi yi nyams len byed na ni// bdud rtsi lnga yis rang lus dag par byas// rnam snang mi bskyod rin chen 
63a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan la// 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams// rang gi lus gnas nyams len shes pa med// mA ma kI yi rgyud btus nyams len bshad// rnam snang blangs la rdo rje'i chu yis dkrug/ 
63a8(rgyud 'grel): btsir nas snod kyi nang du zun phyed bzhag/ byin brlabs mchong bya rlung med sa ru brdung // rlung nad can la bu ram sbyar bar bya// bad kan can la tsha ba gsum dang sbar// dri med rnam snang btsing nas grib 
63b1(rgyud 'grel): skam bya// zhib par btags nas mar dang sbrang rtsi sbar// mi bskyod pa yis sbas nas bza' btung bya// sha dang 'o ma za zhing chang rnams spang // rnam snang nyams len bdag nyid b+ha rasi smras// mi 
63b2(rgyud 'grel): skyed skol nas mar dang kha ra sbyar// grangs par byas nas rnal 'byor btung bar bya// chang dang bud med spangs nas zla drug grub// mi skyong bcud len b+ha ris smra bar byed// rin chen 'byung ldan g+han+d+hi 
63b3(rgyud 'grel): dngul chu dang // ra yi 'om sbrang dang b+hi ta ste// zhib par brtags nas kar laM sogs sbyar// mar khu bton nas rnal 'byor lus la byugs// sman rnams gtong dus khengs pa'i dus su btang // gzhan dang 
63b4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dra b+ha ri stobs so// dbyar zla gsum la don yod grub pa yin// a ru ra dang sran tsha sbyar la bza'// sgor ga su ma ka ra a ru r-i sbyar nas// rnal 'byor pa ni lci stong dag la bza'// dgun gsum 
63b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu gsum dang sbyar la bza'// dpyid gsum mar sbrang 'bras bu gsum sbar bza'o// don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor bcud len pas// nang rnams sel cing don rnams grub par byed// shing / 
63b6(rgyud 'grel): mngar sbrang mar 'od dpag med pa 'bras bu gsum// gtsang zhi dang sbyar zos na nod rnams sel// cis kyang rnal 'byor bla ma'i zhal la ltos// 'od dpag med kyi bcud len b+ha ra si spras// zla ba 
63b7(rgyud 'grel): drug nas rnal 'byor ru rta skol la btang // dkar gsum mngar gsum rten dbang chu skol btang // mdor na ci dges kha zas rim gyis spangs// brag la sbyar nasaM b+ha ris borten par bya// kha
63b8(rgyud 'grel): zas rgyun chad bshad nas gsang ba bshad par bya// snying ga'i dbus nas yi dam lha nyid ni// rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan// sems dpa'i skyil krung bdud rtsi bum pa 'dzin// 
64a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag du hUM brjod snying ga gyen la bzlogs// yum gyi 'od kyis dkar nag mtshams su bcad/ oM A hUM brjod zhal na sa bdud rtsi 'dzags// dkar dag bcad pa'i mtshams nas 'bab 
64a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// rang lus khong steng zho ltar gang bar bsam// de ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' bdag gis smras// mdun gyi mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' ste// yid kyis dran nas de yi 'od kyis ni// rang gi smin
64a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams yan chad thod pa can// ye shes sems dpas oM A hUM brjod pas// thod pa'i bdud rtsi 'jigs te rtsa sbubs zhugs// bum pa'i 'og tu ra 'bar bdud rtsi blugs// de nas 'dres pas lus ni bdud
64a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsis gang // gnyis med de yi stobs kyis chu ser sogs// gsang ba'i gnas nas mar la 'dzags par bsam// de nas ma shar yang la bdud rtsis rang lus gang // slar yang rnal 'byor thod pa'i bcad 'pho
64a5(rgyud 'grel): las// bdud rtsi sor gcig lud nas gang ba ltar bsam mo// gal te rnal 'byor rlung khams skyes na ni// snying ga'i bum pa mar gyis gang bar bsam// mkhris pas skya rims tshad rang 'bab nad la// ga 
64a6(rgyud 'grel): bur ru bzhin nang lus bsil bar bsam// rnal 'byor grang ba'i nad ni na gyur na// dred sman rnams kyis stobs ni bsgom par bya// skems kyang skyo na tri yig blo ldan bzla// b+ha ri bdag gis gsang ba'i bcud 
64a7(rgyud 'grel): len smras// brtan pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor nyid kyis bsgrubs// nyams su myong ba'i yon tan nad rnams sel// zla drug shes rab blo 'phel rang bzhin skye// slob dpon b+ha ris gsungs pa'i phyi
64a8(rgyud 'grel): nang gi bcud len gyi gdams pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi paN+Di te raShA pa las rang 'gyur du mdzad nas/ bshang rgyud kyi gdams pa bar mchad par gsungs pa'o// she sa can pa 'i bachung po'i bru thab bzhugs/ 
64b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu dra bri gI ti/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po brda'i bcud pa/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang // skyabs gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// grad kyi lus la dngul gyi yal dgyon pa kun gyis blta 
64b2(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzes// ta la'i mgo bcang rtsa ba de la muM gu skye mi 'gyur// don saM yi 'og nas ka ka'i skad kyis 'byin par nus// gang ga sgrol ba'i rkyal ba 'di la gces spras bya bar rigs// skyes bu seng ge'i gseb 
64b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba ni skal bar ldan// ging pa rang gis byed pa dor gyi srin bu snying re rje// ji ltar zos kyang thib ma 'di la gzugs kyis thar pa med// spu gri'i sol chags pa'i sbrang rtsi ljags na phung por nges// rdo yi mi 'di
64b4(rgyud 'grel): srin mo'i gling du skyal kyang mi dga' med// gnyen po phyir 'phel 'ang ba chags sgeg go cha bzang // rin che ni gter gyi zad kar zhal ba'i dbul mo snying re rje// shing rta brel ba'i chu ni 'khor lo'i sgom du 
64b5(rgyud 'grel): chud pas lan// rgyal po'i rjes gnang thob pa'i mi de gshed ma la mi 'jigs// rnga yab lag na thogs bzhin 'ja' tri dug sbrang phyir mi spong // 'brug gi sgra med rma bya'i mngal du skong chags mi 'gyur// ma 
64b6(rgyud 'grel): ga d+ha ru dngul chu 'thungs pa des ni gdag brgal// li khr-i kha ru chud pa'i gsil pa thams cad mtshal du 'bab// gzi ba nas thon nas gshed ma'i lag du 'gro bar ma byed cig/ lhor rkun mo'i snying sha 
64b7(rgyud 'grel): zol drang srong rgyal mtshan phyi ru pung // ro la ga ser gyi phreng ba btags pa de'i gang du 'gro bar mi bya'o// sAna? mchog bsil mngar mi bcod min lus kyis btung bar bya// glang po'i rga she lcags kyus 
64b8(rgyud 'grel): phrogs pa 'di ning mtshar che ba yin// gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu'i lag nas tshangs po'i skud pa de lang zhig/ dbus long mig gis ro lo ci 'dra'i lan ni thebs par mi 'gyur ro// dgos 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod sna tshogs 'byung ba'i dor bu'i nus pa sul blangs pa yid// sgom pa'i phyir ni lan tshwa'i chu rgod 'thung ba'i mi de ltas ngan yin// dug las skyes pa'i srin bu 'di yis nga khos man ngag bstan nas
65a2(rgyud 'grel): seng // mu dra ag la btab pa'i gzugs de g+hats+tsha log tu shes par byos// ku ru kul+la'i gnas su sgrol mas gsungs so// / sgyu rtsal lus la med pa'i mi yis gyad kyi spyod pa dor ba rung // dri ma can gyi lus kyis tshangs pa'i sgo 
65a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yang mthong mi 'gyur// chu srin kha ra gu chud ded dpon 'di yi spyod pa nga ltos dang // mu tig phreng ba pad+ma'i skud pas zla ba'i dbus su skye bar bya// shul dkar u shugs la tshogs 'gron po'i don ni zhim rgas pas 
65a4(rgyud 'grel): shor// de mthong bdud ni mig phyis phyogs bzhir gang mo rtag skad 'tsher// mkha' la 'bur ba'i nus pa bangs pa'i dus der skams// mkhregs lam zur gzhol grung de shing rta brel ba gang gi stobs las byung // 
65a5(rgyud 'grel): dug sbrul ske bcang rus pa med pa rnal 'byor pa yis gzigs// rnyog ma'i chul bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor tha char bar rab tu dka'// rkang pa chag pa'i smad kris mgo la 'ching ba'i mi de 'ja' tri yin// rdzab las rkang pa 
65a6(rgyud 'grel): bkrus nas 'do li'i steng du 'dzegs pa bzang // dus sbal khog pa pha lam rdzas kyi rdo rjes bcug pa ngo mtshar che// ma gi ta yod sa la brang 'gros blta bar mi nus so// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni ro dang lhan cig 'grogs pa min/ 
65a7(rgyud 'grel): na gsal me mched phyogs bzhi'i rlung ni grogs su 'gyur// rgyal po'i btsur mo lha sras la ni skyo bar 'gyur ma yin// ka ma ru ru spyon pa'i chu la su yis 'azung bar rus// so ma btang ba'i rdza ni chu la skol bar mi bya'o// 
65a8(rgyud 'grel): stag ni ri mo yod pas lan te rtag tu dgra dang 'grogs// b+har+N+Na med par gser 'gyur rtsi mchog rang dgar shes pa min// chung ngu so mi 'dzin bco lnga'i zla ba rgyas pa 'di la sgra gcan dbang // bu shi'i ma bu mthung ba'i 
65b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba bzang mo bya na rem// zhing bas chu lud rten la sa bon skyon beng gdab par bya// ngar mchog dag la blud pa'i ral gri 'di la brdegs yod// spen pa'i kul du 'brangs na snying gar yi ge sna tshogs 'char/ 
65b2(rgyud 'grel): me 'gyur mkha' la lding ba'i byagi 'di la gdapas pa yod// byang phyogs khab ca du phyi na 'grol ban par 'gyur// dpal 'bras dpung rang 'byung gi rtsar 'jam dpal gyis gsungs pa'o// / yi ge'i phreng ba zhi 
65b3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha'i bar du dpa' bo'i spyan gyis blte bar gyis// rma bya'i mdongs kyi kha dog nam bris 'di yi mkhan po su zhig yin// khab len rdo yi phyogs der lcags bran rgyug ste de la rig byed med// glang po'i mgo la rwa med chag 
65b4(rgyud 'grel): gis dogs pa'i sdug bsngal skye mi 'gyur// rgyal po'i gzeb du chud pa'i pi de thar rab lde mig yid la bgyis// ging ba'i las byas snga ma'i dge slong la ni ltung ba'i gos mi 'gyur// wa dang glang po bung bsha 
65b5(rgyud 'grel): za seng ge spyon pa'i snod 'gros ltos// srin gyis mgos dngul nu ta rus mthung bar byed// gcig cig gcig la gcig pa nyid du shes par gyis// gzan du pha la ma sdug pa'i bya gang yin su yis 
65b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar 'gyur// mtshan ldan lus la sku rtsal ma sbyangs gyang du 'gyur ma yin// wa ti'i thal drungs yur ringan chu 'di drag par 'gyur// dang la spa gris lce chod de dus khyod kyi kha nas rig byed thon/ 
65b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khri shing lo 'bras sming+ga cing lbu bas rgyas su pi 'jug cig/ rtsal gsu po lus la rdzogs pa'i seng ge 'di la yang dung zad med// dgun 'bum tshal nas grim pa sdug pa'i spre'u snying nge rtse// chu nang rdo bar tshe na de dus 
65b8(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gud du song ba med// ngur ba gzeb kyi ri bong 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya// rdo yi mi langan du smras dang bsngags pa khyad par yod dpa ru// lha rdzas shel la me ru gzhis ka 'byung ba ngo mtshar che// gal 
66a1(rgyud 'grel): nang zas la rgyug pa'i sams can de ni snying rje'i yul// gyang kyis khrid kyang 'khor lo dang bral shing rtas la ma mchod// rkang la khang dril bud pa'i ming blo sems bde// las su 'phangs 
66a2(rgyud 'grel): pas zil gyis mi skyug gol phyir mi 'bod// dal ba'i dbang med rdza mkhan 'khor po srub zad chod na bde// skyon gyis mgos ut+pal chu nang skyes pa rang sar zhog/ gshed mas gzung ba'i lhas ngan mi de 
66a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyab du mig mi blta// dud 'gro'i rgyal po'i gtsug gi nor bu'i thog ma gnas 'ongs// ri bo bya rkang du spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o// // tsan+dan chus bkrus lus kyi sprin med mkha' la gza' bral zhi ma 
66a4(rgyud 'grel): ltos// srin mo'i phang du bu shor nye zho med par log pa'i mi de gang // nam zhig byi ba'i dug dang ma bral thar pa thob mi 'gyur// lag pa re rer me long gnyis phyar byad de gang la lta ba yin// stong la mnan 
66a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i seng ge'i gam du spos kyi glang pog chad du// mchil lham steng du rkang bzhags stengs thams cad de dus ko bas g.yogs// 'khor los sgyur rgyal gang du gshegs pa'i lam du rin chen gzhan 
66a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'brang // pe ta ming gis bslus te bsgo ba nyan dus de dus de tshe gces pa dor// bu ram tshal mthong rkang la khong bsgril grol ba'i glang po sdod pa min// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser la mu tig gis spras 
66a7(rgyud 'grel): btsun mos btsongs na rin thang che// rlon can shing la rtsol bas srub pa'i mi de blun po yin// bye phrag lus la khrab chags de dus rma bya'i gnod yun ran// 'gro bar 'khar gzhong nang gi rus sbal tshi chad 
66a8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gcig la gcig rten gshog pa med kyang gser sbrul mkha' la 'phur// shi yang blo yi nor bu ma lon rgya mtsho'i phyir mi 'byung // b+ha yi drung du rmug sa bon bcad kyi rjes la bzang bar 'gyur/ 
66b1(rgyud 'grel): dmas long lag na me long phyar pa 'di la btsun mo bltas kyi dga'// sngam gyis rtses pa'i ras la tshon gyi rtsi ni chags mi 'gyur// ti tsha byugs pa'i rdza ni so btang da ni bskol bas chog/ mkhas pa yis ni stag gi tshang mthong de nas 
66b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byol// b+h+rUM mchog gser 'gyur brlabs pa'i dzin dran brjed par bya bi min// chas gcig zab mi chung bco lta'i dus na skyes pa med// bus pa ga yang khar song ba ma yi spyod 'gros ltas// mig 'di mgol dgos pas phyung / 
66b3(rgyud 'grel): gza' bar mi bya'o// sha chags mi phyung dus su gser gyi ral gre dbyung cig/ rdo yaM mi la 'dran dus de tshe snying la yi ge sna tshogs 'jug/ gar mkhan spyod pa 'di yis man ga thams cad bstan nas song // byang phyogs par ta ni ru byin 
66b4(rgyud 'grel): nana'agro la phan par 'gyur// 'byung po'i grong khyer tri stag tshang du// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o// gyad dang bsgrags pa'i mi de shul du tse ra'i yang bral// mchig rdal la cha mi 'go tsan+dan mel sro bar bya// rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong 
66b5(rgyud 'grel): po lo 'dab rgyas kyang don la skam po yin// gser gyi rtsa'u mkha' la phya rab 'di la glang po sbyin pa 'bros// til mar rtse la dngul chu'i rgyun 'dzag 'di la seng ge bltas kyi dga'// ging bsrog la mkhas pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu sdig 
66b6(rgyud 'grel): mi sog/ dur khrod nang du lce sbyang ro dang phrad pa phyir mi ldog/ sgeg mo rgyan gyis sbas pa me long lta ba rab tu brtson/ rdo yi mi la su zhe kho yi dgra bo gang yin khyod kyis spros// pad+ma'i ge sar lag du thogs la dus mtha'i na mkha' 
66b7(rgyud 'grel): ltos// ga la bad+ma'i sgra gdangs gter gyi steng du bsgrogs na spyan// wa chu ma zad par du chu thags 'khor lo 'di lag dang dbang med// gling gcig dag tu 'khor los sgyur rgyal gnyis su tshogs pa min// mkha' la zhim 
66b8(rgyud 'grel): shar dus mun pa gud du yib ba ma ci// rin chen dngul gyi me long g.ya'am dag par ci ru rung // ma ga d+ha ru btsos pa'i ras ni kha dog gzhan pas gsal// rgyal po'o gam nas bshed ma'i phyogs su 'gro ba ltas ngan 
67a1(rgyud 'grel): yin// mo gsham bu yi mdza' sde gang yin de yi bud med su// gzo yi sngon du thog mar zhun sbyongs gtong ba'i gser mkhan thabs la mkhas// mngal du mches pa'i glang po che ba drug pa rgum 'brum mi 'dod la/ 
67a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po blta zhing brtse ba'i sems kyis sbran nas mchi ma yang yang 'dzag/ dus mtha'i nam mkha' 'di la shar lho phyogs mtshams gang gis shes par 'gyur// yin par shes pa'i blo yis mon mo'i dug gi nus pa med 
67a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed// zla ba bco lnga ma rgyas par du rus sbal la skyes sgo smin mi 'gyur// rkun po mdzod khang nang du rgyal po'i thul mos bzung ba de ci sems// mig gi dbang po btsum nas mthong byed snying gi dbus su sad nas lta// 
67a4(rgyud 'grel): brag la byung ba'i seng ge'i skad kyis chos rnams ma lus bstan nas song // rtse mchog gser 'gyur shes pa'i mi de rlom sems khong du chud cig/ lang tang rtse ru gshin rje gshed kyis gsungs pa'o// gyad kyi rgyu 
67a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsal 'di la dri ma'i zas gnod mkhas pas spangs par bya// chu bo bzhi 'bab rgya mtsho phyir mi ldud pa ngo mtshar che ba yin// skyed du 'dzem pa'i glang po seng ge'i 'o ma 'thungs pas su yis thub par 'gyur// rlan bral 
67a6(rgyud 'grel): rus sbal rgya mtsho mthong tshe de dus gzhan mi dran// sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin gtong las byung 'bras bu gang du smin par 'gyur// ma drug bu'i phyogs der tshangs dbang khyab 'jug rnams kyi cod pan 'dud// seng ge'i 
67a7(rgyud 'grel): maug/ dbus na mi ng+ge ma yod pa de las dang rtse// 'di 'didzin chen maT+Ta du brgyag nis chos 'byung drag por 'jog/ dug sbrul med dAng tshe dogal yod par blang bar bya// me ljang g.ya 'dag gzugs brgya 
67a8(rgyud 'grel): 'char gyis rgyab du min// ka ta ri las thar nas dong du zhugs pa'i mi de shin tu thun// rgya las grol nas 'dab chags rma bya rjes su zlog mi 'gyur// yan lag nang du bskums pa'i phyir ru dgra dang bral ba'i 
67b1(rgyud 'grel): rus sbal thabs la mkhas// rtsi mchog spri yang 'thungs pa'i sbrul sha zos na bcud du 'gyur// rgya mtsho'i gling du ma phyin nor bu la ni blun pos cir mi mthong // bsad pas khrag ngoms chu yi nang 'dug sha yi phyir mi
67b2(rgyud 'grel): 'brang // khab du byon pa'i btsun mos sngar gyi spyod pa dor bar bya// bu ram chu yis ras kyi dri ma rnams ni gting nas 'don par byed// gangs kyi ri yi snum ma zos na 'o ma mar du 'gyur// stag 'di ded pas mi 
67b3(rgyud 'grel): zin bsdad kyi steng nas dgug par bya// parti ka na gser 'gyur rtsi yi lo ma me ru 'bud// chu snod 'bum du zla ba 'bum char de dus zla ba gcig las med// byis pa ma mthong tshe pang du rgyug pas a lu bor// yib 
67b4(rgyud 'grel): sa med pa'i gser lar yod ka 'di'i rdo la snong // srin mo'i ral gri gyad kyis thogs pa de la pha rol 'jigs// nam mkha' gos su gyon na spring gi dkyil du zhim 'char// rta mchog thur du rgyug pa skyes bu 'di 
67b5(rgyud 'grel): yis gdams ngag bstan nas song // mangs sdug rma bya'i thul pa phud na de yis thar pa thob par 'gyur// bya rgod phung po'i ril kha sarbA Nis gsungs so// / gyad kyis ma rgyugs phra mo'i bang la rgyal po bltas 
67b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dga'// tshos ma yis ni skyon med ras la kha dog tha dad ci 'dod shes// zhim mun par mthong ba'i mi de'i mig de cis lan da 'og khyod kyis smros// phrug gu ma dran sbrang rtsi mthong ba'i don la gzhis mi 'ong // khyu 
67b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'og tu zhon nas seng ge'i 'o ma da 'thung zhig/ mdzes mas g.yogs pa'i zas la dug mthong bzhin du ma 'thung dang // bus pa dang ni rgan pos chu nad zla ba 'di la so sor mthong bar 'gyur// nam mkhas 
67b8(rgyud 'grel): btson du bzung ba'i skyes bu 'di la gud na bros sa med// skad gsang mthon po'i sgra yis ye shes 'char dus khyod kyis dris// shel sgong g.ya' dag gang gi steng du bzhag pa de yi mdog du 'gyur// 'dul 
68a1(rgyud 'grel): spang ba khar byeg dang byur bachal nas zas pa'i grang ba'ang 'a hU~M yid// skal gyi chang mthang lan gakhar caldan la na par sa su 'gyur// rgyal ba bka' rtags gnang ba'i mi dbul 'ang da mi 'jigs// dung 
68a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skal pag rkang zhan pa 'din drug rgya che// rgyal macan rje ma nar bu 'dil batshad dang dgas 'dod 'byung bar gyur// babs kyis gang la reg po'i chan na dum du 'gyur bar the tsham med// btsun pa'i 'anga' sder gyur pa 
68a3(rgyud 'grel): mgasangs bshad pa'i lag du 'gro// dpag chen skyes bu ba gan ba du mda' 'phang sa 'di ni su yi ma ga la bog/ rin po ches spras btsun mob skul rgyan gro snying pa gnang mi 'gyur// sprin med mkha' la shar ba'i ga za2 
68a4(rgyud 'grel): gar byugs der rgyal po kar khyod kyis byung // spre'u'i ster ma rnyed pa'i ru sbal lan tshwa'i tshul lto 'gal med// 'tshal mangs la rtsol ba'i las rnams sdong lnga ba yin te gser me dbyer// skrag ma'i rdul 'bras bu 
68a5(rgyud 'grel): chags tsha ngas ni rdza brlag par gdon mi za// snga rnams snying gi dbus mazhan pa'i bag rgod 'di yi spyod 'gros khyod kyis ltos// rgyal ma 'byongs pa'i skyes bris rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro bar mi bya'o// sal snga ma ni mtshur 
68a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis gos che sngar gyi kha dog 'dor bar byed// seng ge bu dpus chos rnams ma lus bstan nas song ba ngo mtshar che// mun pa'i ram du me long la byad kyi gzugs rnyan 'char mi 'gyur// klu sgrub kyi phug par 
68a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa rnam par sel bas gsungs pa'o// / som pas mchu dang mgul ba skams pa'i glang po chu dang phrad pas gzhan mi sems// til mar gyis bskus skal me shor de dus sgeg me bye gzhan dor/ 
68a8(rgyud 'grel): lus la lcags dbyug bstan kyang rje ye mi la mi dga'i rtog pa rgya ma 'gyur// mnyan pa dgras des rtsang po'i 'gram dugu dang phrad pa de ci sepas// seng ge'i 'om rin chen sdod las bal gyis thub ma 'gyur/ 
68b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs 'gyur mi gang du blo ldan gyis zir dengs sems ngal sos// sreg ma yid 'phrag rme la ma bung med gang nas 'ongs nas gang du song// lan tshwa tshul tham pas gzugs medang yi dngas pa snang me 'gyur// sgo ba'i 
68b2(rgyud 'grel): na nas blang ba'i bye gag mkha' la blta ba ci sems// gling bzhi'i bra ba byas kyang 'i klag nyis la thongs dang cig med// rin chen po cu r+ya dang 'thang bu khrad kyis brje bar mabyed cig/ rma bya ba tsan dag pa ba bya gzhani rnams kyi 
68b3(rgyud 'grel): da mang se ma yid do// rusprul dud la gas kyang rgyam cha mthong nang dus rab tu dga'// bar ba'i phyi sogs la ri lho 'gro chags pa'i blo bi ste// thabs la mkha' ba'i ded dporan rgya mtsho'i lam sra mkhas la 'tshal 
68b4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed// lus la rbab yod pa'i ringags gcig bar sdong la ltas// dgar 'brum chang gis gzin btsun ma'i drung mi 'gro// mchur gyis spangs pa'i ras mi bdag bskur bar shes// 'o ma'i chu tshun 'di la su 
68b5(rgyud 'grel): 'thung med thal bar ldan par shes// sgong sgras tshang du bskur nas thug ga migs 'dab chags khakhrug drung ngon gnyis mi byed gser 'gyur rtse 'di shes pa'i dgos pa de dus stor// lang tsho bcu drug lon pa'i bu 
68b6(rgyud 'grel): me de yis bad bskam shes// dag sprul ba ga dang glang pa'i spyod 'gres khyod kyis dgyes shig/ tshwa yis chu deng bsdad dbang med de la ngal bar gang gis mthong // sbyor ba'i lag nas ral gri 'brel ba'i ming 
68b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo yin// seng ge rigs pa mthong chen dngus steng la yaM sna tshogs 'char// gri skor mkhan pa de yis daras man dag thams cad bstan nas song // dpal gyi ril yi ge bsrubs nas thabs ngas bden 
68b8(rgyud 'grel): pa mthong bar 'gyur// oMn+ya tshan rdo la'i gling du dpal rang byung gi rgyal mos gsungs pa'o// / bil ba'i gang bu nga ni gyad kyis brdabs na 'jig par gdan mi za// pabang dred dang sha dag byed pa'i dgas 
69a1(rgyud 'grel): / bgang yin khud kyis zlos// gang char 'thungs pa'i gang po sbron pa dang sang bzhag na 'asrud// glan pa'i dgas mi zhan na dpagang gis gso bar nus pa yin// seng ge'i 'om 'thungs tsam tshul 'byur rtsi thugs 
69a2(rgyud 'grel): na bcud du byung // dug tshor bas la skyes bu chags pa'i blo ni sde mi 'gyur// mi srung mig la zhin mtshan med de de yis dang byas rgyas pa yin// rnam pa lus la med pa'i skyes bug cer bub la dgra mi 'ong // dung khrod dbus 
69a3(rgyud 'grel): rje oM m-i de sha za'i yang bral nas 'dug/ chu shing snying po rnyed pa'i mi de skyes bu su yis mthong bar 'gyur// gter mdzod dbyug gis khengs tshe de dus ded dpon blo sems bde bar snang // dbul pos nar bu rgyal po'i phyag 
69a4(rgyud 'grel): dubul ba'i 'dini ngo mtshar che// skyes btsul ba med pa'i pi wang la ni sgra skad 'byung mi 'gyur// dzings la gnas pa'i bya rog 'di la 'phur sa gud na med// mgos mig phyung zhing gi dkyil du zlas na phyong ba yi gar 'gyur// sems

69b1(rgyud 'grel): la tog pa bzhag pa'i mi de 'gyil bar 'gyur// lho phyogs kam du rul mo ba tsas gsungs pa'o// // gser gling yid la bcangs pa'i ded dpon za rdo'i khrod dag 'od mi 'gyur// jo yi shul du 'brang ba'i khyi ye b+h+yo 
69b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gros 'di la khyod kyis yang yang lces// tshang khang du tshogs 'greng po tha kar me 'grogs dang rang gung du 'gro/ nor bu'i phung po mthong tshe rus sbal la ni gces par 'dzin pa'i blo mas+t+wa~M// klu mchog rnamasakyi 
69b3(rgyud 'grel): mgo ba ji sbed klung gzer skye ba'i rted// nang gi 'du ba gang yin drang srong gis na byi nas shes// rgyal po'i dkor mdzad brkus pa mi sgra 'chab paMs kha tshags bsdams// rnal chu mthong tshe thag pa sbrul du 'dzin 
69b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'phrul ba ldog/ sbrang rtsi'i rim chog myong ba'i dam rtsa yi zhen pa thal// sa yi 'og tu rdo yang dbyungs/ waM sra ba dgangs pa yin// nyig gza' skang rnams ni rgya mtsha dang ba'i dang du 'char// waM sma naM la sa pa 
69b5(rgyud 'grel): gyon pa'i mi des bgegs rnams brar du khol bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhir tsa do bshed mas zin pa'i mid ri dus gang la chags// skyes bu 'dza' bos bsdus pa'i mi de khong du yid tshes 'jig/ shing gi skyes bus 
69b6(rgyud 'grel): glang po'i mgo bcad de yi sdig pa gang du sri// mdangs rgyas pa yi ma bya dregs pas myos pa 'din ting 'dzin bzang // rgyal sras 'khrungs pa'i btsun mo la ni de dus lha rnams re bo che// nagar yaM yi ge tshul bris pa 
69b7(rgyud 'grel): su yis lcogs par 'gyur// lhung bzed khengs na rigs ngan gzhag la da ni seng ge'i bu dang sbag/ ci yang mi dgos shing sogs par gyi sdom gyi spyad 'gros khyod kyis ltos// gser 'gyur rtsi shes dbul bar

70a1(rgyud 'grel): ka 'jigs gsal bar 'dug/ gang la brgyab pa pi sdug mchod pa lha dbang lag gi sta ri rdo// mchil lham lag na thogs na rus der lham gyi dgos pa stor// dra ba dbang po'i gzhu yis

70a7(rgyud 'grel): la ni 'dod pa de bzhos shig/ nor bu rin chen gang nas rnyed pa'i dus der dbul dang bral// gcig tu gyur pas ri rab drung du rma bya'i mdongos mi gsal// skyes bu bshed mas btang ba'i blo sems 'di la 
70a8(rgyud 'grel): blta bar bya// dud 'gro'i khong du gser 'gyur rtsi zos rtswa gzhan dag dang khyad par med// de thag thams cad tsar gyi phur pa 'di yis bzung ba yin// stabaso ldar ded dpor gyis ni glang po'i rgyab dur khol/ 
70b1(rgyud 'grel): cig/ srin po'i kha nas rlung gis bskyod pa'i me ni rdo rje'i gdan la 'bar bar byed// 'di yis gdol pa'i grong rnams tshig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// rnam pa du mar gyur kyang gar mkhan lus su gcig pa 
70b2(rgyud 'grel): yin// grol nas lam du bum pa dngul chu'i thigs pas khengs pa'i tshe// de dus 'khor lo'i steng du dpa' bo rnams ni gzir chug/ rgya mtsho 'a rba drabs 'khrugs dus thabs lngar rus sbal gting du 'bros/

70b4(rgyud 'grel): gter chung de dus mkha' la 'ja' tsher sna tshogs 'char// mthong dus de tshe khyed kyis khong duga'u yi skad bu da pud cig/ rang gis bcag pa'i gser la ka 'a dzi'i dgos pa mi bdog gigo/ mthong sdang dgra ru 
70b5(rgyud 'grel): red pa gter bsrungs mkhan po me la tse rab tu brtson// rgyal pos ma tshor ba la du rab bseb du bdud rtsi'i bum pa rang gis btung // sbrang rgod lto ru zos nas 'bras bu med par 'dod pa de ni shin tu blu na/

70b7(rgyud 'grel): du// gzar la btsum pa rgya khra 'di yis man ngag thams cad bstan nas song // gter mdzod rnyed pa'i mi des mdza' bo shi ba'i mya ngan dus der brjed// sha chags mes ded skyal shes skyes bu gaM gA'i phyogs// 
70b8(rgyud 'grel): su 'bros// rus sbrul rgyab kyi ri mo sus bris 'di yi mkhan po gang yin lo// ded dpon kha la mi zhan blo chung skal med nor bu rba dor len// zha ba tang ba yi skar mo de dus mkha' la dgra yi 'jigs me bra wa// 
71a1(rgyud 'grel): rig byed gnod par mthong ba'i skal med da 'og rang sar zhog/ khab len rdo 'di nam zhig btsun mo'i dgra ru ldang bas sa yi 'og tu spros// gnad du mtshon po ga dus der ri dgas khyunas bgar/ 
71a2(rgyud 'grel): nor bu gling las rdo btsal bas mi rnyed a rangs rin po che// mkha' la rgyu skar gang yin lhan seng ge'i g.yang gzhi ga no// gser 'gyur rtsi de ston pa'i drin can gang gis mazhes par byed par nus// thabs bzhan ma 
71a3(rgyud 'grel): mchis rdza chag dum bur bza' btung slong na dgyes// chu yi de rnams rgya mtsho chen po der ni tha dad med de gcig/ rol mtshon gyis bsnun kyang de la ma dga'i rtog pa med// g.yul don ma sprod tshon glang po'i mchu la ral gri 
71a4(rgyud 'grel): gdags// ri brag bar du sdod pa'i gcan zan seng ge 'di la gdams pa yod// zo chu 'khor lo 'di yis man ngag thams cad dus der bstan// srin mo'i sog pa mgul du thogs na mkha' la 'pher bar 
71a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// rdo rje gdan du mi g.yo bas gsungs pa'o// // bde bar gshegs pa lung gi brgyad pa// yi dam gyi lhas bstan pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling du sngan chad ma grags pa'o// sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags 
71a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// bla ma rgya gar nag gu'i zhal snga nas// bod kyi ban+da zha ma lo tsA bas byin brlabs kyi gnas mchog dang rir bsgyur te/ bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad pa rdzogs s+ho// // / phyag rgya chen po'i man 
71a7(rgyud 'grel): dag thigs pa'i bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ #// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu dra u pa badz+ra gu h+ya gI ta/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdo rje gsang ba'i glu/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
71a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// kye'o rgyal po'i rigs bcu dbu yi 'dzin 'gyur gyis// gser bgrur rtsa yi rigs byed ma tshang gis rtogs// rgya mtsho'i lam rgyus rig ldan ded dpon mkhas// khri snyan mig gis nor bu'i 
71b1(rgyud 'grel): nus pa lta// ril bu grub pas bram ze'i bya ba rdzogs// gangs la bab pa'i tshul dri ma med// mu tra las btor gzugs rnams tha mi dad // gser la dngul gyi ra med sa le sbram// mkhan gzos ma byas 
71b2(rgyud 'grel): bse ru bshags pa'i gzugs// rdzings kyi zag pa lu gu brgyad du sbrel// ma ga d+ha pa skor mdzad bu la 'bogs// mnga' bdag tshig la btsun mo zur mi g.yo// mtshar shes dka' pha ma yin sku 
71b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i 'phrul// sbar rgod 'thungs pa'i nus pas yun mi thogs// ka 'dzi mi dgos rang gis bsags pa'i gser// dmus long mig phreng yul rnams rang ngos zin// rin chen gser gyi skud pa kha ba

71b5(rgyud 'grel): nus pa tshang ba'i steng du chug/ nor bu lus la btags na 'du ba 'byang // lto 'gros dri tsher ma gi ta la 'bros// phrugs bdag mthong bas u ma cod pan bkrol// rma bya'i phrug gu dang po'i tshad mi 'dod//

76a6(rgyud 'grel): sresrog ster ba'i drang srong lan lon cig/ phan pa'i sman par 'bor bar bya ba min// rgya mtsho'i sbub yal ba'i rjes mi blta// gdan sa ma spangs rgyal pos tshes mi 'grub// khyim dor nags su 'dug pa'i mi 
76a7(rgyud 'grel): re bde// dom gyi snying khrag ma 'thung kha la ltos// me tog rtsi yis spang ma dal mi ster// bu ram mur ba'i lkug mkha rog 'dug/ gling la dbang ba'i rgyal po bu dang 'grogs// 'khor los btsal 
76a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lam la zhugs par bya// khang bzang rin chen srang du mi rung ngo // dri ma can gyi zas skom mi brten cing // khyim bdag dpa' bo phyi ru mi skad dro// tshe 'di'i tshe zabs bshig pa ngur bsrungs mi/ 
76b1(rgyud 'grel): gdol pa'i mgul du ri cher rgyad mi 'dogs// yab kyi spyod lam skrag pa ded dpor bu// spyod pa'i spyod pa gzugs pa ta dpral nas 'dug/ lhag pa'i gsang tshig khA ru me 'dor no// zhi ba dgrar/ 
76b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur bre gros dri yul zhig/ gzugs kyi rtsol sgrub mi byed long ba'i grags// phyag dar khrod pa thong gshol zho pi 'gyur// dad pa chu skyug gang ga laM mi blta// gser gyi 'gar ba bya ba gzhan mi bsgrub/ 
76b3(rgyud 'grel): dang cher dang zab bag rdzi gon ma 'gyur// tsong skyed mi nus khrag ma mkhan gyi khyab// spra mkhas thabs lngar ne tsho khru des 'byol// 'phyangs pa'i glang po bur shing bres mi skrag/ gser sgrog 
76b4(rgyud 'grel): bcug kyang 'tsham 'gros byed mi rus// ded dpor bu ri bre sring la pi blta// gling dor khar tor shi yang khyim mi 'dug/ tshong phug 'dus tshe na yang gzings la skrag/ 'dod pa'i rlung ne re

81b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo // mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla'i mig can gyis mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM mkha' la nyi zla shar pa yis// mun pa ma spangs snang bar 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po'am// g.ya' dang bral ba'i me 
81b5(rgyud 'grel): long bzhin// sgren me thogs pas mun pa bral// chu yi gzugs brnyan brtsegs pas stong // ka la ku tra ming yin te// nam mkha' mthong bas ji ltar rig/ tshad pas gdungs pas chab

82a1(rgyud 'grel): med// ne tshe sla ma shes pas 'tshengs// mi gtsang khrod nas ut+pal 'khrungs// sha ba'i rwa ni bog na bde// khur po med na 'jigs dang bral// nor med mi yis mel tshe spang //

87a4(rgyud 'grel): mos gus las ni byin brlabs 'byung // brtson 'grus kyis ni dgos pa 'grub gsung ngo // te'u tra pas gsungs pa/ rig pa khong nas ma sadA na// 'di zhes bstan pas rtogs mi 'gyur// mig 
87a5(rgyud 'grel): nad can gyi snang ba bzhin// thog mar dang rgyud gsal bar bya gsung ngo // yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/ mthong ba mngon du ma gyur na// mig gi dbang pos yul mthong bzhin// 'dod pa'i 
87a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu mi 'byung bas// goms par bya ba shin tu gces gsung ngo // rab ri pas gsungs pa/ sku gsum phyi rol yul na med// rig pa'i ye shes dngas pa las// gzugs brnyan tsam 
87a7(rgyud 'grel): du nang nas 'char// rnam par rtog pas rnyog mi bya gsung ngo // gu d+ha ri pas gsungs pa/ sdang srid ye grol chos kyi dbyings// phyag rgya chen po spangs thob med// nam mkha'i bya yis gar 
87a8(rgyud 'grel): ma byin// byis pa'i rtsol ba sha zang chad ces gsung ngo // la ba'i na bza' can gyis gsungs pa/ gang du'ang ma mthong long ba'i mig/ ci yang mi sems gti mug dang // gang du ma phyin 
87b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phye bo'i bgros// ci yang ma thob dbul mo'i gter gsung ngo // Sh+T+ri hi rukas gsungs pa/ sring zhi mnyam nyid spos bral la// rtsol sgrub byed pa sha zang chad// yul sems gnyis med zang thal 
87b2(rgyud 'grel): la// za da 'dzin pa nyon re mongs// bdag gzhan gnyis med chos skul// bzang ngan 'dzin pa snying re rje gsung ngo // nyi ma sbas pas gsungs pa/ yul la bltas pas skye ba med// sems 
87b3(rgyud 'grel): la bltas pas spos dang bral// gnyis med don 'di blo las 'das// ngas ni ci yang ma shes so gsung ngo // gu Na tis gsungs pa/ ma skyes mig yo nam mkha'i ngang // gzugs 
87b4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan sna tshogs cho 'phrul te// skems med rig pa rang sar zhog/ chos kyis bcings pa snying re rje gsungs ngo // pad+ma'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/ bya ba thams cad yongs btang ste// sems 
87b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi glang po dang sar zhog/ gnyis med ye shes btsal du med// thams cad thams cad de de zhingad gsung ngo // de lo pis gsungs pa/ kun gzhi zang thal zhabs phyung la// bdag tu 'dzin 
87b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dbyings su sbyar// yid kyi rnam shes stod la non// sgo lnga dang grol lkug par zhog gsung ngo // shes rab 'byung gnas kyis gsungs pa/ spos dang bral la rtog pas 'ching mi nus// skur 
87b7(rgyud 'grel): mar mthong la yul gyis 'ching mi nus// zhe 'dod bral la spyod pas 'ching mi nus// sangs rgyas 'dod la 'khor bas 'ching mi rus gsung ngo // dz+nyA na shrIs gsungs pa/ rtsa ba bral ba'i 
87b8(rgyud 'grel): sdong bu bzhin// nga yi sems nyid nam mkhar ster// 'khrul snang ji ltar dgyes dgyes mdzod// nga ni nam mkha'i rnal 'byor yin gsung ngo // par hi tas gsungs pa/ kaM ka mkha' la 
88a1(rgyud 'grel): lding ba bzhin// 'khor 'das ro mnyam dbyings su grol// re dang dogs pa kun bral te// bde ba chen po nam mkha'i ngang gsung ngo // kA ma shrIs gsungs pa/ lus med lus kyi nang
88a2(rgyud 'grel): na gnas// rten med mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu// dmigs med smra bsam yul las 'das// 'gyur med rang byung ye shes che gsung ngo // mi thub zla bas gsungs pa/ sgron mes zla ba tshol 
88a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin// rtog pa de nyid mi rtog pa// nam mkhas nam mkha' tshol ba bzhin// mi rtog pa nyid blo las 'das gsung ngo // dzA lan+d+ha ras gsungs pa/ ye shes med na mthong ba che// 
88a4(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa med na gsal ba che// zhen pa med na bde ba che// gang du'ang mi gnas pa che gsung ngo // mai tri ka mA las gsungs pa/ sems nyid bzhi stong rtsa ba bral// las kyis 'ching bar mi 
88a5(rgyud 'grel): nus te// dngos por zhen pas de ltar min// de ltar rtag tu rang sems ltos gsung ngo // pad+ma badz+ra sa gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi b+ha ga ru// rig pa'i rdo rje gsor nas kyang // 
88a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med dang du sbyar byas nas// bde chen lhan cig skyes pa 'char gsung ngo // klu'i byang chub kyis gsungs pa/ mkha' la rlung 'phyo srab kyis zung // khang stong khyi yi spyod pa ltos/ 
88a7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i a ma sras mthong ba// bu ni pang du rgyug por nges gsung ngo // 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis gsungs pa/ rin chen gling du phyin na dbul dang bral// bla ma'i bka' 
88a8(rgyud 'grel): drin thob na 'khrul pa zhig/ sems kyi de nyid mthong na 'khor ba med// byang sems nang du 'byongs na 'gro don 'byung gsung ngo // rA dzA ha tis gsungs pa/ rtogs na gzhan don mi 
88b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// de ni sa yi gter bsrungs bzhin// 'di na tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thugs rjes sems can mi 'dzin nam gsung ngo // bzang po dpal gyis gsungs pa/ bdag dang sems 
88b2(rgyud 'grel): can dbyer med kyang // 'gro ba las kyis sdug bsngal bas// rgan chad med pa'i thugs rjes yis// 'gro ba'i don la rol du gsol gsung ngo // li'i bzang pos gsungs pa/ rab la
88b3(rgyud 'grel): yod kyang de ma shes// dbul mo gter gyis bslas pa bzhin// de nyid ma mthong sems can la// thags rjes sgron me gdeg du gsol gsung ngo // rnal 'byor ma 'du ti mas gsungs// 
88b4(rgyud 'grel): pa// chab dang chab rom tha dad min// snang dang stong pa dbyer mi byed// mkha' dang rlung la bye brag meng // sems dang sems byung de bzhin no gsung ngo // shing lo mas gsungs 
88b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ brag ca'i sgra 'di su yis smras// me long gzugs brnyan su yis bris// rmi lam ltad me gang du gyes// gang na'ang med do sems kyi ngang gsung ngo // dur khrod mas gsungs 
88b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ kun gzhi dag pa chos dbyings yin// yin des shes pa ye shes yin// bdag 'dzin zhig na rtsa bral yin// sgo lnga rang grol lam khyer yin gsung ngo // gcer bums
88b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ rang grol blo dang bral ba la// mi bcos sgo gsum lhag par zhog/ mi zhen dgag sgrub med par zhog/ mi g.yo mnyam nyid chen por bzhags gsung ngo // ro la ngas// / 
88b8(rgyud 'grel): mas gsungs pa/ ma yengs sgom du med pa la// nyams su min na mkhas pa yin// sna tshogs rjes med chen po ru// lam du khyer na grol ba yin gsungs// ma hA sid+d+ha si// 
89a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ ma bsgom ma bsgom blo ma bsgom// blo bsgom rtog pa'i 'khrul 'khor yin// rtog pas 'khor bar 'ching ba ste// blo dang bral la bsgom du med gsungs ngo // dri med 
89a2(rgyud 'grel): mas gsungs pa/ sems nyid ye stong ye bral la// skye med bsgoms pas dri zhig bya// sems byung rang shar dang krol lo// rtog pa spangs pas ci zhig bya gsung ngo // blo gros dbyangs mas gsungs 
89a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ nam mkha'i ye shes kun la khyab// ye grol chen mi mchog gi lam// mi g.yo mi 'gyur bsam las 'das// rtog med rang rig ye shes che gsung ngo // bdag med mas gsungs pa// 
89a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' nam mkha' mnyam nyid che// nyi ma nyi ma ye gsal che// chu bo chu bo rgyun chad med// 'ja' tshon rang grol bde ba che gsung ngo // gsal byed mas gsungs pa/ go ru med pa'i 
89a5(rgyud 'grel): don rtogs na// brjod du med pa'i gleng gzhi 'byung // bsam du med pa'i don bsgoms na// thob du med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung gsung ngo // bye ma lung pas gsungs pa/ gnyis med bde chen 
89a6(rgyud 'grel): don gyi mchog/ rang la yod pas gzhan du tshol// mi shes rtsol bas sgra phyir 'brangs// 'khrul ba'i sems can snying re rje gsung ngo // rdo rje gcig mas gsungs pa/ stong nyid nam mkha'i 
89a7(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam la// rang rig ye shes yi ger bris// sna tshogs thabs kyi gdams pa bkod// rgyan chad med pa'i bstan pa sgrogs gsung ngo // sngo sangs mas gsungs pa/ mi 'gyur
89a8(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i rdo rje la// g.yo 'gul 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul shar// sna tshogs skye 'gro'i bya ba byas// rang grol nam mkha'i dbyings su yal gsung ngo // gri skor mas gsungs pa/ ming dang 
89b1(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i ming mang pos// der 'dzin zhig pa'i blo bral po// yongs su grol ba'i byar med po// ye yin chen por rtogs par gyis gsung ngo // lam skyes mas gsungs pa/ dmigs bya
89b2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs byed mtha' spangs te// ting 'dzin rten dang bral ba la// chu bo chen po'i rgyun bzhin du// ma yengs nyams su blang bar bya gsungs ngo // bshes gnyen mas gsungs pa/ nam/ 
89b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i bya lam rjes med bzhin// rnal 'byor spyod pa rjes med yin// rang rgyud 'dzin pa med 'gyur na// mi dge bcu kyang 'ching mi nus gsung ngo // ro zan mas gsungs pa/ gser 'gyur 
89b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dang phrad pa bzhin// snang srid bde stong ror shar bas// dngos por 'dzin pa kun las grol// snang srid spros bral ye shes che gsung ngo // pad+mo shris gsungs pa/ gzhug ma lhan 
89b5(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes pa de// bsam bsgom blo yis ma bcos na// chos sku gzhan nas btsal mi dgos// rang chas yin no lhug par zhog gsung ngo // pad+ma'i rgyal mos gsungs pa/ rang rig ye 
89b6(rgyud 'grel): shes 'di rnyed na// bskal pa'i mun pa sgron me bzhin// las kyi 'khrul pa gtan nas bcom// skyes bu gnyid sad ji bzhin no gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma dkar mos gsungs pa 
89b7(rgyud 'grel): las zin skyes bu de ci sems// bram ze skud pa mkha' la ltos// nam mkha' gang gis za bar nus// khyod dang ngal tha dad med gsung ngo // lha sras dpal gzhir gyis gsungs pa/ stong nyid
89b8(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i snying po can// bde bar gshegs pa'i shul yin te// go las med par gsungs pas na// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bya// gsung ngo // rdo rje bde bas gsungs pa 
90a1(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo bsam gtan rgya chen po// g.yo 'gul sna tshogs kun gyi bzhi// g.yo dang mig yo dbyer med pas// bsgom dang mi bsgom 'di la med gsung ngo // ye shes zhabs 
90a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis gsungs pa/ gang du chos rnams ma mthong ba// de yis chos kun mthong bste// mthung thumathang byed kun las 'das// rang gi ye shes chen pa yin gsung ngo // k+shag+hA dpal 
90a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis gsungs pa/ gang du mthong tsher myong ba kun// de de'i ngo bos stong shes na// 'dod yon sems kyi rgyan yin te// 'ching bar mi 'gyur grol bar 'gyur gsung ngo // las kyi 'byung 
90a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyis gsung ngo // sems kyi ye shes gang mthong ba// chos kyi de nyid rtogs 'gyur te// chos rtogs pas ni bde ba thob gsung ngo // rgyan gyi rgyal mos gsungs pa/ dbyibs dang / 
90a5(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i mdog med po// ming dang bral ba'i don med po// sna tshogs rig pa'i bsam med po// spangs pa med pa'i thob med po gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma la ba can gyis gsungs pa/ 
90a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med ye shes chen po 'di// tshig gis mtshon par mi nus te// bla ma'i dus thabs brten pa las// gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin no// gsung ngo // thig le dag pa'i phreng ba 
90a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba// grub thob po mo brgyad cu'i rtogs pa brjod pa// mkha' 'gro mas yi ger btab ste// gsang mdzod na gnas pa las// dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas// 
90a8(rgyud 'grel): rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang ba/ zham lo tsA bas legs par bsgyur ba'o// // rdzogs s+ho// / bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal sras mi yi seng ge yis// mkha' 'gro 
90b1(rgyud 'grel): ma yi gsang tshig brtol// grub thob nyams kyi rtogs pa rnams// bka' rgya bkrol te gtad rgya byas// Ar+ya de bas thugs kyi rtogs pa 'gur du bzhengs pa/ kye 'o phung po lha yi ngo bor 
90b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// bum pa'i dbang bskur rang la rdzogs// sgra stong brag ca lta bur rtogs// gsang ba'i dbang la bltos mi dgos// nyams myong ba de chen khong nas sad// shes rab ye shes 
90b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang ldan// chos rnams nam mkha' lta bur rtogs// bzhi pa'i dbang gis don dang ldan gsung ngo // nA gA rdzu nas gsungs pa/ kye'o rtsa ba bral ba'i sems nyid 'di// chos rnam 
90b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rtsab yin// de las 'khor 'das sdong po gyis// bde sdug gnyis kyi lo 'ang ba rgyas// sna tshogs las kyi 'bras bu smin gsung ngo // mar pas gsungs pa/ kye ho sna tshogs
90b5(rgyud 'grel): snang la ngos bzung med// 'di zhes mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral// mig yo mi sems sems chen po// bla dgas tsam du brjod par zad// 'di la don du bzung du med gsung ngo // rdo rje 
90b6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu pas gsungs pa/ kye 'o dbang ldan pad+ma'i dbus na bde ba'i ye shes gnas// thabs kyi sbyor bas spos bral lhan cig skyes pa 'char// bde gshegs thugs kyi gdams bas
90b7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam// 'di ni gsang sngags thabs kyi gnad do ngo mtshar che gsung ngo // lU yi pas smras pa/ phung po'i dbus na gnyug ma'i ye shes me gcig po// sreg 
90b8(rgyud 'grel): dang rtsol bas bskyed na bde ba'i ye shes 'bar// bdag 'dzin sreg pa'i me 'di rlung gis spang bar bya// bde chen mchog 'di nam mkha'i khams su mi shong ngo gsung ngo // shAn+ta de bas/ 
91a1(rgyud 'grel): gzungs pa/ kye'o sems ni ye shes chen po ste// 'di las grad na sangs rgyas med// sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na// 'khor ba rang grol mya ngan 'das gsung ngo // b+his pas 
91a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ kye'i 'gro ba sna tshogs las kyis bcings// las kyi de nyid shes gyur na// bcings pa med de grol ba med// sgra mkhan ri mo ji bzhin no gsung ngo // g.yog pa ljon pa can gyis
91a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ kyai'o he ru ka dpal rdo rje'i sku// rnal 'byor ma ni las kyi yum// sna tshogs snang ba mchog gi zhing // 'gro ba lha dang lha mo ste// 'di ni 'khor ba'i ming yang med gsung ngo // a 
91a4(rgyud 'grel): bad+hU tI pas gsungs pa/ bshis kyi stong zhing 'o ma'i mtsho// thabs kyis rol pa srub ma'i shing // dad brtson shes mas rtsol byas nas// sku gsum mar gyi gong bu 'grel gsung ngo // dur 
91a5(rgyud 'grel): da dbang phyug gis snusgru ba/ mthang du med de semasaHdran// bsam med dog zhug ma dang // dgag thub med pa sbyin pa pa ltas// btsal du med pa kyad can dgasung // ye shes 
91a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyong gis smras pa/ tsaM snang stong dbyer med lhan cig stes// gi slong dpyir med lhan cig skyes// gnyis med ye shes lhan cig skyes// rgyu 'brus dbyer med lhan cig skyes// 'di tha dadangs 
91a7(rgyud 'grel): mi mthong gisung // l-i le'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ sna tshogs snang ba rang gi sem so// sems ni sems kyi rang bzhin bra la// thig la chen po chos kyi skye// 'odi las mi sgrog zhas

91b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung // sa 'dzin zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ lus kyi 'khor lo bzhi 'khor bas// srid rtse'i sdong po gcod par byed// rtsa yi rgyal po spangs pa yis// thar pa'i srog shing 'dzugs par byed//

91b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// bya bran nam mkha'i dbyings su spong // bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu de// a ma'i bang du chug par byed// gsung ngo // phyogs kyi glang pos smras/ pa/ rig pa'i sgron me sbar ba yis// log/ 
91b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog mun pa rab bsal te// gzharan gyi sde pakun bcom nas// rang gi mtshan nyid mtshar du med gsung ngo // dpa' bo dril bu'i zhabs kyis smras pa/ dga' ba'i ye shes spar ba yis// gzhug ma'i
