91b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu me yi bde ba'am// khur bar chu thugs ji bzhin du// mtshan du 'dreg par ngas ma mthong gsung ngo // nAg bo d+his gsungs pa// gnyis med spos bral nam mkha'i dang // ming med 
91b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes pade chen po// bsam med brjod pa'i mtha' las 'dres// 'gyur ming chos su ngo mtshar che// gsung ngo // tog rtse bas gsungs pa/ ltos shig nam mkha'i dkyil du ltos// ma 
91b8(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba ni de mthong yin// sdod cig rgya mtsho'i bzhing du spong // mig yi ba ni dgongs pa yin// zung cig bar sngang rlung ba zung // ngos bzung med ni stong pa yin gsung ngo // nag po zhabs 
92a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsungs pa/ lam gyi de zhid mthong goms na// 'chi ba'i 'od gsal gdon mi za// las kyi 'phen pa nam mkhas khyer// dus der chos nyid ma bu phrad gsung ngo // b+hi na zhabs 
92a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis smras pa/ snang stong thabs dang shes rab la// bla ma'i ngo spyad brda yis rol// rig pa'i ye shes khong nas sad// bde chen lhan cig skyes pa rtogs gsung ngo // pad+ma'i myu gus smras 
92a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sna tshogs snang ba las kyi phyag rgya ste// der 'dzin stong pa chos kyi phyag rgya yin// gnyis med dang las mi 'da' dam tshig ste// der 'dzin blo dang bral na phyag rgya che gsung ngo // mtsho skyes 
92a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes smras pa// lte ba mkha' dbyings gru gsum du// rig pa'i lha mo'i sku gsal te// 'od zer spro bsdus 'gro don byed// sku gsum gzhan nas btsal mi dgos gsung ngo // gu d+ha ri 
92a5(rgyud 'grel): ga ngas pa/ shes rdo rnaMs namamakha'i mngag/ rgyagasu 'byung ze'i na 'phrul ga // daseMs pa med pa na thug// 'ang+ka phrul med par dang 'dzugs// mam+b+hal ldan rjes 
92a6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i don gsungs so// ti lo pas gsungs pa/ kye'o ltos shig yul la ltos// snang ba sna tshogs rig pa'i rtsal// 'dod yon sna tshogs sems kyi rgyan// bde sdug sna tshogs gzhug 
92a7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rtsal// gar yang ma phyin nam mkha'i bya// snang ba sna tshogs gzigs mor che gsung ngo // nA ro pas gsungs pa/ spyi gtsug pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// mtshan ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru// 
92a8(rgyud 'grel): chu dang dkar gyil ma la 'gro shes na// mtshams med lnga po byed kyang grol// gsang ljags thabs kyi khyad par yin gsung // kr-iSh+Na pas smras pa/ rtse gsum gsal ba'i me long la// sems kyi 
92b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po ba lta shes na// 'khrul pa'i yul gyis mi phrogs te// gzhug ma'i rdzongs la nges par gnas gsung ngo // b+ha du las smras pa/ kar yul la bcings pa yis// rtog pa'i 'gyur ba 
92b2(rgyud 'grel): gcod par byed// lta stangs snga phyi rjes pa yis// bying rgod thun skyon sel bar byed// gnyen po'i rtsol ba bshig pa yis// gzhug ma rang la 'khor bar byed gsung ngo // Dom+bi he ru kas 
92b3(rgyud 'grel): smras pa// las kyi phyag rgya las byung ba'i// dga' bzhi'i ye shes phyag rgya rje// snang ba zag med spros dang bral// gzhug ma don gyi ye shes mthong gsung ngo // ka nA pas smras pa/ 
92b4(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid spros dang bral ba nam mkha'i dang // rgya mtsho shel dang me tog bzhin// sang de rjen ne sa le ba// dran du mang med cing yongs su med// ci rigs tsam du goms par bgyis// 
92b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // ban+d+ha badz+ra sa smras pa/ gnyis med ye shes chen po 'di// bstan du yod de mtshon du med// goms su yod de bsgoms du med// myong du yod de brjod du med// gsung ngo // 
92b6(rgyud 'grel): kam+ba las smras pa/ sdang ba'i ngo bo stong pa'i ror// spor cig yul la yengs pa'i tshe// bde ba'i ngo bo gsal ba'i ror// spor cig sems la bltas pa'i tshe// rtogs pa'i ngo bor 
92b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams kyi ror// spor cig chags sdang skyes pa'i tshe// gsung ngo // pradz+nyA pha las smras pa/ sna tshogs sna tshogs de de nyid// dgag pa med cing bsgrub pa med// dran pa'i rtsi dang ma bral 
92b8(rgyud 'grel): bar// spang blang med par rol du gsol gsung ngo // dpa' bo rdo rjes smras pa/ sems kyi thig le yi ge'i dbye bas// rlung gis bskyod de mkha' la 'phur// las kyi sgo bzhi 
93a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gags nas kyang // bde chen gnas su 'pho bar byed// gsung ngo // shrI ba tas smras pa/ dug sprul bsad la glang chen gcong // bu ni mkha' la spar bar bya// btsun mo lta 
93a2(rgyud 'grel): sras yul phyung la// rgyal po bcom na nges par grol gsung ngo // gnyis mid sbas pas smras pa/ yon tan thams cang 'byung ba'i gnas// skye bo'i bla ma legs mchod na// 'dod pa 
93a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// bya ba mang pos ci zhig bya gsung ngo // in+d+ra bo d+his smras pa/ sna tshogs yul gyi snang ba 'di// rig pa ye shes rgyan yin pas// mi spang de bzhin nyid du 
93a4(rgyud 'grel): byu bal la lugs ldanas pa/ d+hA sa sa g+sa m+b+ha/ d+hAr bzhin/ 
93a5(rgyud 'grel): du ma ro gcig bde bar 'bar// nags kyi me la rlung bzhin du// rkyen de na sna tshogs lam gyi grogs gsung ngo // ku la ma ris smras pa/ gzhim bcos tshos dbyings pho brang du// lam 
93a6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i ye shes lham me ba// de bdegasal stong pa'i ngar gyis rdeg/ don tshes sku gnyis med kyi dang du grol gsung ngo // rat+na bi d+his smras pa// ma bcos rnal ma'i shes pa de// 
93a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom de ba'i rwa zhing du bzhug/ bcos pa thams cad blo yin te// b+h+yo las grol na thar pa'i lam gsung ngo // pad+ma badz+ra sa smras pa/ gang gis sems kyi don mthong na// rtsub bral 
93a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sdong bu bzhir// sna tshogs snang bas 'ching mi nus// sems kyi de nyid yin phyir ro// gsung ngo // ram pa la sa smras pa/ gang du rtogs pa blo yin la// gang du snyoms pa rdog pa 
93b1(rgyud 'grel): ste// gang du spyod kyang bcos ma ning // ji ltar bsgrubs kyang 'dod pa'i lam// 'di kun byis pa'i rtsed mo yin// mkhas pa rnams la ci yang med// gsung ngo // klu'i byang chub kyis 
93b2(rgyud 'grel): smras pa/ yi ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// rlung gi de nyi shes gyur na// sems kyid nyi ni gus par 'gyur// sebs rtogs pas ni bde ba che// gsung // kArma badz+rA sa smras pa/ 'khrul 
93b3(rgyud 'grel): rnapas nga// ma su la khrula'i ljir 'jug s+ho// bcos ma'i byug pa maung // sa ga zus pa'i dun mabyung na// lhas rdul khrul gzhal 'du// gasrung /

93b5(rgyud 'grel): pas smras pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di// khyod kyis spros dang dri ltar yin// ma myong shes na myong ba'i mchog/ mi btsal de bzhin zhing du bzhugs gsung ngo // su ka ra sid+d+his
93b6(rgyud 'grel): smras+yA paM/ gang la zhen pa'o blo de thong // rtog pa gnyis ni mtshungs par sgrib// rtog dang bral nubasgom du med// bsam du med pa de ltar dran gsung ngo // ye shesta rdo rjes smras pa/ kun 
93b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhi dag pa'i dbyings nas rig pa'i zhim shar// rgya mtsho nor bu'i gling nas yid bzhin nor bu lon// 'gro ba'i ma rig ling tig shes rab thur mas phye// 'khor ba'i chu bo bzhi las thab 
93b8(rgyud 'grel): ldan bla mas bskal gsung ngo // mtsho skyes rdo rjes smras pa/ dpe yi ye shes mtshon du med// don gyi ye shes bsgom du med// thabs kyi mon ngag sA ru med// bla ma'i drin lan 'khor thabs/

94a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor los gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i snang ba gcod// rtogs pa'i 'khor los 'khor 'das gnyis kyi re dogs gcod gsung ngo // grub thob lnga bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa// thig le
94a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod nas phyung ste/ rje dam pa rgya gar rin po che la gnang ba/ zham lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o// rdzogs s+ho// // 6/ phyag rgya chen po rin chen brda' man

94b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma ka~M ka khrag ldag mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ chang gis drod par rdol bas sngar snang 'jig/ 'khor los sgyur rgyal bya ba gzhan mi byed// dbul mo gter ngo shes tshe sngar spyad

98b1(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rmi lam ltad mo su yis byas pa yin// bram chab med pa'i bu mo brjed ngas che// skyed bsrungs la brtson 'bras bu mi len blu na// mkha'i chu 
98b2(rgyud 'grel): ni smin pa'i dgun 'brul 'bar gsung // dur khrod chen po sgra sgrogs su mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dung can mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ lha khang nang du dmus long ltang mo nub// ji sring shing yod// 
98b3(rgyud 'grel): bar du de srid me// seMs ka'i cha ba rom gzhi la sdod mi srid// sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'grul la rtog pa bral// nor bu'i yon tan sus kyang byin pa med// bskal pa ma zhig nyi zla'i 'od mi 'gag/ khong sa na/ 
98b4(rgyud 'grel): ma byang gyad la rgyu rtsal med// rgya mtshor ba'i ba'i chu thigs skam mi 'gyur gsung // dpal shrI na len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du mkha' 'gro ma rin chen 'od gsal mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ smyon pa'i 
98b5(rgyud 'grel): mig gis nya dang stong mi mthong // rlan med sbyin la 'byar ba'i nus pa med// skyes bu med pa'i lcags kyus glang mi zin// thod le kor gyis nam mkha' mtshon mi nus gsung ngo // phyag rgya chen 
98b6(rgyud 'grel): po brda'i man ngag las// dpal gyi thugs rnam par bkod pa'i dum bu// mkha' 'gro ma rin chen gcig mas bsdus pa ste/ lnga pa'o// // rgya mtsho gser gyi gling du mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje bu 
98b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ shing rta dang ni 'khor lo 'bral mi bya// dug sbrul dgra ru skong ldan par 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ni dngul gyis ldang // glang po dul tshe snying 
98b8(rgyud 'grel): la yi ge 'jug gsung ngo // nub phyogs bi ra'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma sha za dpal 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// ge sar steng du 'dab ma gdan du gding // thar pa 'dod pas khyab 'jug 
99a1(rgyud 'grel): mig la blta// stobs dang ldan pas gser 'gyur rtsi mchog ni// di ring ban+da'i drin las rab tu rnyed gsung ngo // dur khrod rab dga'i nang du mkha' 'gro ma nor bu'i 'od can gyis rtogs/ 
99a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i brda brjod pa/ grang ba'i nad lag bur bsten mi bya// tshangs pa'i yi ge sma ru ma gtub po// gi baM zad pa'i glang po sgrog las thar// dngul chu'i rus pa lha dbang mig la phan gsung // shar 
99a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kharma pa Ni'i gtsug lag khang du/ mkha' 'gro ma bu ta ro zan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjed pa/ sbrul sngags shes pa'i nad la dug mi tshugs// 'chi ba'i dus der rgyal srid ci zhig bya// sna 
99a4(rgyud 'grel): khrid med pa'i long ba gang du 'gro/ phag gis glang po mtshon te ma mtshon no gsung ngo // dur khrod ma hA kA la'i dbus su/ mkha' 'grom dpal gyi phreng ba can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rmi lam 
99a5(rgyud 'grel): lhung mo rang gi sems la byas// me nI sgra ba dag la rab tu 'bar// yi ge gcig gis rig byed kun la 'jug/ rig byed kun gyis yi ge gcig ma shes gsung ngo // bA ra NA sir mkha' 'gro ma 
99a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan dung 'bud mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sde gzhan dang ni gser 'gyur rtsi mi 'dra// nya rgyas zla bas shel la chu rgyun 'dzag/ sbu ba'i chu rgyun rgya mtshor rang la thim// mkhas pa ba lang 
99a7(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba drag shul 'dor gsung ngo // chu mig mda' chu khron pa skyes pa'i rtsar mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma gser dril can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ ri breg pas mtha' dben pa'i gnas ma yin/ 
99a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i pho brang tsheng 'dus rab tu 'gol// byad ni me long rgyab du blta mi bya// snag tsha byi ba'i yi ge snying gis klag gsung ngo // glang po ljongs kyi grong khyer du mkha' 'gro ma khrag sna rgyal mos rtogs
99b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i brda brjod pa/ nam mkha'i yid can mkha' las 'phags ma nus// drang srong rgyal mtshan zar pa'i lam ma yin// dkyil 'khor gyis kyang mya ngan las mi 'da'// 'bras bu mchog ni smyon pa'i 
99b2(rgyud 'grel): sems las btsal gsung ngo // byang phyogs sman gyis nags su mkha' 'gro ma gtsug na rgyun grol mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ bag rgod mgo bo rdog pas mnan pa'i mi// skyes bu de yis gdam 
99b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag thams cad bstan// ded dpon bu yis nam mkha'i yi ge klags// grogs dag 'di yi zhabs la 'dud par rigs gsung // dpal 'bras spungs su mkha' 'gro ma dpol ldan gru 'dzin mas 
99b4(rgyud 'grel): dgus pa'i ba dzu pa/ dza la lang sas bag bye phyur// rlu ldan sa ma chad ba na/ A ba s+thAn pa tshong ba'i phyi ma thug sa ti mA Sh+Ta n+b+ha m+b+hi ba ma TIg / 
99b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten rnam dag gi rtsar/ dpal rang byung gi rgyal mes rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ kye bla rnams seng ge'i 'ama'athung // phan pa'i sman mar phyir ma sdug cig/ snying gi dbus su nyi ma shar nas 
99b6(rgyud 'grel): su// mun pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms par 'gyur gsung ngo // phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las/ las rnam par grol ba'i dum bu/ mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan pad+ma'i spyan gyis bsdus 
99b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ dum bu drug pa'o// // le pan lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ phyag rgya chen po rin po che brda'i man ngag/ rje dam pa la mkha' 'gro mas gtad de/ zham lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o// rdzogs ste// shub+haM// 
99b8(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'grim rdo rjeg mang ba'i sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ DA ki ni badz+ra gu h+ya gI ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gsang ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 
100a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bdag med la phyag 'tshal lo// u dum+bA ra'i ut+pal rgyun du 'khrungs pa dkon// g.yul ngo mi ldogs gyad kyi dgos pa stor// nor bu'i gling nas stong 'dab byed nus sam// 'khor 
100a2(rgyud 'grel): lo'i rtsibs la zhen pa'i skyes bla zol// chu bo chen po'i rgyun 'di bcang mi nus// lcags kyi pa pong byin la 'dril bar dka'// zhi tha'i 'khor lo rlung gis bzlog mi nus// mig ser nad kyis btab 
100a3(rgyud 'grel): na drung yang ser// byang po lha'i thug par ni zla'i 'od mi 'char// skyes bu dang sreg der ba'i dpa' bo blun// dug 'di srog gi bdud yin mang ro yang dor// rgal 'byol ba'i mnyan pa bya bta' 
100a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod// nad la phan pa'i sman ni kha yang bza'// puN+Da ri ka'i sa bon ma mthong ngam// lha sras bzos pa chen kun gyis 'khrur// tsheng dus 'gron po 'brel med tshogs kyi 'gyes// sbrang ma 
100a5(rgyud 'grel): btsud mang bas sdug bsngal bskyed// ngal sar mkhar lan byed pa'i skyes bu blun// sgyu ma'i yul la mkhan po chags mi ste// brag tsha'i sgra 'di stod slad smra mi byed// rmi lam bde sdug 'di ni sad
100a6(rgyud 'grel): bas stong // phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgud las// brul tsho dang pa'o// // a ma mthong ba'i bu chung gzhan la yid mi 'chor// skyes bu skom gyis gdungs pa kha zas gzhan mi 'dod// mkha' la 
100a7(rgyud 'grel): 'brug sgra bsgrags pas dus kyi yid ches byas// khyim bdag khe mthong las la ngal ba med// nad kyis zhen pa'i mi ni dpyad la dga'// ded dpon nor bu 'dod phyir rtsol ba byed// nye zho med 
100a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshang tshol khrag rta sgrim// drang srong rig ldan yanga'i kha zas spong // dor sdebs mthun pa'i glang po rol du bde// dge slong gzhon nu'i bsam pa dran gyis la// til dar ldan pa'i gri thogs 
100b1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rgyug/ mar me'i 'od la btsal thabs legs su gyis// gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu 'di la ltos// bung bas rtsi bcud ma lus ro gcig bsdud// gyad ni dpung bzhir bcas te dgra dpung 
100b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms// rgol ba'i mi ldog stobs ldan ci'i phyir// gsang tshig mi sgrub blun po gros mi dbang // bka' bzhin mi bsgrub rgyal pos gshed ma spong // srog gol dgra la bzod par mi rung ba sre// 
100b3(rgyud 'grel): rig byed mkhan po'i rgyud ni shaM yang slob// khrims la gnas pa'i rgyal po sems rgya bskyed// phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ bral cho gnyis pa'o// / yid bzhin nor bu khung du khung nas kyang // 
100b4(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang ldan pa'i glang po zhon byas te// bdud rtsi gangs kyi zhun ma btung bar bya// chu bo sgrol ba'i grul zag ldan gdab// sgong mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan ltos// srog dang bral 
100b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skyes bu de ci sems// mkhan bzos ma byas bse ru'i gzugs la blta// btso bsreg ma byas sa bon myu gu'i rgyu// bram ze skud pa mkhal ba'i drung du sdong // nabun 'thibs so 'di ni rlung 
100b6(rgyud 'grel): gis gtor// glang chen spyon pa 'di ni lcags su gzhug/ bung bas me tog rtsi thob phyir mi blta// mkha' la 'ja' tshon skyon bral rang sar yal// 'grul pos chu sgrol gru yi gces 'dzin zhig 
100b7(rgyud 'grel): mthong byed mig dang bral pos yul rnams 'gags// rgyal po'i bka' la brnyas na chad pa'i gnas// mthon po'i rtson ltung ba 'i gnas yin gzobs// 'dab gsheg ya 'gal gyis ni 'phur 
100b8(rgyud 'grel): mi nus// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul skye 'gro'i dpal du shar// mkha' las char rgyun bab pas rtsi thog 'khrungs// ded dpon rgan po'i gling don gzhan gyi phyed// phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las// 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): grul tsho gsum pa'o// // dig mas tshig tu smras pa med// chu shel zla ba su yis byas// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ngo mtshar che// nam mkha'i dbyibs dang kha dog pu 
101a2(rgyud 'grel): yis mthong // bar snang dngas pa'i nus pa gang gi mthu// ni bun 'di la ngos bzung 'dug gi ci// rna dbang skal zin pa'i ri dgas blun// dbang po yul gyis non pa'i ri dgas ltos// gnyen
101a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ga ldan pa / pa zhag/ la~M zla ba mar+b+ba la kA na ng+yas// la rnaM ma gas la ma du d+hA wAn// rdzu ma pa pa'i myu ma sbyin 'du ba sdu snang // mamasas 
101a4(rgyud 'grel): ral gris rgol ba 'joms// khro bo'i gzugs bar na 'di yis byis pa bsdigs// gnam lugs thog gi shugs la swa sI med// chu yi zla ba 'di la yid mi gtang // 'ja' tshon rje 
101a5(rgyud 'grel): bos stong pas spang blang med// na bun mkha' la yal ba'i byungs ltos// dngos med mun pa khyab pa'i nam mkha' las// sna tshogs mdangs dang ldan pa'i lho sbyin 'thabs// char rgyun du mas 
101a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i lo tog rgyas// phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ thul tshe bzhi pa'o// // myu gu mgo rtsa gnyis su gyes kyang gcig gi stobs// chu nang zla ba cha med nam mkha'i cho 'phrul yin// ga 
101a7(rgyud 'grel): bur nus pa 'di yis snyun drug byas pa med// chab rom snang yang chu las gud na grub pa ming // na bun 'di yi rang bzhin cha med gzung bas stong // me long nang du gzugs med rkyen shar snang ba cwag// 
101a8(rgyud 'grel): mog shem bu yi pha ma khyod kyis mthong ngam ci// skad cig 'di la dus gsum khong nas dag pa yin// li tsa byaM yis smras pa khyod kyis ji ltar go/ a lung ngo shes byis pa dadus brang du med// 2 
101b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la'i mtshad rtogs nas ni 'jigs mi dgos// nor bu lag du lon pa'i ded dgon dbul dang bral// shel gyi rang bzhin mi 'gyur tshon gyis bcos su med// nam mkha' ma grub phyir na sprin gyis
101b2(rgyud 'grel): gang la sgrib// gser la gzugs brnyan du ma byas kyang gser nyid yin// grib ma gzugs las byung bar shes pas spang blang med// drang srong rnams kyi rig pas sman dug dbyer ma phyed// dbul 
101b3(rgyud 'grel): mo gter dang phrad tshe bcol ba'i las ri byed// nam mkha' nam mkha' bstan pas nam mkha' phyo nang 'dres// spang blang med pa'i nam mkha' la ni 'byung bzhi shar// 'byung bzhi'i rtsal du 'gro 
101b4(rgyud 'grel): ba gso bskyed byas// phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las// la bzla ba'i bral tshe ste lnga pa'o// // zhung pa brtson 'grus ldan pa la// lus ngag las la drub pa meng// mtshan dpes brgyan pa
101b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo saM sbyar// gang na sar gdon pa'i bya ba gces// lA yi bu mo yid 'ongam// sku ma tsam du brtse bar bya// mdung rtse lnga la nga bru da // nam mkha'i 'a ma dbug par bya// bems sag dang 
101b6(rgyud 'grel): bu ba zhi la dbab// gzhon dus byas pa zas kyis skol// gdis kyi thigs pa mi spo bir// dpyid thag 'dren pa'i theg pa bzung // rlung gis mkha' la sbar nas kyang // chu bran yur ba bzung 
101b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya// chab rom smin pa rdo yi mi// skye dang 'chi bas bsla mi shes// des ni mchog gi nor bu'i gter// rma bya'i zas ni bcan du gnyid// me yis tshig la me nyid sman// 'dod can rnams 
101b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi don du ni// thabs kyi khyad par gzhan las 'phags// phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las// rtsa ba'i de nyid bstan pa ste// brul tsho drug pa'o// // rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i gzugs// 
102a1(rgyud 'grel): srid dang zhi ba'i byed pa po// srid pas gzugs su bzung bas 'ching // zhi bas drer 'dzin spros dang bral// srid pas dbus su bcug pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa 'dzin par byed// 
102a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gsum 'khor lo bzhi sogs kyi// lus rnams kun la khyab par gnas// 'byung dang 'jug deng gnas dang gsum// yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// dgu brgya bcu gcig grangs them nas//

102a4(rgyud 'grel): mgur las// rlung gi dzin du bshad pas// bral chu bdun pa'o// drug rje chen po brda'i man ga las/ mkha' gro mdza dzagasang ba'i mthar// bral tshwa bdun du bstan pa'o// 
102a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod na gnas pa las// dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ ka ma la shI la la gtad/ zham lo tsA ba ston pa seng ge rgyal pos bskur ba'o// rdzogs ste/ 
102a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro byin brlabs rtogs pa'i brda// til ni sgron mes gsal bar byed// sngags kyis btab pa'i sman bzhin du// rma bya'i zas nA gzhan gyis min/ 
102a7(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan ri dgas lte ba'i dri// chu yi rlabs ni rgya mtsho nyid// gsal ba'i rang bzhin ras dkar 'dra// ri bo bskyod par mi nus pas// gang sa ri chu las gzhan med de// dri dang skrag sgra tha dad 
102a8(rgyud 'grel): man// nyi zla'i yon tan gsal ba yin// bya yi rjes ni tshil mi byed// nam mkha' rtog ge'i spyod yul mini// maN+Dal phyogs cha rab du snyoms// ro langs bya sar dkon de bzhin// dpe 
102b1(rgyud 'grel): yid de mtshar nor bu shel// zhes rngon pa chen po sa ra ha sa/ ka la ma la shI la la lta ba'i brda bstan pa'o// // dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gros byin brlabs bsgom pa'i brda/ 
102b2(rgyud 'grel): tshang tshing nags kyi dur khod du// bdag med ma dang phrang byas la// nyi shar pa yi bsam pa yis// las zin pa yi skyes bu bzhin// spyi bo'i nor bu mchod nas kyang // khang pa stong pa'i khyi bzhin 
102b3(rgyud 'grel): du// sman pa'i don ster nam mkhar khyer// chu bo chen po'i rgyun 'bab bzhin// drang srong ku sha'i steng du bzhag/ mar me rlung dang bral ba bzhin// dngul dkar me long phyi bar bya// yid 'ong bral 
102b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'im bzhin du// rus sbrul 'khar gzhing nyi ma la// rtsal ldan 'phod slob brtson pa ste// mda' mkhan yid ni gcig tu gtong // gdams pa'i gtsar ni nges par grol// gser las byas pa'i 
102b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan bzhin du// bur ma rol myang bar bya// zhes rngon pa chen pos// ka ma la shI la la bsgom pa'i brda bstan pa'o// // dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro byin brlabs spyod pa'i 
102b6(rgyud 'grel): brda// bag ma 'am sbyin pa'i tshul bzung ste// glang po btsongs la bag rgod pas daM// nya ni rgya mtshor yangs pa che// nags rnams me yis rab tu bsreg/ reb 'ga' mgyogs pa'i rta la zhin// 
102b7(rgyud 'grel): gri gug rnon po'i mtshon gyis ni// lce spyang dur khrod rnam par rol// spyan gzigs zas la rtag tu spyad// khra yi rtsal ni nges par drag/ wa ni dur khrong rnam par rol// chang 'thungs pa yis yul 
102b8(rgyud 'grel): mthong 'dra// me tog zlum bung ba ste// bu chung seng ge me long 'dra// stag ni 'jigs pa med par rgyu// sgron me rtag tu thogs byas te// glang po zhan la kun tu rgyug/ zhes rngon pa chen pos// kam 
103a1(rgyud 'grel): la shI la la spyod pa'i brda bstan pa'o// // dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro byin brlabs 'bras bu'i brda// ge sar pad+mo'i dkyil nas 'khrungs// shel gyi 'od 
103a2(rgyud 'grel): zer nang nas shar// rma bya'i ri mo su yis bris// 'ja' tshen nam mkha'i tshe 'phrul yin// rtog med re ba nor bu bslang // 'dab gshog med par 'phur mi nus// gtsug stan me ni rtsol bas
103a3(rgyud 'grel): babyin// shing ni rang gis rang la bsreg/ gser gyi kha dog 'tshur gyis 'don// dgra med mi ni zan dang bral// gnyis sad skyes bu de ci sems// byis pa a lus 'brid pa ltos// nam mkha' 
103a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' nam mkha'i dang // chu bran rgya mtsho'i dbyings su 'dres// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar che// chu zla dam yod mA yin// zhes rngon pa pas/ kA ma shI la 'bras bu'i brda bstan pa'o// 
103a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' gros byin brlabs lam gyi brda// sdom ni tshang las mi 'da'abar// ri bong 'di yi spyod 'gros ltos// khwa yi rtsal yangs pa med// rtag tu 'khor/ 
103a6(rgyud 'grel): lo'i rtsel zhon// rdza mkhan bul yangs pa med// ral gri til dar ldan pa gces// me la rlungs gis bskyod pa yis// tshang tshing nags kyi dur khrod bsreg/ bram ze skud pa 'khal la ltos// 
103a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu mchog/ snying phyung de ni mi ro yin// mar me rlung gis ma bskyed par// 'khor lo'i srub thag bcad par bya// sprin med mkha' la nyi shar bzhin// lho sprin rlung gis 
103a8(rgyud 'grel): brda bar bya// 'ja' mtshon 'di yis byis pa bslus// so mtshams mkhar gyi bdag po ltos// rin chen gter gyi mel tshe gyis// nam mkhas nam mkha' grol bar nges// zhes rngon 
103b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ba chen pos ka ma la shI la lam gyi brda bstan pa'o// // dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gros byin rlabs nyams kyi brda// dkar po'i zla ba rim pa ste// 'ja' tshon nam mkha' nyid la 
103b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// gzhon nus smras pa ci ste go/ chus bkang nas ni spar mi btub// khug rna dang ba'i rnam pa bzhin// dbul mo gter ldan ngo mtshar che// lan tshwa chu bo nyid la thim// bya ni mkha' las 'da' 
103b3(rgyud 'grel): mi nus// dgras bslus gnyen la'ang yid mi gtong // ral gri ngar ldan ngo mtshar che// rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jigs mi byed// wa yis seng ge skrag pa min// bu ni mkha' la rtsol bsgrub med// 
103b4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dang tshe 'phrul tha dad min// nam mkha' gang gis za bar nus// chu ni ma rnyogs bzhag na drangs// 'di nyid yin dang ma yin zhes// sus byas su yis go ba su// zhes rngon pa po chen pos// 
103b5(rgyud 'grel): ka ma la shI la zhams kyi brda bstan pa'o// // dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' bgros byin brlabs garlad kyi brda// seng ge glang chen phag rgod bsad// rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong po bzhin/ 
103b6(rgyud 'grel): nags kyi ri dgas ga la la tshung// gzings kyi bya rog gar bder mthong // dngas pa'i chur ni gzugs brnyan bzhin// nam mkha' la mtshon gyis bkur mi nus/ ri bo rlung gis bskul ba min// 
103b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho chen po gting mi g.yo// snying phyung de ni skal bar ldan// seng ge'i gsob la byis pa 'jigs// bung ba'i spyod pa yid kyis ltos// bu shi'i mya ngan sems la zhog/ sgron me lag tu thogs 
103b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mi// kun gyi sna la 'gro bar gyis// de nas nam mkha'i phyi nang 'dre// zhes gsungs te/ rngon pa pa chen pos/ ka ma la shI la gnad kyi gdams pa bstan pa'o// rdzogs s+ho// 
104a1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi gsang babab don parda'i klung grangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta gu h+ya gam+b+hi rA tha gI ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems kyi gsang ba zab don brda'i glur blangs pa zhes bya ba/ 
104a2(rgyud 'grel): sha ba ri dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// kye'o chu dang 'o ma so sor nam mkha'i mthongs su bsres pa rtog med dang po'i mchu des bsdus nas sad// 'dab chags thug pa'i mig gis sna tshogs mun pa'i 
104a3(rgyud 'grel): khrod na snang ba so sor mthong ba phyi rol min// 'dab chags ne cos nyi ma'i 'od la rtsi shing nags khrod mthong la dga' zhing rtsel lhag par chags// rma bya drug gi lo ma zos pas su sdug lhag par mdzes 
104a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kha dog mdongs ni su yis bris// sgeg mo gzhan gyi dri ma dag pa'i mdod can me long blta la rab tu brtson pa shes par gyis// srin po'i gling las thar pa'i ded dpon dri za'i grong mthong de la 
104a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas bcas don chen 'grub pa mtshar// drang srong chu yi zla ba blta zhing nyi zla'i phreng ba 'greng la brtson pa gtsang sbra lhag par che// rgyal pos dgra thabs kyis ni bkug ste bcings nas bsad pas srid dang 
104a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa thob ste g.yon can min// ging pa srog gcod mkhas pa nyin bzhin srog gcod de la sdig pas mi gos gshin rje gshed// rdzi bo thabs mkhas lcags kyus stobs ldan glang po'i kha lo ji 
104a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'dod bzhin skur ba phyi rol min// mig 'phrul mkhan po sa zhi zla ba rkus te mun khung nang du sbas pas gza' skar thams cad dbang du 'dus// tshangs pa'i ril ba chus bkang mi 'dzag dag
104a8(rgyud 'grel): byed rgyud du 'chang bshes na rten 'brel che ba yin// dpyid dus me tog mgul chad lhung ba shing thog ro ldan 'gyur bar re ba'i mi de 'dzel tri yin// rdza so ma btang skad der chu blugs mi 'dzag
104b1(rgyud 'grel): min pas me nang bdug la ti tsha mkhas par bya// khug rta skom yang sa dang 'bab pa'i chu ni mi 'thung nam mkha'i char rgyun 'dzed par shes par bya// lkugs par sdod pa'i mi des khab len rdo yis 
104b2(rgyud 'grel): lcags phye bsdus pas rgya mtshor zla ba gza' yis bzung // dus mtha'i mdung rtser 'bab pa'i tshangs pa'i dngul chu de la gzugs mdzes brten pa'i rgyal po lhag par dga'// zo chun 'khor los
104b3(rgyud 'grel): khron pa'i chu rnams gyen du drangs pas mchog gi lo tog smin pa e ma'o// zab mo brda'i glu gsang ba'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // sha ba ri dbang phyug gis dam pa la gsungs pa/ dam pa'i 
104b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas zham lo tsA bas gtan la phab ste/ dpal dang ri mkhan pa'i khrod du bskur ba'o// // bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal nas// gang gis ma rtogs pa yis/ 
104b5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i spyod pa mi bya ste// byas na rgyal po'i khrims la dmangs kyis gnod pa byas pa bzhin// rtogs pa rnams kyis ma rtogs pa yi spyod pa mi bye ste// byas na glang chen dag ni 'dam du bying ba 'dra
104b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so// slob dpon sa ra ha'i zhal nas/ kye'o grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa ste// gzhan nas rnyed min zhal la dris// don dam gzhon gyi ngo bo de rtogs na// yid ni gar 'ching rlung yod chad pa 
104b7(rgyud 'grel): med gsung ngo // slob dpon tog tse ba'i zhal nas// tha mal shes pa snying gi dbus su sad// tshogs drug dag na bde chen rgyun mi 'chad// brtags pa thams cad don med g.yeng ba'i rgyu// 
104b8(rgyud 'grel): sgom du med pas gnyug ma'i ngang la zhog gsung ngo // slob dpon sa man+ta 'dza'i zhal nas// phyag rgya chen po rang la lhun gyis grub pa ste// mi bas ma mi rig 'bad pa med pa rang gis zhog/ chad pa
105a1(rgyud 'grel): med de sngon du nyams myong rang gis rig/ rtag par mi 'gyur mngon zhen med par zung du 'jug gsung ngo // slob dpon ka na pa'i zhal nas/ shing rta'i 'khor lo gcig dang mi ldan 'gro bar mi 
105a2(rgyud 'grel): nus bzhin// sbyin sogs 'dab pa byas kyang bla ma'i man ngag med na dngos grub dam pa med// bya rgod rtsal rdzogs 'dab mar bcas pa dag ni mkha' la spyod cing rgyug/ skal bzang rnal 'byor dam pa 
105a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni dbang dang byin brlabs dam pa'i 'og tu chud cing bde gsung ngo // kam+ba la'i zhal nas/ zab cing rgya che rgya mtsho nor bus gang ba la// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyi mnga' mdzod ngo mtshar che// snang 
105a4(rgyud 'grel): grags thams cad ye nas chos sku yin pa la// rtogs dang nyam skyong ldan pas mnga' mdzod ngo mtshar che gsung ngo // slob dpon lU yI pa'i zhal nas// khyi rgod rab tu mi srun sna la sbrang rtsi byugs ni phyog 
105a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun tu za bar byed// blo dman skal pa dman pa'i gang zag rnams la dbang dang gdams ngag byin pas rang rgyud bsreg/ gleng chen dpa' la brtan pa'i sAl ras gri bskur bas dgra dpung 'joms// 
105a6(rgyud 'grel): skal bzang blo ldan skye med rtogs pa rnams kyis thug phrad dag gi rnams rtog 'joms gsung ngo // slob dpon tili pa'i zhal nas/ ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa/ bya yi rang bzhin bong nas
105a7(rgyud 'grel): gser du snang // mkhas pa gang gis skye ba med rtogs na// dngos po'i rang bzhin bor nas bde ba che gsung ngo // ti lo pa'i zhal nas/ bdag nyid gdod ma nyid nas sangs rgyas yin pa la// ma
105a8(rgyud 'grel): rtogs dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid du ma mthong ngo // gnyis med gang gis rtogs pa de ni phyag rgya che// rtogs pa'i yul na mthong ba med cing rtogs pa med gsung ngo // slob dpon shes rab bzang
105b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i zhal nas/ byis pa chung ngu gsol nas gyad kyi stobs dang ldan pa bzhin// blo chung rnams kyang bla ma'i gdam ngag dag gis bris pas theg pa che// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad rnams 
105b2(rgyud 'grel): sman gyis sel ba ltar// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nad rnams bla ma'i gdams ngag dag gis skad cig nyid la bsreg gsung ngo // slob dpon nur pa'i zhal nas// 'khor los sbur rgyal dpung gi 
105b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams kyis// gling rnams kun la dbang sgyur bzhin// lhan cig skyes pa'i ro rnyed pas// 'khor ba dag la dbang skur ngo mtshar che gsung ngo // slob dpon Dom+bi ba chung ba'i zhal nas/ gser
105b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis// lcags rnams gser du 'gyur ba bzhin// rire chen dbang gi rus pa yis// nyon mongs ye shes gnyis med 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon dza ba ri pa'i
105b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal nas// skye med rtogs kyang nyams su myong bral// dri yang srin mo'i lag tub khyer 'dra// nyams su myong yang gnas lugs ma rtogs na// de yang glang chen lcags kyus phrogs pa'adra 
105b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon pa su d+ha ra'i zhal nas/ gang gis ma rtogs par du ro 'di 'bras chan dag dang khyad par che// de bzhin ma rtogs bar du sangs rgyas sems can khyad par btags// 
105b7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor ba dag kyang sangs rgyas che// de phyir rtogs dang ma rtogs dag kyang dbye bar dka' bas khyad med do// zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal nas// 
105b8(rgyud 'grel): bya ba gtong ba man ngag yin// zhe 'dod med na rtogs pa yin// bsrub bya med na spyod pa yin// smra brjod med na nyams myong yin// blang dor med na 'bras bu yin// gsung ngo // slob dpon 
106a1(rgyud 'grel): Tom+bi he ru ka'i zhal nas// rtogs pa yid bzhin nor bul// nyams su myong bas mdog phung la// spyod pa'i nus pas dgos 'dod 'byung // ro snyoms ldan pa rnams kyis 'grub 
106a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // slob dpon a ba d+hU tI'i zhal nas// thabs dang shes rab an+da la// bla ma'i chu bo'i rgyun gyis rab tu brgyal// lhan cig skyes pa'i dpag bsam shing dag la// 'bras bu ldan 
106a3(rgyud 'grel): la gas / ba sa nga dgas pa na gas 
106a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// tshogs gnyis ma bsags bskal pa brgya ru thib dbyas kyang // don med don dang ma ldan pade chen rtogs mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon nags po zhabs kyi zhal nas// dus 
106a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo gcig/ de yi rang bzhin byang chub sems// rtogs par 'dod na ji bzhin zhog/ goms par byas na mngon du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon gcer bu lhung bzod 
106a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhal nas// bla ma dag las dang por rang gi sems rtogs bya// de nas chos rnams kun dang tha dad med byas la// gnyis med goms phyir dur khrod gnas su 'dug nas ni// mnyam par 
106a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas smyon pa'i brtul zhugs dag gis spyad ces gsung ngo // sgrib dpon ri langs pade'i zhal nas// rta dang glang po rgya mtsho 'dran rab tu bde// spre'u chu yi ri mo 'dren sde bar 'gyur// chub 
106a8(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma sman dang 'dran dbyer mi phyed// gtsug pud mig dang 'khor lo lta bur 'bras bu thob gsung ngo // slob dpon ram pa la'i zhal nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa mchog/ rang gis 
106b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par gnas pas na// gzhug ma'i sems kyis rtogs pa gang // sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong yin zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon ku ku ri ba'i zhal nas// dbyer med sa la gnas 
106b2(rgyud 'grel): na kun kyang bskal pa bzang // rgya mtsho'i gting du byin na dbul dang bral// ral gri lag tu thogs na longs spyod che// phyogs med sa la byin na gnyen dang phrad ces gsung ngo // slob dpon spyod pa 
106b3(rgyud 'grel): mthu stobs can gyi zhal nas// rnal 'byor rnams la gang snang thams cad gdams pa ste// mthong bas de yi skye med rtogs pas slob dpon mchog/ byas pa kun gyi skye med rtogs phyir thobs 
106b4(rgyud 'grel): yin te// dga' dang mi dga' bral na skyes bu de la gnyis med 'byung zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon ku mA ra tri ta'i zhal nas// gang gis bla ma'i gdams pa la// dbang blangs lhan cig skyes pa yi// 
106b5(rgyud 'grel): ro yis kun la khyab byas te// skye med rgyas 'debs rdo rje 'dzin// byin brlabs shar bas dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon b+ha ti pa'i zhal nas// chos rnams kun kyang 
106b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems dang gnyis me do spyod// rtogs pa'i nyams myong nges don gdams pa'i don bral na// nor bu 'ching bu dag la bde chen min// chos de rnams dang ldan na re dogs med par rang sar
106b7(rgyud 'grel): zhog gsung ngo // slob dpon lus med rdo rje'i zhal nas// sems ma gdungs na bde ba che// zhe 'dod med na ro rloms yin// 'bad dang bral na bsgoms pa'i mchog/ gnyis snang bral na 
106b8(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes gsung ngo // rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi'i zhal nas/ dus kyi sna rtse bdag byin brlabs dang ma ldan na// phyi dang nang du skyed pa byas kyang sangs mi rgya// bde bar rang chas snang ba dag 
107a1(rgyud 'grel): / dang khyad par med// zhen pa btang bas nyams su myong ba mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon pad+ma badz+ra'i zhal nas// gar yang ma bltas dbus su ltos// mchog dang
107a2(rgyud 'grel): bral na dga' ba che// sngags rigs gsang ba ltos spyod na// rnal 'byor rtags kyis bsgyur bar bya zhes gsung ngo // lha lcam lak+Shi ka ra'i zhal nas// dang po blo ldan rtogs pa bskyed// gnyis pa 
107a3(rgyud 'grel): rnags susna rtse bsgom// nyams su myong ba skyes pa ni// spyod pa'i khyad par rtogs par bya// zhes gsung ngo // sgrub dpon pa zhabs kyi zhal nas/ gang gang ldan cig skyes pa de// glang porgyu 
107a4(rgyud 'grel): yi mig bzhin du// gze ga skyes na zug rngur 'gyur// glod na zhen med bsam gtan mchog gsung ngo // slob dben snying po zhabs kyi zhal nas// chu rgyun gnas pa'i nyams bstan nas// spyod 
107a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas kyis 'gro bar bya// bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis// chags sdang rtog pa zhi bar bya gsung ngo // slob dpon rdo rje zhabs kyi zhal nas// bde'o bde'o gnas med bde// 'dod pa
107a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i rang bzhin bde// brtags thams cad der shes bde// bsgrubs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas bde zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon dril bu zhabs kyi zhal nas// ra la ra sa d+hU tI gsum// bdag 
107a7(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs phyir bcing bar bya// bla ma sems dang snang ba gsum// rtogs pa bskyed phyir mkhas pas brten gsung ngo // slob dpon mdung can lkug pa'i zhal nas// dag gi bsgrub bral 
107a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sku bzhi dbyer mi phyed// gza' gtad med pa'i chos rnams rtsa ba gcig/ ma yengs pa yi sangs rgyas kun gyi lam// phyogs cha med na rnal 'byor kun gyi mchog ces gsung ngo // 
107b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon ka ti b+hid pa'i zhal nas// sangs rgyas mchod sogs rnams la don mi 'byung // 'dod dang rtsol ba yod na sangs min+da// byin pab rlabs bla ma'i ngag gis nyams myong 'phel// bla ma'i man 
107b2(rgyud 'grel): ngag cha las gzhan gyis min zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon mi pham ral pa can gyi zhal nas// rje btsun dam pa bsten na de nyid 'thob// nags tshal mthongs su bsgoms na dben pa 'thob// chos rnam 
107b3(rgyud 'grel): sems su rtogs na mi mthun med// nam mkha' 'o ma 'azungs na tshim par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // slob dpon zhi ba'i dbang phyug gi zhal nas// bde bstong pa mtha' dang bral rtogs na// dpag 
107b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam shing la brten pas zhes bral te// mtsho las skyes bus rgyal bas 'gro shes na// bram ze pa dang ma las bu skye 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // rnal 'byor ma d+harma'i zhal nas// go cha chen po gon 
107b5(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // nor bu lta bu'i snying stobs kyis// rang gi sems la chu btang ste// pi ro'i khog par des zhugs naso// skye ba bdun pa'i sha zos ma// nam mkha' la ni bya bzhin no zhes gsungs so// 
107b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon mai tri pa'i zhal nas// bde dang stong pa dbyer med snying ka pad+ma dag la rdzogs// skye med yid la byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab bde ba chen po'i sems// snang grags thams cad ro mnyam 
107b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum du rnal 'byor pa yis spyad// rjes su bdag gis byin brlabs shar bas dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas gsung ngo // rnal 'byol ma g+ha g+ha'i zhal nas// yul la ma blta sems la'ang
107b8(rgyud 'grel): ma blta zhig/ zhe 'dod ma byed bya ba ma byed cig/ dogs pa ma 'cha nyams pa ma byed par// gnyug ma'i shes pa gang dga' nyid du thong zhes gsung ngo // spu su ku'i zhal nas// bya ba 'khor 
108a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sdug bsngal nyid du zad// bya ba btang ba'i rnal 'byor sems rtogs byed// gang du'ang mi gnas rtag chad mtha' las 'das// bsgom du med pas bsam gyis mi khyab nyid ces 
108a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // rnal 'byor ma kaM ka ra'i zhal nas// gnyis med shes pa chul chu bzhag 'dra// rang bzhin ma snang glang po lta bur zhog/ zhams myong spre'u gang ltar byung yang rung // rtogs pa'i 
108a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' ba ltar khyab par bya zhes gsung // dpal ma man tshigs 'khor byas pa'i dus su// la 'byeng ba grub pa thob pa bzhi brgyas rdo rje'i mgang bzhengs pashes kyi ga lags skyed 
108a4(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / sha mkha' khri ma'i 'byams gru ring mo zhes bya ba gnyis bzhugs pa/ @#// na mo rat+na gu ru/ dur khrod chen po'i bsil ba'i tshal du/ mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i ro za nams// 
108a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ rjes la rgun chang 'phra men gyi snod bkang ba drangs te// rtogs par brjod pa mgur re zhus pas/ dang po la mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla gser 
108a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi zor cog can gyis rtogs pa brjod de mgur bzhengs pa/ kye 'o ma btsos rnal 'byor shes pa la// des shes skyes na sangs rgyas yin// dkar dmar yul gyi snang ba 'di// brda ru go na bla ma 
108a7(rgyud 'grel): yin gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma ral pa'i zor cog can gyis rtogs par brjod pa/ kye 'o gnyis su med na 'ching grol med// ngos zung med na sgrib pa med// rang bzhin med na chags sdang med// 
108a8(rgyud 'grel): dran du med na yengs su med gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma rlung gi gshog pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ kye'o chos rnams gzhi med rmi lam 'dra// snang bar rkyen skyes gzugs brnyan 'dra// 
108b1(rgyud 'grel): rang byung rang ni sbu ba 'dra// rtswa bral chen po nam mkha' 'dra zhes gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma zhi zla'i zod phreng can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ kye'o de nyid nyams su myong ba'i skyes bu gang // bde chen nam
108b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i khams su ma shong ngo // 'dil mtshon du 'dug gam khyod kyis smos// nga yis ci yang mthong ba med par mthong gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma la ba'i gos can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ kye'o dz+ra 
108b3(rgyud 'grel): ge sar snying gi dbus su sad// gsal ba'i me tog bdam gyi dri ma bral// dri dang kha dog ldan pa gang gis rkyen// 'di la dgags dang sgrubs pa yod dam ci gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma me kha las rtogs
108b4(rgyud 'grel): papabarjod pa// kye 'o nam mkha' las byung cho 'phrul ni// nam mkha' nyid kyi byas pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i ngang du rang byung ste// 'di la skyon du ma 'dzin cig gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma ye shes rdo rjes// 
108b5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa brjod pa// kye 'o bla ma'i drin gyis bde chen mchog rnyed nas// thabs gzhan rten pa rmongs pa shes par bya// 'di las gud du gyur pa'i bde la ma zhig/ gzhan nas rnyed par sus kyang nus 
108b6(rgyud 'grel): pa med gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma ye shes rdo rjes rtogs pa brjod pa// kye 'o sna tshogs snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di// dran pa'i gzugs brnyan yin shes shing // dran pa rang ngos stong shes na// 
108b7(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi bde ba btsal mi dgos// mkha' 'gro ma srid pa'i rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa// kye bo rang rig rgyal po 'di mthong na// thams cad thams cad thar pa'i lam// rang rig nyid ni ma rtog 
108b8(rgyud 'grel): na// grol ba man yang yod ma yin gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma pad+ma zhabs kyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// kye'o yod med mtha' dang bral ba la// gang gis brtags dpyad bya bar nus// dran 
109a1(rgyud 'grel): bang tha dang thal bal// gang gas bas pa 'ang bgam par nus nas gsungang// mkha' 'gros rgyal ba' byams kyis chags pa brdad pa// tha' snang nyid rig pa'i rnal dang ldan// mi bye 
109a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshe 'phrul sor// dgag sgrub med de rang sang grol// 'di la bya chungs pa rnyed gsung ngo // mkha' 'grom song ge'i gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa// rkyen yod dbyas na ngos bzung med// mang 
109a3(rgyud 'grel): byas na sna tshogs 'char// yod med mkha' las 'das pa la// 'di zhes nga yis mtshan mi nus gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma gzi brjid kyi rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa// dran du med nam 
109a4(rgyud 'grel): ngas shig/ yangs pas 'khong ba rjel ma 'dra// rtags pa skyes bu gnas sa 'dra// ngas 'a khang ba ma mthong ngo // mapa' 'gro ma dpal gyi bzang pos rtags pa brjod pa// kye 
109a5(rgyud 'grel): srid 'di ni phyag rgya che// 'dod yon 'di ri dngas pa'i sa// gzhug pa'i do la 'du 'bral med// bde chen thang la drug tu gsol gsung ba// mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi 'od zer gyis rtogs pa brjod 
109a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// kye'i mnyug mngon gyis gter mdzadar// dgas 'do sems 'a nar bu yang // lde mig bla ma dam pa'ang ni// rjes su 'jug pa sA lags sam gaspyad do// mkha' 'gro ma bzang 
109a7(rgyud 'grel): mos rtogs pa brjod pa// ltos shes dang ge sems la ltos// bltas pas ma rnyed rtsa ba stor// yal ga ji ltar dgye dgyes mje // nga ni rtag pa rang grol yin gsung // mkha' 'gro 
109a8(rgyud 'grel): mardo rje bdems rtogs pa brjod pa// 'gro rnams las kyis 'khrul gyur kyang // bde ba dang las gzhan med de// bskyar de rang gi don de ltos// yid ni las las thar par 'gyur zhes gsung 
109b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid chen po zhi pa'i dbang phyug gis rtogs pa brjod pa// nyi ma sdong gi gzi brjid kyis// snang srid gsal zhing bsreg pa ltar// gnyis med ye shes chen po yis// chos rnams gsal zhing
109b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms par byed gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ba lnga dpal gyi ye shes kyis rtogs pa brjod pa// kye 'od ni mi skye mi 'jig ste// 'gyur med ye shes rdo rje yin// nga las byung ba'i chos rnams kun// 
109b3(rgyud 'grel): yi ngo bong mnyam du grol gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma stag gi gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa// kye bo mi skye mi 'gag bsam las 'das// 'di zhes mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral// ye grol chen 
109b4(rgyud 'grel): po mchog gi lam// bsam du med do rang snga dog gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma zhi ba bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa// kye'o sems kyi de zhing sma du med// gshis kyi de nyid bsam du med// chos 
109b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang nyid ngas gzung med// lam gyi de nyid bsgom du med gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma g+ha gA dpal gyis rtogs pa brjod pa// kye 'o bu khyod ci sems de la ltos// spos dang bral ba mthong du med// 
109b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam du med pa su zhig bsgom// 'di la ma brtsol gshe la zhog gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma ye shes dbang phyug gis rdzogs pa brjod pa// gang gis de nyid ma mthong na// lus ngagang gi ba 
109b7(rgyud 'grel): las spyad kyang // bde cher mchog dang mi phrad de// gnas skabs tsam gyis bde bar gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i rdo rjes rtogs par brjod pa// kye bo gang gis mthong dang thos pa dang // 
109b8(rgyud 'grel): drad dang tsher ba'i bye brag kun// yid kyi ye shes dngas pa la// gzugs brnyan tsam du shar ba las// gzhi la ma grub ngo bos stong gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma lha nyi ma'i rta can gyis rtogs 
110a1(rgyud 'grel): pa brjod pa// gang gis ma mthong de mthong na// yid ni rang grol chos kyi sku// rlung gi na pho shul du lus// sems kyi mi po mkha' la 'gro gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma pad+ma'i rtswa 
110a2(rgyud 'grel): gus rtogs pa brjod pa// 'gro ba yid kyi phreng bas bcings// yid bas daphreng zag bcang pa yis// drag sgrol mtshan gyis gtses pa bzhin// 'di yis pa na gnod byas pa mang gi sungs 
110a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma dbyings kyi rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa// kye 'o nam mkha' yongs su dngas na tshon gyis bskur du med// rtogs dang ldan pa skyes bu las kyis bcing du med// gdeng med gyad kyis 
110a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa byed pa 'di// seng ge'i lpags pa wa yis gon pa 'dra gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma zla ba'i gdong can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa// kyi'o ye shes chen po mchog gi lam// ma bgrod de 
110a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyid kyis// ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub pa'i don// e ma rnal 'byor skal bar bzang gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma glog gi phreng ba can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa// ltas kyis ma 
110a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'i mig/ bsam gyis ma dran nga yi sems// smras kyis ma brjod pa yi lce// bgrod kyang ma phyin pa'i lam gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma shel gyi thor tshugs can gyi mngon par rtogs pa// 
110a7(rgyud 'grel): mi sgom rnal ma'i shes pa la// dran pas bzung dang ma bzung med// mi spyod sgo gsum lhag pa la// ched dang dgag dang sgrub pa med gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod 
110a8(rgyud 'grel): pa// kye'o rang byung ba de chen ye shes 'di// ma rtogs smra bar mi nus te// rtogs nas brjod du ga la yod// myong ba smrar med lkug pa'i kha gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i mdangs 
110b1(rgyud 'grel): can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa// kho la ma blta nga la ltos// nga ni ye shes chen po yin// kho ni nga yi sprul pa yin// gnyis med ye shes blo las 'das gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma khrag gi/ 
110b2(rgyud 'grel): gdong pa can gyis rtogs par brjod pa// kye 'dren dang ma dran so mtshams su// yid kyi shes pa bsam las 'das// bla ma'i zhal las shes par gyis// gzhan gyis rtogs par 'gyur ma 
110b3(rgyud 'grel): yin gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi sgron mes rtogs pa brjod pa// kye 'o gang phyir yid kyi ye shes 'dis// khyod kyis bltas pas ji ltar mthong // brtags pas rtogs par mi 'gyur
110b4(rgyud 'grel): te// mi rtsal de bzhin nyid du bzhag gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma snang gsal gyi rgyal mos rtogs par brjod pa// 'gro ba las kyis 'jur bus bcings// bram ze skud pa 'khal ba bzhin/ 
110b5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis 'jur bu grod par bya// las la grol na 'ching ba med gsung ngo // ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa lnga'i rtogs par brjod pa/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzad na gnas pa las// 
110b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la snang ba'o// zham lo tsA bas bskur ba'o// rdzogs s+ho// // / mkha'a' gro ma'i'ajam thu zhes bya ba gzugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ TA ki/ 
110b7(rgyud 'grel): ni ta la gI ti na nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jam glu zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo// u rgyan gyi gnas mkha' 'gro ma'i gling // dur khrod chen po rgyu 
110b8(rgyud 'grel): skar dpal gyi ril par/ mkha' 'gro ma su ka ma hA sid+d+his tshigs 'khor mdzad pa'i dus su// rnal 'byor pa ka ma la shis// rang gi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes gzhug ma'i don de rtogs shing
111a1(rgyud 'grel): khang du chud pa la gdengs zab cing // nyams kyiHla phyogs med du shar ba'i stobs kyis// gnyis me ye shes chen po de/ mtshan tshig gi rdul bskyon te/ tshogs kyil 
111a2(rgyud 'grel): du mgur bzhengs pa las/ ye shes dang las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgyes te// mdun gyi nam mkha' lnga sprin gyi phung po bzhin gtibs nas/ rnal 'byor pa la snying gtam gsang tshig 
111a3(rgyud 'grel): d+hu sman te/ mgur bzhengs pa/ k+She'o stobs ldan rigs kyi bu// yang dag don grub rdo rje'i rtsal// sbyangs pa'i las sad sprul ba can// yon tan dbang phyug gter gyi bdag/ dngos grub 
111a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i lus// mi yi khyu mchog chags kyi // khyod rgyu'i chos nyid rkyen gyis gsol// sbyangs pa'i las 'ab+h+ri ma bur 'thung // yon tan yid bzhin nor bu brnyes// 
111a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal chen po'i madrangs la gnas// maHma du 'gro na mdzad// dpe med nam mkha'i rnal 'byor pa// khyed la bskal ba mI tshal gyis// 'on kyang dad kyi sbrul ljon// spyir ste 'gro'i 
111a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can las kyis 'khrul// sdug bsngal gyi gnas na longs skyed byed// 'di ma bzod bathebs shal bab// de khyod kyi thugs rjes mi dgongs na// 'gradrug gi bla ma ltar byed// khyeng 
111a7(rgyud 'grel): phan sems bskyed cig rnal 'byor pa// la rig pa'i khye chung yengase la dga'// 'khrul ba'i snang ba bltad mo che// gzung 'dzin kun mo mgo la rgod// yid gnyis kyi shes pa tsam tsam ma 
111a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyen po 'amal na zhing dus rung // shes bzhin gyi dran pa sgo cha ldang // sems nyid kyi na dbu 'cher zhen yod // khyod yul la ma yengs rnal 'byer pa// gzhi bkrur med nam mkha'i btsun 
111b1(rgyud 'grel): mo la// nyon mongs dug lnga'i khong srin zhugs// gzung 'dzin gyi 'gong po spun dgu gnod// bzang ngan rkyen rtog gi 'khrul phyir 'breng // chags sdang gi spyod lam ma legs pas// gzung 
111b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyi nang ro gting nas ldang // rang lus kyi bde ba ster nas 'dug/ 'khrul pa'i sems can snying re rje// khyod 'gro don gyis shig rnal 'byor pa// lar yid kyi ye shes co lu chung // 
111b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i rdzun la nyan nyan nas// rigs drug g.yang la skur nyen gda'// khyod gnyis 'dzin shig cig rnal 'byor pa// 'gyu byed kyi dran rtogs blo nad po// kun gzhi dbyings kyi pho brang du// 
111b4(rgyud 'grel): ma bcos car nyal mi byed par// 'dod yon sgyu ma'i sku brid la// dug lnga'i grogs dang 'grogs nas rtse// yul chags sdang gnyis la yengs pa yis// ngan 'gro yig yang du lhung nyen 
111b5(rgyud 'grel): yod// dbang po sgo lnga'i sgo sdoms la// yid kyi khyed chung btson du zung // bde gsal stong pa'i mal du bsnol// khyed yongs su 'gro'o rnal 'byor pa// skye rgan 'chi chu bo la// rgyal med 
111b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi blun po rtse la dga'// dal 'byor gyi gru bo yod bzhin du// rje bla ma'i mnyan pa mi bsten par// las mi dge'i rba la snyom rtsol byed// sdug bsngal gyi rgal gnyen pos byol// zhen 
111b7(rgyud 'grel): chags kyi 'dam la ma lus par// thar pa'i skam sar ci snyogs kyis// khyod zhen 'dod thong cig rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa dug gi sdong po la// spang blang gnyis kyi yas ga gyes// zhen 
111b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lo mad pa phyogs bcur rgyas// rtsol sgrub kyi me tog mkha' la 'phur// sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu zur la bul// snying med kyi spre'u bsgrubs kyi za// 'khor ba'i nags su 'chi/ 
112a1(rgyud 'grel): zhen yod// sna tshogs zhen med kyi skyes bu yis// gdong 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshon thogs te// 'dod pa'i sdong po rmang nas bsgyel// dug lnga'i 'bras bu sngo bskams khyer// dug/ 
112a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chi byed kyi nus pa zad par gyis// khyod zhe 'dod spongs shig rnal 'byor pa// ri dgas dgra yis phung ba de// snyan grags ched du bsgrubs pos lan// stod slad brag ca lta bu la// phyogs 'dzin 
112a3(rgyud 'grel): mabyed rnal 'byor pa// glang chen lcags kyus zin pa de// rgyun chang rol chags pasalan// 'dod yon lan tshwa'i chu rgod la// zhin pa mche rnal 'byor pa// rma bya gung nas shi ba de// spu 
112a4(rgyud 'grel): thog rgyan du mthong bas lan// 'byung bzhi mi gtsang phung po la// rang mthong ma che rnal 'byor pa// sbrang ma 'dam du chud pa de// bsung can dril chags pas lan// nye du gnas skams 
112a5(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa las// brtse gdung ma byed rnal 'byor pa// phyi leb me yis tshig pa de// zhun mar mdangs la chags pas lan// sgyu ma lta bu'i yul snang la// der 'dzin ma byed rnal 'byor
112a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// mdab chags snying la zin pa de// 'dod yon zas phyir 'brangs pas lan// zhen pa lcags kyu'i kha zas la// ltogs 'dod ma byed rnal 'byor pa// kun gzhi dag pa'i me long la// 
112a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs drug rig phyir ba'i phyir bdar byas// yul drug gsal ba'i gzugs brnyan shar// ma rtogs byis pas dngos por gzung // chags sdang gnyis kyi bde sdug myong // kun gzhi ma
112a8(rgyud 'grel): bcos chos kyi dbyings// tshogs drug ma 'gags der 'dzin med// yul drug gsal la ngo bos stong // dngos 'dzin byis pag chad du// mkhas pa rang snang der 'dzin bral// khyod der 
112b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin shig cig rnal 'byor pa// gzhi ngos zung med pa'i nam mkha' la// nyon mongs du lnga'i lha sbyin 'thibs// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'brug sgra bsgrags// sna tshogs las kyi char rgyun phab// 
112b2(rgyud 'grel): zhen chags 'khor ba'i mad ma rdzas g.yos// 'gro drug sdug bsngal gyi rtsi thog rgyas// lhag mthong rig pa'i zhi ma yis// dbyings kyi zhi ma gsal btab ste// mazham rjes dran pa'i kyi
112b3(rgyud 'grel): ser gyis// dran rtog gi lho sprin dbyings su bdas// bdag 'dzin gyi 'brug sgra rang sar yal// las kyi char rgyan rtsa ba bral// zhen 'dzin gyi 'dam rdzab zhims bskams// rigs drug gis 
112b4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon skam la yang // sdug bsngal gyi lo tog sngo bskams khyer// khyed the tshom med ma byed rnal 'byor pa// mtshan ldan gyi rgyal bu blon pos rkus// bshes med kyi yul du spang drir 'khyam 
112b5(rgyud 'grel): lhang dang hral hral gyi 'tshe ba brten// dang gzhan gzhis kas ngo ma shes// mtshan mkhan gyi bram zes rigs brgyad rtogs// blo gros blon po'i bu la dris// gnas lugs rig pa'i rje la
112b6(rgyud 'grel): gtad// tshogs gnyis dag pa'i khu nas bton// gdams pa yid bzhin nor bus bus brgyan// rtogs pa rin chen gyi khril bzhag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi rgyal sa bzung // khyod 
112b7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma brten cig rnal 'byor pa// rten med yid kyi ri dgas de// las dbang bar dro'i thang la 'khyams// zhen chags smig rgyu'i chu la gdungs// rig drug 'khor ba'i mtha' la shi// ri klungs 
112b8(rgyud 'grel): sha khrag rjes kyis bkang // da rten med kyi rig pa mkha' la 'chings// tshogs drug gi rkyen kham 'drim par// 'od gsal chen po'i thang la chug/ 'dod yon smig rgyu'i chu bo la// der 'dzin 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi zhen pa ma byed par// zhen 'dod gyi gdung ba nang du chod// rig drug gi rkyen kham 'grim par// mnyam med chen po'i dbyings su zhol// yid bsam du med pa'i gzhug ma la// 
113a2(rgyud 'grel): dran pa yengs med kyi mdab mkhan gyis// ma bcos gzhug ma'i ngo bor bsrang // ri dogs gnyis kyi mgo rtsa bregs// dga' bzhi bri dbyangs su dril nas kyang // lhan cig skyes pa'i mde 'u 
113a3(rgyud 'grel): bcug/ thabs shes rab gnyis kyi ltong gtod de// skad cig bzhi yi sgo bskyon nas// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyogs su 'phangs// gti mug phag rgod snyeng la gzer // gzung 'dzin 
113a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi srog rtsa bcad// 'khor ba'i gnas su nga mi chug/ khyod btsan sa zung cig rnal 'byor pa// yul rang snang zhen med du shar ba'i tshe// 'dod yon lam gyi grogs su 'gro/ 
113a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i kha dog 'dam na gsal// nyams reg gang dgar skyongs shig rnal 'byor pa// chos bden med khong du chud pa'i tshe// srog rtsol zung 'jug chen po'i yin// glang po'i gser 
113a6(rgyud 'grel): ga klod na bde// 'bad rtsol zhog cig rnal 'byor pa// mnyam zhed rig pa'i rta phod de// gzung 'dzin gyi sgeg tu ma chud par// bdag gzhan du 'dzin pa'i srab kha klod// phyogs 
113a7(rgyud 'grel): med kyi thang la gar bder rgyugs// zhams shugs byung du rdol ba'i smon pa de// gzhan pos lcags su ma gzhug par// tshul 'chos kyi khyim nas skor phyung la// gar bde'i gnas
113a8(rgyud 'grel): su yan du chug/ rtogs pa nam mkha'i khyung chen de// grub mtha'i gzan la ma chags shing // 'khrul pa'i ga yang la ma bred par// phyogs med kyi mtha' la lding du chug/ 'bras 
113b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu de// re dogs kyi dri ma ma chags shing // yid smon gyi gling la ma lus par// dgos 'dod kyi gsol ba re ma la thob// 'gyur med kyi btsan sa zin nas kyang // thugs rje'i 
113b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer phyogs med kyis// 'gro drug gi pha ma byed pa ru// sngon dam bcas go cha gon pa de// dbus la bab po sa mA yA// zhes gsungs te/ bskul ba chen po'i sgras// bskal pa'i 
113b3(rgyud 'grel): 'brug bzhin du bsgrags te// nam gyi mtha' dang mnyam du mi snang bar dengs so// mkha' 'gro ma'i 'byam glu ring mo zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// khyad par gyi brgyud pa brgyad las// don skor rnam 
113b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi 'gram g+h+r-i dang bcas pa'o// 'di bris dge ba'i rtsa ba yis// rnam mkhyen go 'phang thob par shog/ sh+ya khrag rgya chen par nab ched dbang gi la la zhes kya ba ngur khong nu gar dbal byer la bas bstan pa bzhugs so// 
113b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mud+ha rat+na gI ta tsakra nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo zhes b+ha ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gser lar 
113b6(rgyud 'grel): med dka' 'dzi'i rdal rtogs par 'gyur// 'jam na rnams ni tshang 'dus dag du drug par 'gyur// gser zol skor zhing 'khor nas gnas po'i lag rngu 'babs pa yin// 'phra med ma nim 
113b7(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen 'gyur te rten 'brel thams cad su yis bsgrigs// ded nga dpon mkhas pa grong dang gling phran tshad spangs rin chen gling nas nor bu len// bye ba dang byas tshe rgyal mtshan rtsol mchod pas 
113b8(rgyud 'grel): dgos 'dod 'byung // rin chen gsum ngo shes pa'i dad dpon 'dzam bu'i gling na dkon// srang la zhal che bcol bas che chung med par gcod de brtsod dang bral// 'gron po lam zhugs
114a1(rgyud 'grel): par gyi grong dang grong khyer mi sul bgrod nas don 'grub pa// gi ling na po mgyogs kyang lcags gis brabs na de bas mgyogs par 'gyur// ltas ngan chen po byed pa'i mi de su yi 
114a2(rgyud 'grel): gas pardang yin// dmigs pa cigs pags byed pan badz+nyAnan / ma tshangs sa ma ga' bangs gang la gag pa dadag/ zlum// ri mamatshan dadagasum gyis b+ha glang sbrul gsum bas panag pazlas 
114a3(rgyud 'grel): sam// ras yug dkar por tshur nas bton nas chos ma'i lag tu btang bas gang 'dod 'byung // mdzub bsgreng srin 'thab mdzub 'thob nang du 'dzu' mo bcug cing mkha' la bsgreng ba'i don ldan brdar shes par 
114a4(rgyud 'grel): tshad med// bung ba khri snyan phyi ba gsum gyis shes rab gsum li sbyor ba ngo mtshar che// 'du ba geso byed sman pa'i rgyal po mnyes pa yis// rin chen bdun sbyor spyi bo gtsug bshad btad nas/ 
114a5(rgyud 'grel): ni// sha rus khrag sogs smin cing lus kyi 'byung brtas par byed// tshangs pa chen po'i gsung dbyangs khyod kyis snyan par gyis// seng ge'i 'o ma btsun mos bzhos pa'i bcud mchog ngo mtshar 
114a6(rgyud 'grel): can// 'di ni gang gis 'thungs dang lce la reg pa tsam gyis ni// rtsa gral rlung zin thig le gros pa'i nus mthu 'byung // u ma de ba len pa'i glu de mchog tu mnyan pa yin pas gson// snang ba 
114a7(rgyud 'grel): thob nas dben pa'i sa phyogs der ni rang gi gnas btsal la// rgyan gyis spras shing mdzes ldan bdag med yum gyi zhabs la 'dud// gtan gyi bde ba blangs pa nam mkha' rdo rje grong du gzhug/ 
114a8(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i rgyal mo len pa'i glu la yid gtad bya bar rigs// rang 'byung shel gyi mchod rten skyon bral ye nas dag pa la// snang srid gsal byed 'phrul gyi me long byis te blta bar bya// mo gsham bu 
114b1(rgyud 'grel): yis bden pa mthong ba'i don de gang yin khyod kyis smros// khyab 'jug chen po rang gis blangs po'i glu la yid brtan byed// khrus khang dag na dri mas dri ma ma lus dag par byed// med bzhin snang ba 
114b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la bris pa'i 'ja' ltar gzugs sku rnam gzhis gang zhig yin// sbrang rgod zos pa'i rtsa la byin brlabs rgyas par byed// smug nas can dang rma dkris gnyis la chags pa'i zhen pa cang gdo' 
114b3(rgyud 'grel): 'am// dri dang sgog pa dbyer ma phyed par snang ba gzugs brnyan 'di 'dra rtogs lags sam// chu zla bzhin du snang la rang bzhin med pa mig gi rnam shes nyams su myong bas gzigs// 'byung ba 
114b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khrugs pa'i nad la sman pa rnams kyis drod tshad 'dzin// bshal rjes mi bsung rtag tu bsrung ba ma lags sem// gnam lugs sa la babs na gang la babs pa'i yul de 'jig par byed/ 
114b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la 'brug gi sba ba sbags dbyar dgun shan 'dang de yis phyed par 'gyur// sprul pa'i dge slong mkhas pa 'gro 'chag zhal du ston kyang skye du ba med// gser gyi ril brten pa'i bya 
114b6(rgyud 'grel): yang de yi mdog tu 'gyur// snang yang de bzhin spyod pa'i sgyu ma mkhan dang rtag tu 'grogs// zhing pa'i lo rtog rten 'brel rab tu 'joms pos 'bras bu ston rnams sdud// mchod
114b7(rgyud 'grel): sdong nyi zla nor bus rtogs pa med bzhin 'gro ba'i don la brtson// so btang bum par chub skyed mi 'chag snod kyi bya ba byed// ka la pi ka'i sgra bzhin tshangs pa'i gsung gis bag chags/ 
114b8(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa 'dag/ rlung gi rta la dran pa'i srab kyis mkha' la btags la dbul mo'i khyim du gzhug/ lo zla 'das pa'i ma bu phrad bzhin nges pa'i shes pa skye// zha dang chu las 'byung ba 
115a1(rgyud 'grel): gos su gon pas zhen pa cang gdal 'am// me long shel bzhin khor ras gsal stong byas pa med pa lta ba mchog/ dngas ma'i tshul bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal dngas// 
115a2(rgyud 'grel): phyed par snang // 'gron po lam zhugs zhe ring med par phyin nas 'dod pa'i mi dang phrad// rgyal po'i khrims la 'bangs kyis dam tshig gces par bsrungs pa legs// rma bya'i zas su btsan
115a3(rgyud 'grel): dug zos pas stobs su 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che// rin chen gser de sa la gnas kyang 'od zer mkha' la 'char// bag ma bung ba seng ge smyon pa bzhi po spyod pa 'dzel// rlung dang yi ge rnam
115a4(rgyud 'grel): shes gsum po 'grogs la tshangs pa'i mthong lam snyogs// sa 'gus mchod sdong btsugs pa'i sa der glu yi 'jigs pa mi mdog go/ rin po che la rtog pa med kyang gsol ba btab na 
115a5(rgyud 'grel): dgos 'dod 'byung // mkha' la sprin tshegs 'dus nas char gyis 'gro don mdzad// rgyal bu rgyal sar bzhag nas 'bangs rnams kun gyis khur bar byed// mkha' la zhi ma shar ba'i mun 
115a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshegs la gdang dbang med mod kyis// nyi zla ngos bzung chu bo gye na la zlog pa grangs pas gangs dkare rtse nas zhu ba ngo mtshar che// ma ga d+ha ru rdo rje'i gdan du bsdad pa'i rgyal ba sprul 
115a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sku de su yin lo// drang srong rnams ni kham gyis zas la ma brten bsam gtan thun gyis 'tshe// rdo rje gdan la dbang po bstan pas nam mkha'i bsgrub bya med par rtogs// myong zhing
115a8(rgyud 'grel): smra ma nus pa'i bcu drug lon pa'i bde ba su la bslangs// mkha' la shar ba'i rgyu skar rnams kyis nam zla dus bzhi'i dred tshad 'dzin// bzhin gyi dri ma sel ba'i me long 'di la sgeg mo sa
115b1(rgyud 'grel): gces par 'dzin// rgyal po'i khang bzang dag na btsun mo 'dod yon rtag tu spyod kyang de la zhen pa med// gang gis 'joms par mi nus pa lam rdzas kyi rdo rje yin// drang srong rnams kyis tshe yi rig 'dzin 
115b2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa gang gi stobs las byung // brtsog pa'i tshes zad snying po bor nas rin chen snod mdzes tshol ba thabs la mkhas// rdo yi skyes bu srin mo'i gling la zham nga med de gang mi rtog/ nam mkha'i mdzod la 
115b3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod nus na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bral// dmyal ba la sogs rigs drug dag la bde gshegs sku gdung 'bral// dug la sngags kyis thebs pas 'du ba'i nad rnams thams cad 
115b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jom sa// mkha' la zhim shrI rabAs rim la sogs snang gzhan zil gyis mnan pas nam mkha'i dkyil ltar mthong // ka raM na bcings chu yi 'gro 'od chad nas gzhon nu me long blta zhing nam 
115b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i dkyil na 'dug/ rab rib mig ser sel bas dud la ser por mthong ba'i 'khrul pa dus der zhig/ gshed mas khrid pa'i mi de thar nas dpa' 'dzangs de yi lags tu cang 'gro 
115b6(rgyud 'grel): 'am// nam mkha' dag pa'i 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs su bris pa gang na med// nam zhig mu ge'i dus bu sha zos kyang de la chags pa cang skye'am// bla ma'i dus thabs brten pas/ 
115b7(rgyud 'grel): yin min rten 'brel thams cad rtogs// rdo yi mi la sdom pa dam tshig phog kyang bsrung dang nyams pa'i rig byed med// rtog bral ro de gang la mi 'jigs nus mthu su yis byin pa yin// 
115b8(rgyud 'grel): dngas pa'i mkha' la gza' dang rgyu skar byang shes pa'i drang srong mkhas pa yin// ri dgas drang srong lta bu gcig pur 'dug pa'i mi des bden pa myur du thob// 'byung ba gyes pas dngul chu
116a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la 'phur bar gang nas 'ongs// rnyog ma'i dri ma can gyi tshu la nor bu bcug pa'i stobs kyis dngas par 'gyur// bde gshegs bems po ltar snang sman dang sman chu stegs 
116a2(rgyud 'grel): dang zab pa de mchod kyis// rtog med 'byung bas 'gro drug 'dod pa dus su bsod pa ngo mtshar che// rin chen gling du phyin nas sa dze btsal med ci snyed thams cad rin po che// mkha' la sprin 
116a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'khrigs na nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba yin// gang gdugs la ma de gsalan chu de 'dod pa'i gnas su 'gro/ kha brag lam na 'dug pa'i mi de glegs kyi rkyen gyis gang 'gro'i cha yang mdo// 
116a4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin chen len pa'i tshor basprugs la de dang skrag/ rdo yi mi la rmi lam ci zhig dris kyang lan de'ong des med// na cha sdug bsngal che dus rtsa ba de dang yin te thabs gzhan med// sdang 
116a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs rnams bsdigs su byung yang de nyid snying rje'i yul te logs na med// gshog gzhis rgyas pa'i rdul des nam mkha' gar byas rkyen gnyis dbang du bsdus// grangs dkar 
116a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsel zhamar med pa'i seng ge rtsal gsum rdzogs// sgo gzhis khyim spangs bsam gtan thun gyi zla brten nam mkha' mdzod du byas// lce dang 'theb mo gnyis ka brags la seng ge bu dang 
116a7(rgyud 'grel): skrag/ nam zhig 'brug la zhon nas 'jig rten gsal bar byed// lan tshwa'i rgya mtshor chu rnams ro gcig pa dad med// rgya mtsho dngas pa'i nang na gza' skar gzugs brnyan snang ba su 
116a8(rgyud 'grel): yis bzhag/ byang lha'i phug pas zhim ma mthong gang gis lan// dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i nor bu'i nus pa su la blangs zhes gsungs so// mchog gi brgyud pa las byung ba zab mo'i don 
116b1(rgyud 'grel): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma'i brda// rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo gsal ba zhes bya ba// du khrod chu sar dpal gyi rol par gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// dbang gtso bor bstan pa'o// 
116b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam sa pa sems kyang ma gang rna kya pa rnam kyang ji mu gas // / rgya ga skadang / yog sarba dad+b+ha/ u mu tr-i A lo ka nA ma pa~M ka la badz+ra g+hA ta/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor pa 
116b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur// bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu sems can las 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i lam 
116b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis las phying gyur pa med la// bsod nams tshogs kyi mthar thug ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o// de bskor ba'i gnas ni skye bos bgrod pa'i dka' ba'i sa phyogs// 'byung po ro langs 
116b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ba'i srang // 'jig rten gyi mi ma yin nu ba'i sa// mthong ba tsam gyis bdud ba spu ldang zhing srin po kyi g.ya' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas// durang khrod chen po brgyad du rtogs pa 
116b6(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams dang // chos nyid skye ba med pa la blo 'byings pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams rab tu tshogs nas// rang rang gi rgyud la don dam pa'i bden pa 'jug pa'i yul 
116b7(rgyud 'grel): nges pa'i shes pa gang la skyes pa dang // gzhug ma don gyi lhan cig skyes pa rang la gnas pa'i ye shes ngo gang la sprad pa dang // rtogs pa gang gi sgo nas shar ba de tshogs kyi mchod pa byin gyis
116b8(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa la zhams myong gi mgur bzhes pa/ gnas de dang de na gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma su ka ta bskal pa bzang mo la sogs pa rnams kyis/ mi bsnyel ba'i gzungs kyis phyi rabs kyi 
117a1(rgyud 'grel): don du yi ge ris su dkar shog la btab pa 'di rnams so// dka' thub mthur phyin pa lU yI pa'i zhal snga nas// tshe 'di'i tshe thabs 'khor ba'i chu// bya ba ma mang thar lam 
117a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gag/ 'dod pa'i blo bral bya ba'i yul// sa phyogs de na byang chub zhe/ zhes gsung ngo // bde ba'i medangs ldan ma// shrI su ka'i zhal snga nas/ 'jig rten bya ba bdud kyi yul// tshe// 
117a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i blo log 'phags pa'i lam// 'dod pa'i dug sbrul gtses pa yis// rjes ni sdug bsngal nyid du 'gur zhes so// nor bu gling pa la li ta badz+ra'i zhal snga nas// ting 'dzin shes rab 
117a4(rgyud 'grel): dri ma sel// rang rig ye shes 'od gsal sku// bde ba thob byed dbang gi lam// mngon du gyur tshe rtog pa grol zhes gsung ngo // 'dod chags lam du slong ba mo tsan+d+ra bi ma la'i zhal 
117a5(rgyud 'grel): snga nas// shes rab rno ngar ting 'dzin gyis// ma mthong 'khor ba'i sgrog mi chod// rin chen dbang gi nus pa yis// zag pa bde chen nyid du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // nus pa'i mthar 
117a6(rgyud 'grel): thug bir+ya pa'i zhal snga nas// 'dam bral pad skam pa bzhin// dug lnga med na ye shes 'gag/ 'dod yon lam khyer sa lam 'dums// spangs nas grol 'dod dman pa'i lam zhes 
117a7(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // zang zing gi sbyin bdag mo ru ru su ke'i zhal snga nas/ drang srong shes rab mig can gyis// nad gzhi lus kyi zungs su bsgyur// de bzhin thabs dang ldan pa yis// dug lngas 
117a8(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bskyed par byed// ces gsung ngo // 'gro ba'i mgon po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas// rmi lam rang bzhin med pa bzhin// chos rnams rang gi ngo bos stong // 'khor ba dang ni 
117b1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das// don la grub pa ma yin no zhes gsung ngo // so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa'i dz+nyA na d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas// ngo bos stong pa snang ba'i mtshang // gang la rang bzhin med pa yi// 
117b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid de// zung 'jug ma mthong grol mi nus zhes gsung ngo // rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas// snga nas ma dran rdo rje'i gdan// sla bar ma nus yid 
117b3(rgyud 'grel): 'pham sa// 'od gsal 'gro 'ong med pa'i bdag/ gzhis snang grol ba phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo // rdo rje bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ma a na ki ra'i zhal snga nas// dngas ma snang stong rkyen dang 
117b4(rgyud 'grel): bral// tshogs drug yul du ma bcad pa'i// 'gro 'ong med pa gzhug ma'i rang // dran brjed mtshams su sems ngal sos zhes gsung ngo // ri khrod dbang phyug sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas/ 
117b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa rkyen snang glo bur ba// dus gsum skye 'jig gi stong pa// gzhi la ma grub ngo mtshar yul// de mthong ba ni grol ba'i yul zhes gsung ngo // skyabs kyi sbyin bdag mo su ka b+ha'u 
117b6(rgyud 'grel): yi zhal snga nas// dran rig rnam par rtog pa ni// ma rig pa yi stobs las 'byung // sna tshogs med shar ngo bos stong // rtsa bral nam mkha'i rjes thob can zhes gsung ngo // mi las 'das 
117b7(rgyud 'grel): pa Ar+ya de ba'i zhal snga nas// 'od gsal gdod nas dag pa'i ngang // mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i// rang gnas rtsa ba 'dus ma byas// sgros bral 'di ni gzigs mor che zhes 
117b8(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // dran pa cig pa'i rnal 'byor ma b+ha su ri ka'i zhal snga nas// kun la khyab pa 'od gsal dang // 'gro 'ong med pa'i bdag nyid can// spros bral dus rnams thams cad pa// 
118a1(rgyud 'grel): chos su 'gro ba mi 'dor ro zhes gsung ngo // slu ba'i seng ge ka la a le ba'i zhal snga nas// grub mtha'i lta ba min du brjod// ming rnams rnam par rtog pa ste// de nyid stong pa chos kyi 
118a2(rgyud 'grel): sku// ming las grol ba phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo // rtse gcig gis rnal 'byor ma ka ri d+ha ri ma'i zhal snga nas// bde gshegs btsun mo ming med ma// nam mkha'i 'o ma rab 'thungs nas// smra bsam 
118a3(rgyud 'grel): blo yi yul las 'das// gnyis snang za zhing nam mkha' 'jo// de mthong bas ni grol bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // blo gros mi zad pa shAM ta de pa'i zhal snga nas// tshe 'di'i blo log thar pa'i lam/ 
118a4(rgyud 'grel): snang phyir ma 'breng 'khrul pa grol// dus gsum tshig cho ga gnad kyi mtshang // dri med rang snang phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo // chos kyi sbyin bdag mo a nu ta ra'i zhal snga nas// go cha 'jig rten pa yi 
118a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol// ma grol 'phags lam zin mi 'gyur// de srid bde ba dang mi 'phrad// rang snang dag tsha zhing khams 'char zhes gsung ngo // brtul zhugs thar phyin Dom+bi pa'i zhal snga nas// dmigs 
118a6(rgyud 'grel): bes ched du ma gzung ba'i// shes pa yul las ma 'phros pa// bde gsal mi rtog dri ma med// dang sa ma yid 'bral phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo // 'dod pa la blo log pa rnal 'byor ma dz+nyA na 
118a7(rgyud 'grel): bi ma la'i zhal snga nas// sgom blo'i 'dun pa dri ma ste// rig pa so la bzhag pa yi// ma byas shes pa skyon las grol// 'dzin rtog dmigs pa'i steng du ni// spros bral 'char bar mi 'gyur 
118a8(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo // shes rab spyan ldan ka ma la'i zhal snga nas// dngos don rang rig ye shes kyi// lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams myong ni// tshig gi spyod yul ma yin te// brda yis mtshon 
118b1(rgyud 'grel): pa seng ge'i gsung ngo // bdag med kyi sgra sgrogs ma pad+ma d+ha nu'i zhal snga nas// gzhug ma ngo bo nyid kyis gshis// blo yi yul na gnas pa min// mtshon du yod la ngos bzung bral// yang dag 
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i brda las rig ces gsung ngo // 'khrul pa'i lkog khrol ba byin pa'i zhal snga nas// ji ltar chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// snang ba'i rang ma tshang ngo bos stong // dngos por 'dzin pa 'khrul 
118b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// der 'dzin grol bas phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo // sdom pa'i tshul khrims can me kha la'i zhal snga nas// ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer bzhin// chos rnams rang bzhin rtags na dben// 
118b4(rgyud 'grel): bden pa rdzung zad yi ge zad// tshig gi la mtshang grolas 'dres zhes gsung // smras pa'i rnal 'bri gle ga la ldan pa/ rtogs pa yid bzhin nor bral// goms 'dres phyis bdang 
118b5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa yis// brtan pa thob pa mdog byin te// de tshe dgos 'dod sngon du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo // 'khor ba'i yid phyung ba mo kum la sur+ya'i zhal snga nas// rang snang sprin rum ma dang sa na// 
118b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi be'u'i 'od migs la// rnam rtog rgyang du ma bsrings na// ye shes nye ru mi 'dod do zhes gsung ngo // rlung la dbang phyug pa tso bo ri ka'i zhal snga nas// zung 'jug gnas pa'i yi 
118b7(rgyud 'grel): ge ni// 'gros kyi rnam shes yi ge sel// nyams myong gsal bas bdag 'dzin zhig/ 'di yis nyams kyis 'phen len 'jig ces gsung ngo // dpal mi'i seng ge'i spyod pa can
118b8(rgyud 'grel): u nu ka ri'i zhal snga nas// bde chen chos dang sprul pa yi// 'khor lo gsum gyi lte ba la// gnas pa'i yi ge bde gshegs kyi// ma lus kun gyi sku gsung thugs zhes gsung 
119a1(rgyud 'grel): ngo // brda la rang ngo mthong ba na du ba'i zhal snga nas// snying gi dbus su ngo sprad pa'o// bla mas bstan pa mchog gi don// lhun grub rang ngo shes pa ni// gnad de nges pa'i
119a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pas mthong zhes gsung ngo // dge ba'i chos sdud tshul khrims can b+ha tsa la'i zhal sde nas// gzhi rdzogs rang 'byung ye shes su// chos mi rkyen la rag mi las// rang rig thod gsal 
119a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos po'i gshes// rten 'brel gang gis thabs kyis rig ces gsung ngo // lung rig gter gyi dbang phyug ti ba'o zhal snga nas// bla ma'i gsung gis mdongs pa gsal// de mthong 
119a4(rgyud 'grel): ming gi sngo snod la// bltas tshe gdams par ma gyur pa'i// yi ge gcig kyang bor du med ces gsung ngo // gsal ba'i med ngas ldan ma kar ma li ka'i zhal snga nas// nam mkha' 
119a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi glegs bam la// dkar dmar sna tshogs yi ge rnams// rnam rtog 'khrul pa blo yi chos// don la glegs bam yi ges stong zhes gsung ngo // bde ba lam khyer thabs la 
119a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dan taM ba'i zhal snga nas// nang gros phyi yi rkyen zhu bas// rtsol ba ma byas dang gis su// khams 'dus rang la gnas pa yis// ye shes shar bas las las grol zhes gsung
